name: Lady O  The Sea
description: In the mystical realms of the Scottish sea shore, a poetic journey unfolds, unveiling the enigmatic presence of a woman who lingers between worlds. Is she a creature of the depths, a mermaid concealed in the whispers of waves, or a mere mortal wrapped in the mystique of the coastal winds? Through evocative spoken word poetry, this short film invites the audience to explore the elusive boundary where reality and fantasy converge, leaving them to ponder the secrets hidden beneath the tides and the ambiguity that dances with the sea s embrace.

name: Subway To Sally: Live at Summer Breeze 2019
description: At Summer Breeze, around 40,000 fans from the metal scene come together every year.  Subway To Sally s sound is sometimes heavy, sometimes danceable, sometimes very rocky and then again ballad-like. The Potsdamers are one of the best-known bands in the field of medieval rock.

name: Saulius Prūsaitis. Diskoteka
description: Concert of Lithuanian singer Saulius Prusaitis.

name: A Lebanese at the university
description: A young college man and a girl fall in love, but another girl loves the same man, so she tries to get between them by unjustly informing his father about him.

name: HUGORM - Live at VEGA 28.12.2022
description: HUGORM showed its beating, bloody, naked heart on the album "TRO, HUG & KÆRLIGHED" from mid-October 2022, and the culmination after a year of superb reviews and great media coverage occurred with the producer trio s two sold-out concerts in front of well over 4000 fans of HUGARMY in STORE VEGA between Christmas and New Year in the same year.

name: Saulius Prūsaitis. Namo nereiks pareit!
description: Concert of Saulius Prusaitis in the biggest arena of the Lithuania.

name: AM + FOJE = 30
description: The 30th anniversary concert of Andrius Mamontovas and the group FOJE.

name: Layla in the dark
description: Hussein and Laila are children who pledge to love. Circumstances separate them and they meet after they grow up and their feelings are renewed, but Laila is exposed to an accident that loses her sight, so she decides to sacrifice her love so that Hussein can avoid life with a co-wife.

name: The invisibility cap
description: Teacher Abbas Samkari dreams of getting rich. He finds an invisibility cap and uses it to pay off his debts and follow everyone around him without anyone seeing him. However, the cap falls into the hands of thieves, who misuse it.

name: Hanan
description: (Hassan), the simple contractor, lives a happy life with his wife (Amina) and his daughter (Laila). He succeeds in his work, becomes a wealthy contractor, and meets (Murad) Bey and they start a company. (Nima), (Murad s) playful sister, tries to lure (Hassan) into... She falls into her trap, and succeeds in doing so in order to cover up the suspicious actions of her brother (Murad). Hassan leaves his wife (Amina) and divorces her. His daughter, Laila, and her fiancé, Aziz, try to expose Naama and Murad and reunite the family.

name: The Gnome
description: A story about a little gnome named "Grimble Grumble" and his psychedelic adventures in a pastoral setting, based on Syd Barrett s musical composition.

name: Lucifer Sam
description: A two-headed Siamese cat chases a mouse through a psychedelic landscape.

name: Eternity
description: According to the words of J.L. Borges in his work “A History of Eternity”, “eternity is a simpler and more magical thing: it is the simultaneity of those times… The past is in its present, as is the future.”  In the short film, a metaphor is created with the “leaf” of a tree that withers and falls onto the “leaf” of paper, which is in turn a score of J.S. Bach’s Prelude in B-flat minor, which incidentally is played throughout the journey of the protagonist, the “leaf”. The timeless rhythms of Bach’s genius resonate, that immortal genius who centuries ago left his legacy on the eternal “leaves” of his scores, transcending time.

name: Herbert von Karajan: Verdi: Don Carlo
The Guitarist
description: A young musician dreams about a future past.

name: Hillsong Chapel: Forever Reign
description: Forever Reign is the second installment in the Hillsong Chapel praise and worship series by Hillsong Church, which was released in Australia on 22 October 2012 by Hillsong Music Australia. It is an acoustic and devotional collection of Hillsong songs by the Hillsong team. Recorded live in March 2012 at St. Stephen s Anglican Church, "Forever Reign" is the second installment in this organic contemplative expression of praise and worship. The album reached the Top 50 on the ARIA Albums Chart.

name: My Grey City
description: Documentary about Serbian rapper Danijel Mitrović aka Deniro.

name: The White Stripes - Peppermint Parade
description: Jack and Meg White s White Stripes captured live in concert during their Get Behind Me Satan World Tour. The American rock garage band s inimitable style has become wildly popular worldwide, racking up album sales in excess of 12 million copies. Recorded live in the UK in June 25, 2005; the hits Seven Nation Army, Blue Orchid and The Hardest Button To Button are included.

name: #Puremoods2016
description: A video compilation of Vaporwave songs in a limited edition of 50 copies, on upcycled VHS tapes.

name: Andrius Mamontovas. Koncerto filmas
description: On your screen is an impressive spectacle: the biggest concert of Andrius Mamontovas solo career and documentary footage of the event behind the scenes. The eyes and ears of 20,000 spectators admired the most popular hits of A. Mamontovas and "Foje" on the legendarystage of Vingis Park, which sounded uniquely in a new format - with the support of the symphony orchestra conducted by maestro Modesto Pitrėnas. This film is a recording of a historic concert that the performer himself dreamed of seeing through the eyes of the audience. You can see up close - not only the action on the stage from the front rows, but also several months of preparation for a magical musical journey during the forty years of A. Mamontovas career.

name: Donatas Montvydas. 1987 Koncerto filmas
description: "Donatas Montvydas. 1987. Concert Film . An incredible music show that will take you behind the scenes of the artist s life and reveal things you won t see with any concert ticket. Sit in the best seats, travel to rehearsals and see what s left behind.

name: SEL Grand Show Klaipeda 2011
description: SEL Grand Show in Klaipeda.

name: SEL 360 2015
description: After the record-breaking concert in 2014, which attracted more than 20 thousand fans, the leader of the group Egidijus Dragūnas, who breaks standards and stereotypes, surprised his fans and held an even more impressive so-called "360 degree" concert.

name: NOVATURO 15-asis atostogų sezonas pristato – SEL
description: SEL s exclusive concert in the biggest arena in Lithuania!

name: 23ª Entrega de los Latin GRAMMY - Ceremonia
ELLEGARDEN「Get it Get it Go! SUMMER PARTY 2023」
description: ELLEGARDEN s final performance of their "Get it Get it Go! SUMMER PARTY 2023" tour, filmed at ZOZO Marine Stadium in Chiba on August 27, 2023.

name: Pierre Boulez: Emotion and Analysis
description: Boulez rehearsing with the Berlin Philharmonic

name: Mozart:  Lucio Silla
description: The Chorus and Orchestra of Teatro Alla Scala conducted by Marc Minikowski; Teatro alla Scala, Milan, March 2015

name: STEREOS: A Thousand Days Away
description: On the eve of their record release show for their first album in 12 years, Pat and Robb from the Juno-nominated, Multi-Platinum band Stereos detail the cataclysmic rise, fall and rebirth of the group behind Summer Girl, Throw Ya Hands Up, Butterflies and more.

name: Through Hell & Rice 2
description: After Haukur gets magically turned into a girl, her friends must find a way to turn him back into a boy whilst defeating the evil mastermind behind it.

name: Les Rallizes Dénudés - Hanging Dance Party
description: Recorded on July 10th, 1994 at Seibu-Kodo (Western Auditorium), Kyoto University (京都・京都大西部講堂).

name: Live at Stardust
description: Concert film of Marc with a C with Chris Zabriskie at Stardust Video.

name: Sinta
description: 20-year-old Joshie, a queer man, takes a break from his busy life to prepare for a special day, As he gets ready, his morning routine becomes a fun exploration of gender fluidity, with a wardrobe of both masculine and feminine outfits. Despite encountering challenges, Joshie eventually overcomes it and reunites with the person he has not seen in years.

name: Quest For Fire - Basement Set
description: The legendary musician, producer and DJ, eight times Grammy Awards winner, Skrillex is back! In this performance, he show few songs and tease us for his new album Quest For Fire.

name: Новогодний квартирник НТВ у Маргулиса: Новоселье по-новогоднему
Bêtes de scène
description: In a high school in the 2000s, the annual talent competition is approaching and inspiration is struggling for a music group on the verge of crisis. But the situation changes when the bassist announces her departure to the two other members. This could be a source of discord as well as a source of inspiration for the group.

name: Karajan: Ludwig van Beethoven: Symphony no. 9
Karajan: Ludwig van Beethoven: Symphonies nos. 1-4
Poslednja Igra Leptira: Live at Dom sindikata
description: One of the most popular groups of Yugoslavia, Poslednja igra leptira, with their frontman Nesa Leptir, made live spectacles by combining sketches of comedy and original music. One of these concerts, which were sold-out very quickly, was held at the Belgrade s Dom sindikata 1984..

name: Thibaut Garcia en concert aux Grandes Écuries de Chantilly
The Clairvoyant
description: A provincial town at the end of the 19th century. An adversary arrives who amazes the women with his incredible predictions. He enters the mayor s house and promises a lot of money to the whole family and to a guest - the priest. Allegedly unbelieving, the priest and the mayor pricked up their ears. The money would come from a young man who had recently arrived in the town. The only new arrival is Mancho - the photographer. The mayor and the priest find their way to him, and soon after the two, and after them other prominent citizens, are entangled in the crook s web, to become victims of his greed...

name: The Story of Nuclearia
description: Documentary on the LA Alt Rock Band

name: Florence + The Machine: Live at the Wiltern
description: In November of 2010 Florence + The Machine played 3 sold out nights at the Wiltern Theater in Los Angeles, CA and on November 8th Live Nation was there to capture it all on film. 2010 was a whirlwind year for Florence - she stormed the US music scene when she performed on the MTV Music Awards, garnered a Grammy Nomination for Best New Artist and then kicked off 2011 with a performance at the Oscars.

name: Proverbs: Offerings from the Internet
description: Made by Angelita

name: IRON - O Homem da Máscara de Ferro
description: A loose stage adaptation of the classic by Alexandre Dumas, told as an interactive electropop musical experience, breaking the boundaries between stage and audience.

name: Bing Crosby Color Christmas Show
description: Bing emcees and performs in this special Christmas show packed with guest stars including the cast of Hogan s Heroes, a comedy dog, and more.

name: Tomorrow Is a Long Time: Chrissie Hynde Sings Bob Dylan
description: A portrait of Chrissie Hynde, told in her own words as this film explores her inspiration and creative process while creating 10 Bob Dylan covers.

name: Solo
description: Ali gets informed that he has been accepted in a well-known international music college, but his band partner and close friend, Ahmed, has not.

name: A Zámori meló
description: Hungarian band Carson Coma plays songs from their album "IV" in Pusztazámor

name: Stucko: The Return of Stucko
description: This is the story of the legendary San Francisco punk band, Stucko.

name: Geovanna Fleur: One Night Only
description: Indie-pop singer and songwriter Geovanna Fleur takes the stage for a magical musical journey through her discography in the biggest show of her career - so far - at Teatro Paiol in Curitiba.

name: Hana a Petr Ulrychovi - Javorová píseň
Animelo Summer Live 2023 -AXEL- DAY 1
description: Animelo Summer Live 2023 -AXEL- DAY 1

name: Animelo Summer Live 2023 -AXEL- DAY 2
description: Animelo Summer Live 2023 -AXEL- DAY 2

name: Le parcours de Chilla
description: In this documentary, the France TV teams meet with Chilla in late 2019 as she begins the creation of her second album. The young woman opens up about her childhood, her appetite for music, and also addresses questions such as "how to find a way to express herself that suits her while navigating an environment as codified as rap? How to unite while being from everywhere and nowhere, in a hip-hop world where claiming an origin, a neighborhood is essential?"

name: L Entourage : l héritage du rap parisien
description: Documentary that retraces the journey of the French rap collective L Entourage, its impact, and the career of each member.

name: Les 4 visages de Kery James
description: Since his arrival in France as a child, the traumas of exile, abandonment, and poverty have shaped the identity of Alix Mathurin. As a teenager, rap and the streets led him away from school. Endowed with a strong presence and a sensitive pen, Kery James quickly becomes the voice of a generation of young people from the suburbs who are aware that life and they themselves are deteriorating together. At the same time, he plays with fire within a gang of drug dealers and robbers. The murder of one of his friends prompts him to stop everything, both rap and the path of delinquency.  Converted to Islam, he resumes rap as a missionary because he knows that his voice is influential.

name: Le cercle de la haine
description: "Le cercle de la haine" is a work of fiction with the appearance of a sociological fresco, unfortunately inspired by reality. This opus traces the journey of three young individuals from "sensitive neighborhoods" who resort to violence as their primary mode of expression, convinced that it is the only way to earn respect in a society that has definitively excluded them. However, this situation will ultimately turn against them...

name: Un pied devant l autre
description: Koma is a rapper. He lives at La Goutte d’or, the district of his childhood. That is where he met the members of his group "La Scred Connexion" without which, he says, he would not be alive today. His plan is to make his music the mouthpiece for his experience and the denouncer of a situation of exclusion. By means of the analysis of his own work and the progressive construction of his music, Koma offers to our eyes and our ears the relationship he has with history, politics and society.

name: BOOMBOX
description: 100 Days, 100 Songs, 100 Dances

name: Duo Song
description: It portrays the story of two young people whose lives go parallel and they accompany each other along the way.

name: A for ABBA
description: This program was broadcast on 20 July 1993, BBC, UK, presented by UK DJ John Peel and this documentary telling the story of ABBA from the beginning to the end and featuring the ABBA revival.

name: The Ukeman
description: Born into a family of comically large piano players, black sheep Bo Star dreams of playing the ukulele. Thanks to a chance encounter with famous German pop star producer Godfrey Von Nice Guy, Bo Star s dreams may just come true. In a story as old as time, Bo Star journey s a path of fame and fortune, but is his dream as worth it as he thought?

name: Picchio dal Pozzo – Live
description: Italian progressive rock / jazz group Picchio dal Pozzo live, recorded at "La Claque" club Genova (Italy) 15 January 2011.  Released on DVD in 2013.

name: Night on Disco Mountain
description: A cast of cartoon characters dance to disco.

name: Jungle Jazz: Public Enemy #1
description: Between the years 1941-47, more than eighteen hundred  soundies  were made in US. These three-minute films - precursors of pop promos - could be seen and heard in bars and restaurants with the aid ofspecially-constructed automated machines. This film combines several soundies with Jungle Jazz music by the Hidden Faces, in a story that pokes fun at US government anti-marijuana films of the fifties.

name: Lo Schiaccianoci al Teatro alla Scala
Return
description: A musical video that flashes the old college memories of a student

name: Ensemble pour les fêtes avec Lynda Lemay
ROYAL HUNT Live 25 Anniversary 2016
description: Join the celebration of Royal Hunt‘s 25th Anniversary!

name: Im Konzert: WIR - Live Konzert in Leipzig
Hiromi & Edmar Castaneda – Live In Montreal
description: DVD Bonus for Hiromi & Edmar Castaneda s Live in Montreal album.  Contains "The Elements: Fire", "Haze", and "Canadian Tour Documentary And Interviews".

name: RIHANNA "LIVE VOCALS" (REACTION)
description: Zach Campbell reacts to Rihanna s mic-feed as part of his 2016 REACTMAS series

name: Il Turco in Italia - Festival d Aix-en-Provence
description: In the bright sunlight of opera buffa, a handsome Turkish prince (with an agile bass voice) lands on the coast of Naples looking for amorous adventures. In no time at all he meets a vivacious Italian girl (a coquettish virtuoso soprano), who is accustomed to flitting between admirers, much to the displeasure of her elderly husband. This little group carries on its flirtations, rivalries and quarrels under the delighted eyes of the poet Prosdocimo, who, as it happens, has been seeking inspiration for a dramma buffo.

name: Der Schatzgräber
description: Franz Schreker’s career was cut short by the events of 1933 in Germany but he achieved real fame with his operas, and the huge success of Der Schatzgräber (‘The Treasure Hunter’) in the 1920s was the high point of his career. In a complex and ultimately tragic tale of destructive greed, desire and toxic social hierarchy, the innkeeper’s daughter Els is forced to confront the consequences of her murderous intent in what conductor Marc Albrecht considers ‘a work of exceptional quality, concentration and significance’. Following the huge success of Korngold’s Das Wunder der Heliane (Naxos DVD 2.110584–85 / Blu-ray NBD0083V), director Christof Loy continues his exploration of strong female characters and neglected 20th-century masterpieces with this highly acclaimed Deutsche Oper Berlin production.

name: I Rap Therefore I Am
description: Rap ? Violent words, a social chronicle without complacency at a time of the politically correct and a wishywashy consensus. Twenty years after its first babblings in the popular quarters of New York, rap has imposed its presence beyond the borders.  Je rap donc je suis (I Rap Therefore I Am) goes around five different towns where it meets rappers driven by the same motivation. In Paris and its suburbs, Marseille and its districts, Algiers, London or Berlin, rappers move, play, record, teach...  And above all, they talk. Outside of any promotional context, the present-day heralds of French hip-hop, from La Rumeur to IAM, speak about the role of rap, the environment in which it was born, boredom, the feeling of belonging to a sacrificed generation, drugs in districts of towns, immigration, parents, political and social actors, the police, school, writing, money, the parallel economy, violence...

name: bittersweet memories: 14 dias isolados para fazer um álbum
Peoples Potential Unlimited - Video Party Volume Two
description: Another hour+ of video tape madness from the PPU Archives. Featuring live public access performances from Glass Pyramid Band (Oklahoma), Pleasure (DC), and The Incredible Rock City Band (Arkansas). Rare music videos from Uku Kuut (Estonia), plus even more unseen home video clips, and forgotten party freaks. Compiled by Peoples Potential Unlimited, edited by Luke Wyatt. Parental Guidance Suggested.

name: Astor Piazzolla: María de Buenos Aires - Grand Théâtre de Genève
Nochka: Concert aux étoiles
description: A documentary about a young artist: Nochka, performing in Paris.

name: United By Music
description: Behind the scenes look at the 2023 Eurovision Song Contest.

name: A Once Lonely Man
description: Voted for in Sight & Sounds Best Films of 2023

name: Projections
description: PROJECTIONS is about when we fall in love with someone unknown and we do everything we can to really get to know that person. For our protagonist, this approach will be to write a script for a young actress who plays an old Hollywood star with whom he is in love and doesn t really know anything.

name: Genshin Concert 2023: Melodies of an Endless Journey
description: The melodies of your travels are resounding once more, Travelers! Let s return to the start of this endless journey together and relive our precious memories through music!

name: Ausgang: Offen
description: EXIT: OPEN is a first-person danse macabre documenting true stories and individual perspectives on dying, death and transience: filmed during the 2020 Coronavirus lockdown at an abandoned office complex in Vienna, Austria.

name: Karisome no kuchibeni
description: A Japanese version of the musical comedy "Yes, Mr. Brown"

name: Rebellion - A Punk Movie
description: Filmed over three years at the Rebellion punk festival.

name: RIHANNA "VMA 2016" (REACTION)
description: Zach Campbell & friends react to Rihanna s 2016 MTV Video Music Awards performance

name: Квартирник НТВ у Маргулиса: Сурганова и оркестр
Streetz Of Rage Europe Tour: The Documentary
description: This past June, Rome Streetz of Griselda Records invaded Europe, embarking on the Streetz Of Rage Tour. This original motion picture documents Rome’s navigation through four different countries throughout Europe: Germany, Switzerland, Italy, and England. This presentation also highlights the distinctive story about his roots in London, England. Going back to his birthplace, Rome meets some of his family members for the first time in London. The dedication and appreciation of Rome’s artistry from the European fans is something special. This tour is an essential element of Rome’s story leading up to the release of his debut Griselda Records LP, Kiss The Ring.

name: Moonlight
description: Official music video for Moonlight by Dee Nawels out now.

name: Vinyl Heaven
description: The film goes behind the counter in Copenhagen s used record shops and hears about the rare jazz, soul and rock vinyl records, which are necessary to preserve the great cultural heritage that has never been reissued on CD, and about the musical aha experiences and obscure acquaintances, which results from the hunt.

name: Francis Hime - 50 years of music
description: The 75 years of life and 50 career of Francis Hime were celebrated on stage, in style, to the sound of a generous soundtrack in classics and new songs by the composer, performer, arranger and pianist from Rio. Registered by Canal Brasil, the commemorative show, named after Francis Hime - 50 years of music, is being released on CD and DVD.

name: Smalltown Beast
description: Massive Eastleigh fan MC Beastly shows you round his up-and-coming hometown (as seen in A-level Geography on urban decay)

name: Hov1 Forever
description: Hov1 is one of Sweden s most popular bands and in the summer of 2023 they played 27 sold-out gigs. In the unique film "HOV1 4-EVER", the audience gets to follow the band on stage where they sing their biggest songs and meet their fans, but also take part in their personal conversations behind the scenes and when they produce music. It will be an intimate concert film where the fans can get close to their idols - while they get a strong musical experience.

name: East German Schlager is dead. Long live the East German Schlager!
description: Siegfried "Siggi" Trzoß, a radio moderator from East Berlin, is working tirelessly leading up to his anniversary and 900th show. The music his heart burns for is East German Schlager, a genre politically ignored at first and widely forgotten now. But Siggi keeps the dream alive to this day, making the hearts of seniors jump higher in nostalgia all over east Germany.

name: Chihiro Yamanaka - Dolce Vita
description: Bonus DVD for Dolce Vita.  Features music videos for E.S.P., Black Nile and Limbo.

name: Квартирник НТВ у Маргулиса: Юрий Лоза
Keeping Secrets Will Destroy You
description: A collage film that filmmaker, artist, and archivist Ryan Daly has created – in collaboration with Will Oldham – to accompany the album "Keeping Secrets Will Destroy You" by Bonnie "Prince" Billy. Echoing the spirit and themes of the album, utilizing his vast archive of 16mm film prints, and working in the avant-garde tradition of “found footage” filmmaking, Daly has assembled a tour de force visual manifestation of Oldham’s album. Daly’s footage recalls, re-imagines, and suggests an alternative, timeless counterpoint to the era of the recent pandemic.

name: Turn on the Bright Lights
description: Marking the 20th anniversary of their debut album  Turn on the Bright Lights,  Interpol unearths their documentary short originally released as an EPK in 2002 before the album s release.

name: Molotof - Live at The LITone Concert
description: The full live performance of Molotof at the LITone Concert on September 29th, The GrEEK Campus Downtown Cairo.

name: Pourquoi t’es dans la lune?
description: Biopic of one of Québec s most popular pop-rock band Les BB.

name: Putin s Ashes
description: The film is the culmination of a performance that took place in August, 2022 when Pussy Riot burned a giant portrait of Russian president Vladimir Putin. during the performance, twelve women, mostly Ukrainian, Belarusian, or Russian, cast spells aimed at chasing Putin away from leadership.

name: نجميّات
description: A lightning-fast 10-minute dive into art, cinema, music, culture, and beyond, in each part. Ditch the fancy, embrace the fun. No script, just surprises. This part talks about music and its history

name: B z LIVE-GYM 2019 -Whole Lotta NEW LOVE-
Dirty Club Official Video
description: Dirty Club music video, by Snake Nash, produced by Josh Anton and Mixed by DC Alien

name: Hafiz & Friends Recap: This Is Why We Can Have Nice Things
description: The event commences with a montage showcasing Hafiz and his friends  camaraderie and shared experiences. They are seen laughing, playing, and simply cherishing each other s company. Their strong bond and unwavering support for one another are evident. Hafiz takes the stage to deliver a heartfelt speech about the importance of friendship. He recounts how his friends have consistently been there for him, offering unwavering support and guidance throughout his life. He also shares how friendship has empowered him to navigate challenging times.

name: B z LIVE in なんば 2006 & B z SHOWCASE 2007 -19- at Zepp Tokyo
Pink Floyd Live at Hakone Aphrodite Festival 1971 - Remastered Edition
Never Forget
description: I ll never forget this summer we spent together. I swear to you. Never forget.

name: Forest Quartet
description: An animations is based on Sulkhan-Saba Orbeliani’s fable and tells a story of a rooster who makes friend with a dog. Together they decide to build the village but soon are joined by a cunning fox.

name: Festival Anormal 3rd edition - Live Session Concert
description: Presents: Covra, Mar, Isla Flamingo, Mantis atea, Bing, MadhatteR, Buka

name: Texas Music Revolution
description: Since 1997, KHYI-FM in Dallas has championed the authentic, unpolished sound of indie Americana and country music. It’s a cause that crystallized when station manager Joshua Jones founded Texas Music Revolution, an annual festival designed to showcase and introduce new musicians to local listeners.

name: Marilyn Manson Ozzfest 2001
description: Marilyn Manson performing at Ozzfest in Toronto, Canada in 2001.

name: We ll be Singing by September
description: A collective narrative about the origins of the New Chilean Song movement, beginning with Violeta Parra, the emblematic groups, the influence of Víctor Jara, and their intersections with other musical styles. This is the story of the musical epic of the generation that had a profound impact on the triumph of the Popular Unity alongside Salvador Allende.

name: Just Your Doll
description: Just Your Doll by Snow Strippers

name: Tiempo Comparti2 con La Vida Bohème
description: Venezuelan band  La Vida Bohème  presents "Tiempo Comparti2", a new installment in their concert film series, recorded in New York in the studios at GB’s Jukejoint.

name: Trans and Dance
description: Torn between two appearances, a young man encounters his double involving him into a space odyssey towards Planet Disco, where his convictions about his gender become open to new horizons.

name: London Christmas Live 1974
description: Elton John performs on Christmas Eve in this special concert event, broadcast live in 1974 on BBC 2.

name: CALIFORNIA DREAM GIRL
description: Directed by Noah Dillon

name: Car Colors - Old Death
description: The music video for the highly anticipated debut single from Car Colors (the new project from Charles Bissell, formerly of The Wrens), “Old Death."  The song and music video are about time, how one chooses to spend it, and what those choices cost. Set within the emotional framework of an old portable television with shoddy reception, Charles takes us on an odyssey of music, memory, and mortality.

name: Spelman, musiker, artist - Kalle Moraeus
description: A conversation with the classical and modern musician Kalle Moraeus.

name: Path of Shadows
description: An alchemist musician. A couple in a war trench. In an apocalyptic future, these three characters will be meet to discover the origins of hatred and the art.

name: The LXD: The Uprising Begins
description: Join seemingly ordinary people who discover they have extraordinary powers in a groundbreaking mythology about hope, greed, love and the force that moves us all.

name: IKEA Heights - The Next Generation (Musical Edition)
description: The two hopeless roommates return in the second episode of  IKEA Heights: The Next Generation , expressing all of the details of their sordid relationship drama through the medium of song.

name: SAKANAQUARIUM2017 10th ANNIVERSARY Arena Session 6.1ch Sound Around
Bassie & Adriaan: 25 jaar feest!
description: Bassie and Adriaan turns 25 years and that must be celebrated! Watch the 25 best songs the duo made in the past 25 years. For young and old!

name: Christmas at the Opry
description: Wynonna Judd hosts the holiday event, featuring performances by country music icons Mitchell Tenpenny, Kelly Clarkson, Trace Adkins and more in front of a live audience of country music fans at the Grand Ole Opry House in Nashville, Tenn.

name: PATTI
description: Patti is a young woman who is interested in all creative activities. She faces a block when she must write the speech she will give at her graduation, which she puts off until the night before. She must learn that the only way to achieve it against the clock is to trust herself and her abilities, overcoming her fears.

name: Fuck TV
description: Fuck TV was a comprehensive and experiential audio-visual presentation. Aired to a passive and unsuspecting audience on San Francisco’s public access channel from 1997 to 1998, each episode of Fuck TV was dedicated to a specific topic, combining video collage and cut-up techniques set to a harsh electronic soundtrack. The resultant overload of processed imagery and visceral sound was unlike anything presented on television before or since. This DVD set marks the first time that this show has been made available since its original airing.

name: Seasons
description: We are already like adults, we felt the change of times, we began to feel winter more keenly, autumn more painful, spring more subdued, and for some reason summer even more joyful.  .

name: Vanilla Ninja - Traces of Sadness (Live in Estonia)
description: Live concert of the 2004 tour "Traces of Sadness" in their home country Estonia.

name: Electric Tension
description: A Group of School Boys form a Band to win a school music competition......But none of them have any Musical Experience. With the Aid of a Documentary Crew, we see their story.

name: Les Grands Rivaux en musique - Schönberg vs Stravinsky
2001: An Edm Odyssey
description: An exploration into the world of Electronic Dance Music.

name: One Man Makes the Difference
description: Vladan Vasev aka VaXz, is a lover of basketball and all kinds of team sports from Bosilegrad, who completely single-handedly restored faith in the hardcore music scene in Serbia. When the performers on stage noticed his jumps and the way of dancing specific to hardcore music and inquired about the most loyal member of their audience, they learned an incredible story. In order to attend the concert, VaXz travels from Bosilegrad to Belgrade sometimes up to ten hours, and then returns, sometimes immediately after listening to the gig. In this film, we meet Vladan and what it is that inspires him about hardcore, but through his portrait we also get to know life in a small town like Bosilegrad, as well as the history of hardcore music in Serbia and how bands came together to honor their most loyal fan.

name: Romantic in the Soul: The Conductor and Pianist Igor Švara
description: Documentary about the pianist Igor Švara.

name: Diskopunk en concert aux Trans Musicales de Rennes 2023
Grenzwert
description: Documentary musical essay on the topic of "Grenzwert". It was created in 72 hours.

name: I Dreamed a Dream: the Susan Boyle Story
description: A biopic of Susan Boyle s journey from a small village in rural Scotland to international fame and fan-fare following her inspiring performance on “Britain’s Got Talent,” the British reality competition series executive produced by Simon Cowell that rocketed her to superstardom.

name: Down and Dirty: The Greatest Laundromat in Ohio
description: When is a laundromat more than a laundromat? How about when it s a bar? Or a venue for the best underground hardcore music in the city? Or when it s a home for a group of outsiders who are proud to not fit in. How about when it s all of that and more? Dirty Dungarees is the unexpected hub of the hardcore scene in Columbus, Ohio, cultivating a community unlike anything else in the city.

name: Cher Meets Rylan
description: The goddess of pop sits down for a fun and in-depth chat with Rylan Clark about her new record, her biggest hits and her incredible life and career. Featuring archive footage from across the decades of Cher s hit records and television appearances, illustrating her glittering music career, her success in film, her iconic fashion choices and the ways she has influenced so many people.

name: Bantu Spaceship en concert aux Trans Musicales de Rennes 2023
Chalk en concert aux Trans Musicales de Rennes 2023
乃木坂46 真夏の全国ツアー2017 FINAL! IN TOKYO DOME
乃木坂46 7th YEAR BIRTHDAY LIVE【完全生産限定Blu-ray盤】
Zemira e Azor - Nationaltheater Mannheim
description: In a lonely palace lives Prince Azor who has been transformed by a vengeful fairy into a beastlike form. When a foreign merchant disturbs the palace peace, the creature-occupant demands a human sacrifice as punishment. Zemira, the merchant’s daughter, is ready to give her life but soon discovers Azor s beastly form hides an altogether different soul. Will love save the day?

name: Ellie Goulding - Baloise Session 2023
description: Ellie Goulding grew up on a council estate in sleepy Herefordshire before getting her enormous talent recognised while at university in the 2000s. Her folk-tinged electropop continues to charm along with her electric stage presence, on show here at Baloise Session 2023.

name: The Mystery of Mr. E
description: Twin brothers John and George Danes are visited by a stranger who knows where they are heading, announces himself as  the murderer  then disappears

name: Good Mornin’ Blues
description: Hosted by B.B. King and produced in 1978; this program documents the history of the blues that sprang from the Mississippi Delta. Rare photos and performances by Big Joe Williams, Houston Stackhouse and Furry Lewis help to weave the story of this music born in the Deep South.

name: Mein Rachmaninow – Sergey Tanin in der Villa Senar
Calxophobia
description: Helen suffers from a rare fear of chalk. One day she feels encroached by several chalk figures in Helsinki and decides to confront her fear. In the Amos Rex museum, she discovers the works of Keith Haring in a catalogue and adapts his style to her needs for catharsis.

name: This Song Father Used to Sing (Three Days in May)
description: The story takes place inside a small kitchen in Bangkok. Every year, for some days in May, a brother and sister get together there to cook and reminisce about their deceased father.

name: SBS INKIGAYO LIVE in TOKYO
description: For the first time in 27 years, SBS s music show "Inkigayo" performs overseas. Shot over two days in October 2023 at the Ariake Arena in Japan, this production includes performances by OH MY GIRL, ATEEZ, Tempest, ZEROBASEONE, NCT Dream, SHINee s Key, (G)I-DLE and the girl group, NiziU, which was launched by JYP in Japan.

name: Hanry en concert aux Trans Musicales de Rennes 2023
Rahill en concert aux Trans Musicales de Rennes 2023
Uche Yara en concert aux Trans Musicales de Rennes 2023
Brittany Davis en concert aux Trans Musicales de Rennes 2023
Todos Por Um
description: A parody of the story The Three Musketeers.

name: Best of Deutschland sucht den Superstar
description: The ratings rose in equal measure to the enthusiasm for the search for a superstar, and both the candidates and the show s jury provided plenty to talk about in Germany. It started with the auditions and spread like wildfire after the intermediate round: Germans are infected by "superstar fever"! The DVD offers the large fan community another look back at the show, from many unpublished pictures, the most embarrassing appearances in the "castings" and exclusive interviews with all the finalists. Exclusive, detailed, emotional and informative!

name: Xmas At The Odeon!
description: Elton John performs on Christmas Eve in this special concert event, broadcast live in 1982 on BBC 2.

name: Belgrade Sound
description: Documentary about Belgrade most prominent rock bands of the early 21st century.

name: HockeyTown Hoedown
description: A new sound makes waves in a quiet small town known for step dancing and fiddle music. Hardcore comes to HockeyTown.

name: Dream - Mask (OFFICIAL VIDEO)
description: I wear a mask with a smile for hours at a time Stare at the ceiling while I hold back what s on my mind And when they ask me how I m doing I say, "I m just fine" And when they ask me how I m doing I say, "I m just fine" But the fact is I can never get off of my mattress And all that they can ask is "Why are you so sad, kid?" (Why are you so sad, kid?) That s what the mask is That s what the point of the mask is So you can see I m tryin  You won t see me cryin  I ll just keep on smilin , I m good (yeah, I m good) And it just keeps on pilin  It s so terrifying But I keep on smilin , I m good (yeah, I m good) I ve been carin  too much for so long Been comparin  myself for so long Been wearin  a smile for so long, it s real So long, it s real, so long, it s real Always bein  judged by a bunch of strange faces Scared to go outside, haven t seen the light in ages But I ve been places So I m okay-ish, so I m okay-ish

name: Muhammad Al Salem A Christmas Night
An Abusada Night
description: Mini documentary about the recently launched girl group from São Paulo, Katy da Voz e as Abusadas, in a concert at Zig Studio.

name: Habana Holiday
description: A man takes his DV cam into the demi-monde of male hustlers in Havana and ends up answering some pointed questions.

name: Streetlight Opus
description: When two buskers find themselves situated on the same busy street corner, a musical battle ensues when the musicians realise that the lively city isn t big enough for the both of them

name: Notes and Notions
description: Gwen Farrar and Billy Mayerl sing two comic songs:  The Old Fashioned Girl  and  He s a Dangerous Man .

name: there was never any love to begin with
description: Originally a TikTok compilation, sculpted into a psychedelic documentary on the loneliness and dark beauty of Los Angeles, California. Slow and meditative, mostly composed of silent shots of street lamps, moving cars and rain, which are occasionally broken up with bursts of music and a climactic digital appearance by Kanye West.

name: Beyond the Noise.
description: An exploration into the benefits of music in uk youth culture. Understanding the comfort it can provide.

name: The Girl with the Incredible Feeling
description: A profile of composer, performer, and author Elizabeth Swados, inter-cutting scenes of the artist at work and in travel with personal reflections and animated depictions of her stories.

name: The Atlanta Rhythm Section Live
description: Live performance recorded in Kentucky 2007.

name: Hovering
description: A hypnotic and singular record of a 2019 concert at Lyttelton Coffee Company with Hob, Richard Dada and Ben Woods Group.

name: Heaven Shall Burn à l Olympia
Power Bank
description: A short film for the song  แบตสำรอง  by BOY PEACEMAKER.

name: The Magician and His Friends
description: The unforgettable classic story for the whole family, in which a lovely young girl, finds happiness through the example of her friends. A film by Jose Romay.

name: Aradhana
description: A village girl who newly joined to the nursing is having a relationship with an civil engineer who works nearby project. The girl gets pregnant before they get married so they decided to abort the child. But it become unsuccessful and they decide to marry before the child is born. Although they both loved their child strongly, later he gets a blood cancer and died. The husband accuse the wife for the death and they become separated. Can they survive without seeing each other?

name: The Sleeping Beauty
description: Lauren Cuthbertson, Sergei Polunin and Claire Calvert star in this true gem from the classical ballet repertory, set to Tchaikovsky s glorious music.

name: Arte Concert - Archive in den Gewächshäusern von Pantin
What Do We Do Now?
description: Lesley and Wesley, comedians awaiting their turn at the Skewball Hippodrome, appoint themselves amateur detectives to find a stolen diamond brooch.

name: It’s a Wonderful Day
description: A dance band takes a holiday in Devon, and discovers some talent amongst the locals.

name: TVFF
description: Fighting a nightmare

name: Interface
description: A scientific experiment at the tail end of WWII has exposed the world to a form of cerebral electricity that renders ghosts and monsters into tangible, living beings.

name: The Hanging City
description: Experimental film "Presence has all the things that life can have in itself. But living as a stranger in today s arena, how much does it desire to communication?

name: Who Can See Forever
description: WHO CAN SEE FOREVER is part concert film, part music documentary and part meditative examination of one of independent music’s most prolific singer-songwriters, Iron & Wine’s Sam Beam.

name: Golpe de Gracia
description: Two radio hosts suffer all kinds of adventures to win a radio contest¸ when one of them¸ attracted by the charms of a beautiful girl¸ finds himself involved in a confusing situation as he goes from being the victim of a robbery to alleged author of the same.

name: Kevin Morby: Harlem River 10
description: A look at the origin and evolution of Harlem River on the tenth anniversary of its release. Featuring an interview with Kevin Morby and performance footage from the last decade.

name: Supertouch and Other People
description: The story about a band from the New York City hardcore scene. Features interviews from members of the band, entourage, and individuals from the NYHC scene. Experience the live setting with some extremely rare footage from the band in their hey day during the late 80s and early 90s. How do you feel?!

name: Blondie at the BBC
description: A trip through the archives to sample the best of Blondie over the years, featuring performances of such hits as Call Me, Atomic, Picture This, Rapture and The Tide Is High.

name: Hearth Room (The Documentary)
description: From the twisted and deranged minds of siblings Angel and Lulu comes a time capsule that spotlights their magical trip to the Poconos Mountains to record their album ‘Hearth Room’. Filmed and produced by Jacob Lazovick (of Voyeur + POWEREDBYWIND), this documentary is an open door into the creative process of Frost Children’s dive into a new era.

name: Gabi Hartmann en concert à la Cigale
Live Pilgrimage in Madrid
description: Japanese instrumental rock band MONO and Spanish film collective Alison collaborate together to create a unique narrative - fusion live music film entitled "Live Pilgrimage in Madrid"

name: GoGo Penguin en concert à Jazz à la Villette 2023
Sixun en concert à Jazz à la Villette 2023
TAEMIN SOLO CONCERT : METAMORPH
description: SHINee’s Taemin’s Beyond LIVE concert “METAMORPH” at Inspire Arena, Incheon, Korea.

name: Sara
description: Sara, A positive girl who can t speak(dumb) and A lonely boy without hope in life accidentally meets and talks through a diary.

name: Piña Colado Por Ti
description: Guy meets his ex-girlfriend in a bar in his attempt to get her back.

name: Mozart:The Requiem from Sarajevo
description: José Carreras and the Sarajevo Philharmonic Orchestra player form Mozart’s Requiem in the bombed out ruins of the Sarajevo city Library.

name: Young Untill I Die
description: No overview found.

name: Hardwicke Circus: The Prison Gig
description: A short, low-budget documentary that follows a small jobbing band from the north of England called  Hardwicke Circus  as they perform a gig and music workshop at  Standford Hill HMP , a men s prison on the Isle of Sheppey in the south of England.  Shot in Ben Archer s fly-on-the-wall  gonzo  style of filmmaking and taken from the band s late-2019 tour of England s south coast, this documentary focuses on the joy of performance and music in an environment that does not often allow such expression. Bookended by short commentary from the band s lead singer Jonny Foster,  Hardwicke Circus: The Prison Gig  is an uplifting ode to the power and necessity of art, even for those that society have deemed not to deserve it.

name: Big, Bigger, Biggest! The Best Of Mr. Big
description: Mr. Big is an American hard rock supergroup formed in Los Angeles, California, in 1988. The band was originally composed of Eric Martin (lead vocals), Paul Gilbert (guitar), Billy Sheehan (bass guitar), and Pat Torpey (drums & percussion). Their songs are often marked by strong vocals and vocal harmonies. Their hits include "To Be with You" (a number-one single in 15 countries in 1992) and "Just Take My Heart". This video compilation was released along with a similar greatest hits CD.

name: Henrik Freischlader bei den Leverkusener Jazztagen 2023
Kudai Live – Tour 2004–2005
description: A documentary following Chilean pop rock band Kudai s journey from an Italian pop cover band called CIAO to their first tour after their debut album Vuelo.

name: Bleach Kiss
description: Found footage worked with bleach and masks.  The title is a play on words between the technique used on the material and the images of the emulsion.  Set to music with a Kiss song performed by The Replacements.

name: THE BOYZ 2nd World Tour: ZENERATION Encore
description: THE BOYZ 2nd World Tour: ZENERATION, The Final in Seoul.

name: Good Luck - Best Wishes
description: Solly is in love with Jane but Jane s father can t afford a big wedding. So he schemes with Solly s father, his business partner, to stage a big quarrel that will prompt Jane and Solly to elope. Complications arise.

name: 时代少年团叁重楼暨出道四周年演唱会中国澳门站
The Naked Carpenter
description: Hannah reveals Joseph s identity as one of Yah s kings and offers him a haven from the world. All of Hannah s prior "assignments" ran off with their Eves naked and uncrowned. Will Joseph follow suit?

name: Francis Comes Alive: The Movie
description: Francis Comes Alive: The Movie is a live concert film of the incredible Neal Francis. Recorded at Thalia Hall in Chicago at a sold out show in March 2023, the film captures Francis at his best with an expanded 11-piece band. Recorded to analog tape and directed by Alec Basse.

name: Noon in Tunisia
description: The two-part film "Noon in Tunisia" by Peter Lilienthal is a meeting of jazz and Arabic music at various public or open-air venues in Tunisia. Under the direction of George Gruntz, European and US jazz musicians play his suite-like composition "Maghreb Cantata", which is based on original Bedouin dances, together with Arab performers. The highlight is the Fazani, a rhythm of Bedouin tribes from the desert region of the Libyan-Tunisian border. The recording took place from 5.5. - 24.5.1969 in and around Tunis.

name: Foo Fighters - Austin City Limits
description: Rock superstars Foo Fighters return to shake up Austin City Limits in an epic hour featuring classics alongside gems from their latest album But Here We Are.  Setlist: Times Like These, No Son Of Mine, Rescued, Under You, La Dee Da, Nothing At All, The Sky is a Neighborhood, The Glass, Aurora, Everlong

name: Live Revolution 21 Haru ~Osaka Jou Hall Saishuu Bi~
description: Live Revolution 21 Haru ~Osaka Jou Hall Saishuu Bi~  was Morning Musume s video release of the final performance of their 2001 spring concert tour Morning Musume CONCERT TOUR 2001 "Live Revolution Haru"It was released on VHS and DVD on June 27, 2001. The DVD sold 185,545 copies, the VHS version sold 89,177 copies.

name: Déambulations : Pomme au Musée des Arts Forains
SILAW: Sa Ilalim ng Lente
description: No one can stop him. Alab is here to show off. The stars are also waiting for him, but... His heart is not as strong as his dreams, especially.  In a story that will inspire us to fulfill our dreams. A story that will give a spark to our dark journeys

name: SCH - Le Concert de l Orange Vélodrome au cinéma
Con-Dom / Smell & Quim / The Haters: The Duchess of York
description: Live at the Duchess of York in Leeds, November 1992. Limited numbered edition VHS with a nylon stocking.

name: Kick the Sofa
description: Amiga demoscene short film that showcases computer animation and music. Made in modern times on old Amiga computers.

name: Pharmageddon
description: Demoscene short film that showcases computer animation, art and music. A demo for a pharmacy sign.

name: Le Petite Tonkinoise
description: Experimental queer short film, showing people dancing to the song "La Petite Tonkinoise".

name: Song of Toledo
description: This merrily musical short film takes a jovial trip across picturesque 1950s Spain aboard the Talgo Express.

name: Jean-Baptiste Guegan : la voix de Johnny, le concert événement
Twinkling Fingers
description: Pianists Charlie Kunz and Mark Hambourg tickle the ivories for our entertainment in this jolly musical short.

name: There s Reason in Rhumba
description: Rhythm and romanticism rules over realism in this recreation of the origins of the rhumba dance

name: The Cure - Live At Corona Capital 2023
description: The Cure perform live at the Corona Capital Festival in Mexico City on 19th November 2023.

name: Cabaret
description: Set during rehearsals for a cabaret show, this short film features singer Rosalind Melville.

name: Nam June Paik
description: Short film about performance, realized when Nam June Paik participated in Karlheinz Stockhausen s piece "Originale" in Cologne in 1961.

name: The Wizard 20Twenty
description: A modern, urbanized reimagining of the classic musical fantasy about a ragtag group of friends who must learn to use their unique gifts to survive.

name: Die magisch Flasch
description: As a young boy, Franco Piccolini receives a magic bottle from a graveyard attendant. He tells him that the bottle once belonged to Captain Rack, a famous pirate who achieved wealth and fame thanks to its magic. Years later, Franco discovers how the bottle seems to work: when he places it on the ground and turns it, it shows him the way to the treasure. So he sets off on an adventurous journey, always following the bottle to find it. Along the way, he meets Luigi Ferrari, a cheerful fellow who lives in a remote mountain hut. Franco uses a trick to persuade him to become his travelling companion. Together they get into all sorts of funny and dangerous situations due to the unpredictable directions the bottle takes them. On their treasure hunt, they open the door to another dimension and meet the pirate Captain Rack. And so disaster takes its course.

name: The Magic Egg
description: The films depicts how people of various character handle the magic egg.

name: Vneba
description: VNEBA featuring Tamada - WINNER OF ELECTRONAUTS XII

name: Katy Perry - MTV Unplugged
description: MTV Unplugged offered an unusual opportunity to showcase Katy Perry s work in an exposed, undercooked way and to reveal just how much of the real her had been part of that flashy presentation. Recorded in New York on July 22, 2009, Katy picked five cuts from One Of The Boys, an unreleased song, and a cover of 2003’s “Hackensack,” by Fountains Of Wayne, to perform in front of a small studio audience.

name: Merle Haggard: Legendary Performances
description: The Legendary Performances collection features nearly two decades of rarely seen performances of Merle in his prime that have since been archived by the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum. Experience the hits through a chronology of vintage live performances such as Branded man (Country Music Holiday, 1968), Mama Tried (Billy Walker s Country Carnival, 1968) and Okie From Muskogee (The Porter Wagoner Show, 1970). From the walls of San Quentin to his free-spirited life as an irreverent and unique voice outside the Nashville establishment to his induction in the Country Music Hall of Fame, Merle Haggard has never left a doubt that he is country s original outlaw.

name: Mai Kuraki & Experience First Live Tour 2001 ETERNAL MOMENT
description: Live concert documentary that was filmed during her "Sokenbicha Natural Breeze 2001 Happy Live" tour. In addition to the live show, it contains extensive backstage and behind-the-scenes footage. It also includes live perfomrance fragments from the 6 venues throughout Japan of her first tour.

name: The Who: Who s Next | Life House
description: The Who s landmark album, Who s Next, in a new remix by Steven Wilson, featuring bonus tracks from the 10 disc super deluxe box set. Includes stereo, 5.1, and Atmos mixes.

name: Plumas - La Wea
description: Plumas finds himself in a dystopian future, in which he meets a beautiful companion, a large, hairy animal who will be his travel companion, escaping from those who want to capture him.

name: May It Fill Your Soul
description: May It Fill Your Soul is a film about Bulgarian traditional music, about the pain of emigration and the promise of immigration, and about a family with a century-long musical history. Bulgaria s astonishingly rich village music traditions include strong women s singing, musical instruments with roots its millennia-old pastoral lifestyle and its 500-year history in the Ottoman Empire, and its lively dancing in additive meters of 5, 7, 9, and 11 beats to the measure. These practices are presented through the lens of a musical family trained during Bulgaria s communist regime (1944-1989) to represent the best that Bulgaria had to offer the world, but who made the wrenching decision in the post-communist period to immigrate to the United States for the sake of their daughters  futures. From that vantage point they have been able to teach their art to, and "fill the souls" of, singers, dancers, musicians, and audiences all over the world.

name: Eurotrauma: Skinny Puppy Live in Europe 1986
description: A hand-filmed 32-minute documentary of the Skinny Puppy s 1988  Head Trauma  tour of Europe by Dwayne Rudolph Goettel. Edited by Nivek Ogre in 2005.

name: Ai Otsuka "Love Is Born" - 5th Anniversary 2008 - at Osaka - Jo Yagai Ongaku-Do on 10th of September 2008
description: Concert film celebrating Otsuka Ai s 5th Anniversary since debut in the music industry. This was held at Osaka-jo Yagai Ongaku-do on September 10th, 2008.

name: 15th anniversary concert 「COLOR OF LIFE」
description: Concert film featuring KOKIA s 15th anniversary concert "COLOR OF LIFE" performed at Orchard Hall in spring 2013.

name: KOKIA 2011 Christmas concert "music like a prayer"
description: Concert film capturing KOKIA s annual Christmas live she performs every December for the first time. This special concert took place and was filmed at Shinagawa Church s Gloria Chapel. This is also the first Christmas concert of KOKIA s to be held in a Church.

name: Lucy Puma - A Gata da Pesada
description: With the explosion of Hip Hop and Rap, three young black musicians battle for space. They cross paths with the São Bento gang, a singing and dancing group led by Thayde and DJ Hum. And also with musicians like Luni, Marisa Orth, Nazi, Fábrica Fagus and many people who play shows at the Mambembe theater.

name: Imen ES - La petite soeur devenue Queen
miwa acoustic live tour 2018 "acoguissimo 47 Todofuken ~ Kan ~"
description: Concert film featuring miwa s acoustic live tour 2018 "acoguissmo 47 Todofuken ~Kan~" held at Yokohama Arena on June 10th, 2018.

name: miwa ARENA tour 2017 "SPLASH WORLD"
description: Concert film featuring the final of miwa s arena tour in 2017 "SPLASH WORLD" held at Saitama Super Arena on June 18, 2017.

name: miwa concert tour 2013 "Delight"
description: It features the concert film held at the Tokyo International Forum on September 15th, 2013 from her second hall concert tour.

name: Fire Dialogues
description: Filmmaker Guillermo Escalon and composer Igor Gandarias are in residence at EMPAC to record the Hudson River journey of Beatriz Cortez’s sculpture Ilopango, the Volcano that Left, for a forthcoming film (2024). The sculpture will sail up the Hudson River by boat from its exhibition at Storm King Art Center to EMPAC for the opening of Shifting Center, where it will be installed for the duration of the exhibition. Shifting Center also features Escalon and Gandarias’ film Rapsodia.

name: Basin Beach
description: A video mixtape for the chronically online. A sensorial acid bath.

name: Hypothetically Murdered
description: In 1931 Shostakovich wrote a full-length score for the Leningrad Music Hall, for a show that involved many of the leading entertainers of the day, as well as dancing girls, a jazz band, a dancing dog, sequences of silent film, simulated air-raids and gas attacks, a lorry, a storm, waiters and waitresses in a luxury restaurant, river nymphs and even a scene in Heaven with the Devil, the Twelve Apostles, the Archangel Gabriel and all the other angels doing a blasphemous knees-up.  The show was naturally a momentary scandal and the score soon disappeared. In 1991 Gerard McBurney reconstructed from the surviving sketches a sequence of 21 of the orchestral numbers to make a hilarious sequence of gallops, saucy polkas, marches and schmoozy waltzes.

name: Dewa: Live in Japan
description: Dewa 19 live concert in japan

name: Ed Sheeran V Adele
description: A head-to-head look at the work of singers Ed Sheeran and Adele. Who will come out on top in this career comparison?

name: György Ligeti: Poème Symphonique For 100 Metronomes
description: Video documentation of György Ligeti’s "Poème symphonique for 100 metronomes," presented by the 21st Century Consort on December 22, 2020 in Washington, D.C. at St. Mark’s Episcopal Church on Capitol Hill.

name: ONE・TWO: YUKI S TOUR 斉藤由貴コンサート
description: Yuki Saito concert in the Tokyo Kousei Nenkin Kaikan

name: Buscando el mar
description: Roger Koza goes back to Hamburg after the pandemic and looks for his old friend Elmar.

name: The Man in the Peace Tower
description: Robert Donnell is a man with an unusual occupation. He is the Carilloneur in the Dominion of Canada Peace Tower in Ottawa. Unseen to the visitors , he serenades them from his room high in the tower with 53 carillon bells ranging in weight from ten pounds to eleven tons.

name: Burka Boogie Woogie
description: The burka is not only an item of clothing, but has also become a symbol for the reprehensible nature of the orthodox Islamic faith: anonymity, submission and oppression of women. In this short graphic dance film, however, the burka has a life of its own and plays with fear of Islam.

name: Maggie Lindemann: SUCKERPUNCH WORLD TOUR
description: Relive the SUCKERPUNCH album with a special world tour concert film.

name: Marcapáxinas (ou como perder o fío da lectura)
Eminem: Count Me In
description: Rapper, record producer, songwriter, and actor, Eminem has a wide range of talents. Despite his struggles, this rap artiste has won the hearts of critics and fans alike, earning more than a dozen Grammy awards.

name: Dance with the Seashells!
description: When the Concert-Hall of a small town vanishes, the young singer Erika teams up with Mehdi the mascot to go find it! What will they find on their journey?

name: Rap de Saia
description: Rap de Saia is a documentary that reports, through the voices and rhymes of the protagonists themselves, part of the historical trajectory of Female Rap in the State of Rio de Janeiro. In addition to its historical trajectory, Rap de Saia brings a collection of themes that leads us to reflect on women in today s society.

name: The Ravioli Movie
description: The conclusion to a never lasting friendship of the ravioli group, filled with emotions, epicness, and glory.  the ravioli movie is nothing less than a masterpiece. a movie that moves each spectator differently but nonetheless moves.

name: plum blossom (revisited) mini-doc
description: A mini-documentary covering the re-recording process behind mxmtoon’s EP “plum blossom”.

name: Batalhas da Ilha
description: MC battles are the basis of Rap and in São Luís, this type of manifestation has been growing organically in different peripheral communities organized by residents and local artists. Even without great incentives, the battles have spread throughout the city and created a network of creative ideas that oxygenate the outskirts.

name: Origem Demo Vídeo
description: Amid the chaos of the city of Fortaleza, Davinci seeks to follow his own paths. Origin is an invitation to the party.

name: Ripe - Live From MGM Music Hall at Fenway
description: Join Ripe for an unforgettable dance party at Boston s MGM Music Hall at Fenway. This sold-out concert features songs from acclaimed albums "Bright Blues" and "Joy in the Wild Unknown," and showcases the talent of these Berklee graduates. With their infectious alternative pop sound, this concert is a testament to why Ripe is considered one of the country s best-kept secrets.

name: HYDE LIVE 2023 (Presented by Rakuten NFT)
description: HYDE LIVE 2023 Presented by Rakuten NFT  is a concert event featuring Japanese rock star HYDE, recorded from his 2023 Japan tour final event. This event was held in Makuhari Messe, Chiba, Japan, on September 10th, 2023.

name: Among Friends: A Musical Travelogue
description: Josh and Kelly go on a road trip across the United States. Along they way, they stop to reconnect with friends and play music together.

name: AGUST D  D-DAY  IN SEOUL FINAL DAY 1
description: SUGA | Agust D TOUR is the first solo tour headlined by SUGA of BTS to promote his debut solo album D-DAY as well as his solo mixtapes Agust D and D-2.

name: Rhapsody In Blue
description: With time-related issues, Tobias ends up losing his job and faces adverse situations throughout the day, where Gershwin s music dictates the emotions of the story.

name: Dr. Demento s 20th Anniversary TV Party
description: Join Dr. Demento as he celebrates twenty years of lovable lunacy, with performances by "Weird Al" Yankovic, Tiny Tim, Bobby "Boris" Pickett and more. Recorded live at the Raymond Theatre in Pasadena, California.

name: Daisi
description: Film Opera with a love triangle on the backdrop of a foreign invasion.

name: Untitled Ghost concert film
description: According to frontman Tobias Forge, “it’s going to be a film with a concert element. So a lot of what you experienced [at the two Los Angeles shows] is going to be part of this project."

name: BTS HOME PARTY
description: BTS HOME PARTY was BTS s second event celebrating their anniversary. This event was broadcast live on V LIVE and the encore stage (last three songs) can only be seen if the person s subscribed to BTS Channel Plus.

name: HAPPY BTS DAY PARTY
description: HAPPY BTS DAY PARTY was BTS s first event celebrating their anniversary. This event was broadcast live on V LIVE for those who bought it.

name: BTS LIVE 花様年華 ON STAGE ～JAPAN EDITION～ AT YOKOHAMA
description: BTS  first solo arena performance.

name: Madeon: Live at Red Rocks
description: A live performance of Madeon s  Good Faith Forever  show at Red Rocks Amphitheatre near Denver, CO.

name: Palestine Pastels & Arabesque Audioviuals: A Muslimgauze Visual Soundscape Series
description: Palestine Pastels & Arabesque Audioviuals , pairs the haunting rhythms of Muslimgauze with a visual odyssey, transporting viewers on a journey through time, conflict, and the indomitable spirit of its people.

name: Tangerine Drum Machine
description: After a traumatic experience, a young musician loses both her unique condition and playing abilities.

description: 01 People = Shit 02 Liberate 03 Eeyore 04 Disasterpiece 05 Purity 06 Eyeless 07 New Abortion 08 The Heretic Anthem 09 Spit It Out 10 Wait and Bleed 11 (sic) 12 Surfacing

name: Frank Skinner on George Formby
description: George Formby was a huge star of stage and film. In his heyday he was as big as The Beatles, earning vast sums of money on stage and starring in films which broke box office records. Formby s trademark ukulele still inspires millions of dedicated fans, including comedian and performer Frank Skinner, who believes Formby was the greatest entertainer of his time.  Playing the ukulele and performing the songs that keep the Formby legend alive today, Skinner follows the music hall star s extraordinary rise to fame and fortune, explores his worldwide popularity and reveals the ruthless exploitation that surrounded his sudden and tragic death.

name: Blank Slate
description: A short film made up of abstract vignettes and surreal imagery.

name: Der Hammer
description: A musical about a woman getting work done on her house.

name: Cult of Color: Call to Color
description: One of Ballet Austin’s most innovative collaborations. In a most unusual ballet in two acts, we take a mythological journey with Sesom, a vegan priest who is thrust into an epic voyage to bring color to the black and white underworld. Trenton Doyle Hancock’s comic book-style characters intrigue and enthrall with humorous, original choreography by Artistic Director Stephen Mills and an equally outrageous and inventive score from composer Graham Reynolds. Choreographer, writer, composer and visual artist come together in a creative alliance that is sure to leave audiences delighted and exhilarated.

name: Asylum Street Spankers: Re-Assembly
description: Re-Assembly documents the monumental Tenth Anniversary Reunion of the Legendary Asylum Street Spankers. On August 14, 2004, twenty-one past and present Spankers performed twenty-nine of their best-loved songs before two sold out audiences at the Texas Union Theatre in their hometown of Austin. These concerts were filmed, then edited together to create the definitive three-hour portrait of this milestone concert by God’s favorite band.

name: Mata Hari at the Moulin Rouge
description: The year 1917.  Paris, once the glamorous city of light, is suffering amidst the chaos that is World War I. France, Great Britain and Russia (the allies) are fighting against Germany and the Austrian-Hungarian empire (the enemy). To heal the wounds of war, a beautiful dancer Mata Hari captivates all of Europe, her mysterious dance putting her at the centre of attention within high society.  Mata Hari s status as a celebrity allows her to travel between the warring countries making her a valuable asset to the French army and one day a visit from George Ladoux of the French military intelligence changes her life forever.  Meanwhile she begins a relationship with a young French pilot, Armand Gilot, but all is not as it seems....

name: Vi är The Ark
description: Intimate documentary following the rock band The Ark on tour.

name: The Death of Jack Astor
description: Documentation of the legendary all ages hardcore punk show held at a Jack Astor s Sports Bar & Grill during operating business hours in St. John s, Newfoundland. Featuring performances from local hardcore heavyweights Carnage, GlitterGlue, Buck 50 d, and the debut performance of Life Jolt.

name: Stripper Magician
description: The all-powerful Stripper Magician shows you her plethora of magical powers

name: Coco Reo Maori
description: Te Reo Māori version of Pixar s Oscar-winning family musical about a boy who travels to the land of the dead.  Despite his family s baffling generations-old ban on music, Miguel dreams of becoming an accomplished musician like his idol, Ernesto de la Cruz. Desperate to prove his talent, Miguel finds himself in the stunning and colorful Land of the Dead following a mysterious chain of events. Along the way, he meets charming trickster Hector, and together, they set off on an extraordinary journey to unlock the real story behind Miguel s family history.

name: Skinny Puppy: Doomsday
description: Pro-shot live recording of the now infamous gig of legendary industrial band Skinny Puppy. Performed in Dresden at Germany s Doomsday Festival. This performance marked the reunion of former bandmates, cEvin Key and Nivek Ogre. It was the first Skinny Puppy concert since 1992, first in Europe since 1988, and first ever in the former East Germany.

name: Retro Boom
description: "Retro Boom" is a documentary film shot in the period from 2013 to 2019, before COVID-19 pandemic. Filming takes place in the clubs: Vintage industrial Bar, Route 66, Pepermint, KSET, Johann Franck (all in Zagreb) and festivals in Medulin (Tear it up) , Zagreb (Zagreb Vintage Festival), Sveti Martin na Muri (Trash n burn). It is a film that brings a cross-section of an interesting retro scene that has existed in Croatia for years. In the last ten years, the vintage (retro) scene has expanded greatly among the young and among the middle generation, it can almost be said that it has become fashionable, but by no means mainstream. The film follows original rockabilly and rock n roll bands, fashion, clothes, pin-up girls, barbers, old furniture, old items, motorbikes and a lot more – all of it gathered through interviews and events of the past years.

name: Drum Duel
description: A story about a boy who signs up for drum lessons, not knowing that his teacher turns out to be an amateur and becomes jealous of her own student s drumming skills.

name: Microphones in 2020
description: An album-length short film released to correspond with the release of the "Microphones in 2020" album. Distinct from traditional music videos, Elverum described it as a "lyric video", as well as "a slideshow, a powerpoint presentation, a flip book and a documentary". The video consists of 761 printed photos taken by Elverum, which are synched to the album s lyrics; at times, the video features the people and places discussed in the lyrics. It took Elverum three weeks to produce.

name: Malvatrem
description: The music video, and short film, by singer Slipmami for her track Malvatrem.

name: Enigma ao Vivo - Penha Club 1991
description: Enigma Performance

name: Enigma ao Vivo - Penha Club 1991
description: 1991 performance by Enigma

name: Mon Laferte - Sola con mis monstruos EN VIVO
Chakori
description: Film starring Nadeem Baig and Shabana.

name: Jerry Williams - 30 bast i branschen
description: Documentary celebrating the first 30 years of Jerry Williams  music career.

name: Kaandorp Zingt Kaandorp
description: TV adaptation of Brigitte Kaandorp s theatre tour  CD Opname , in wich the Dutch comedian Brigitte Kaandorp sings a selection from her songs, accompanied by 9 musicians.

name: Mastodons: The First Encounter
description: Join Anna and her friend Colby, the mouse, in an online adventure as they encounter the Mastodons: Musclehead, Tangler, Blazer and Crusher. They are fighting a fire that threatens two children and a nearby school!

name: Line Dancing For Seniors
description: Line dancing is fast becoming a popular activity among senior citizens. This presents line dancing from an instructional, yet entertaining perspective. Join Dr. Grant Longley, an expert Line Dance instructor, as he guides a class step-by-step through five dances.

name: Niall Horan: Inside Out
description: Niall Horan first rose to fame in 2010 when he auditioned as a solo artist on the British X factor. His X Factor journey led him on a path that would see him become a member of the boy band One Direction. He quickly established himself as a fan favourite as One Direction started to become a global phenomena. As One direction started to become global superstars, it was Harry Styles who was expected to become the bands leading man, but as their popularity grew, it was apparent that the boy from Ireland was by far the most popular member, especially in the USA. As One Direction establish their name as the biggest boy band of all time, we invite you to follow the story of their leading man …Niall Horan.

name: Minami Kuribayashi LIVE TOUR 2013 TIGHT KNOT
description: Kuribayashi Minami s concert film featuring her 2013 TIGHT KNOT Tour held at Tokyo Dome on June 2013.

name: Kuribayashi Minami 10th Anniversary Live "stories"
description: Kuribayashi Minami s 10th Anniversary Live Tour "stories" performed at Nakano Sunplaza on October 30, 2011.

name: Minami Kuribayashi Live 2010 "mind touch"
description: Kuribayashi Minami s live performance for her "mind touch" 2010 tour at Shibuya AX on June 26, 2010.

name: Minami Kuribayashi LIVE TOUR 2011 miracle fruit
description: Kuribayashi Minami s live performance from her LIVE TOUR 2011 at Shibuya AX on May 1, 2011.

name: The Ending Goes Forever: The Screamfeeder Story
description: The Ending Goes Forever: The Screamfeeder Story is a feature-length documentary about a band that emerged from the cultural explosion of the 1990’s that changed Brisbane forever, and the story of a band that continues to forge their way through Australian culture.  Examining the extraordinary musical career of this legendary Brisbane band that overcame adversity to carve a successful career across three decades, whilst maintaining control of their music and forming an unbreakable bond between members. All great friendships start as accidents – but for over thirty years, the creative partnership at the heart of Screamfeeder has remained true to its original inspiration. Featuring iconic songs, behind-the-scenes footage and interviews, The Ending Goes Forever: The Screamfeeder Story is a celebration of unique talent, community and friendship.

name: Andre Previn at the BBC
description: Charismatic conductor and composer Andre Previn looks back at some of his greatest television moments, from thrilling performances of orchestral favourites by Mozart and Berlioz to his classic comedy encounter with Morecambe and Wise.

name: Darkwood Dub: Live at Exit
description: One of the most famous alternative electro-rock bands from Belgrade live at Exit 2004.

name: SunnyBell & the Florida Dairy "Moo"sical
description: SunnyBell is a little calf who wants to have an important role on her dairy farm. With the help of the Holstein Sisters, a talking milk bottle, and a little boy named Clyde, she learns all about dairy farming in Florida.

name: Wallsocket
description: Wallsocket is a album video that accompanies the American musician underscore s sophomore album of the same name.

name: Koki Nakano ft. Tess Voleter - Arte Concert Festival 2023
Alice Phoebe Lou - Arte Concert Festival 2023
Besoin d air?
description: Noé, a bartender who dreams of being an artist, is about to reveal himself.

name: Glay: Survival
description: It shows a section of a Japanese teenage girl s life and depicts how she s living aimlessly without a care. She later gets reminded of her childhood and the dreams she had, trying to change her current ways.

name: blur at the BBC
description: Over the years, Damon, Graham, Alex and Dave have helped to change the face of British music, constantly evolving and leaving musical rivals in their wake. This collection of blur’s greatest performances on the BBC delivers all the hits and more, capturing the band’s crowd-pleasing side through fan favourites like Country House, Parklife, and Girls and Boys, as well as their more sensitive and soulful side with tracks including Coffee + TV, Beetlebum, Tender and Out of Time.

name: Lulu at the BBC
description: A trip through the BBC archives for this chance to ‘Shout’ about one of the greatest, best-loved and most enduring entertainers – Lulu.  This collection of her most popular hits, covers and classics features magic moments from the 1960s right up to recent years and performances on a huge range of shows, including her own multiple series and TV specials that were a hallmark of the BBC’s light entertainment schedules.  This compilation also sees Lulu duetting with a variety of big name singers, including Neil Diamond, Bill Withers, Shirley Bassey and Al Green, and features iconic songs like To Sir with Love, The Man with the Golden Gun and the Bowie-penned The Man Who Sold the World.

name: Paul Weller: BBC Four Sessions
description: In an exclusive BBC4 session filmed at BBC Television Centre, Paul Weller performs numbers from his album 22 Dreams, solo hits including From the Floorboards Up and Peacock Suit, and a couple of classics from The Jam s back catalogue.  Weller performs with his regular five-piece band and is joined on some numbers by the Wired Strings and a brass section. He also has special guests, including Oasis guitarist Gem Archer on Echoes Round the Sun, fiddle player Eliza Carthy on Wild Wood and Where er You Go and Blur guitarist Graham Coxon on Black River.

name: Yukari Tamura LOVE ♡ LIVE 2012 *I Love Rabbit*
description: Yukari Tamura LOVE LIVE *I Love Rabbit* [Blu-ray] / Yukari Tamura This Blu-ray includes the concert at Yokohama Arena on February 26, 2012, which was the last leg of the "Yukari Tamura LOVE LIVE *I Love Rabbit*" live tour that started at the end of January 2012 with 8 shows in 6 locations throughout Japan.

name: Their Story Documentary: Riley Kernick
description: An independent short film documentary directed by and starring high school students that focuses on life passions, music, childhood, and the shaping of a modern teen (Riley Kernick).

name: Dietro la porta, sotto la coperta
University Reformed Church | About Us
description: In this welcome video Pastor Kevin DeYoung lays out what we want to be about in everything we do at University Reformed Church: That "the Word of God is all the power and all the hope we have, but praise God it is enough."

name: It’s Never Fair, Always True… The Film
description: A visual album for the musical artist JAWNY’s 2022 album “It’s Never Fair, Always True”

name: Oregon Country
