description: Windows demoscene short film that showcases computer animation and music.

name: x14
description: MS-DOS demoscene short film that showcases computer animation and music.

name: Caero
description: MS-DOS demoscene short film that showcases computer animation and music.

name: Scream
description: MS-DOS demoscene short film that showcases computer animation and music.

name: De La Soul - Me, Myself & I
description: With their clever, surrealistic lyrics, inventive use of sampling and incorporating an eclectic mix of reggae, funk, jazz, fashion and psychedelia into their sound, New York-based DE LA SOUL are one of the most original and influential groups on the hip hop scene. Hailed on their arrival on the scene in 1989 as the future of hip hop, De La Soul were quickly perceived as the leaders of a contingent of New York-based alternative rappers who dubbed themselves The Native Tongues Posse. This movement for a while looked as if it was going to eclipse hardcore hip hop in terms of popularity. This concert, filmed at the 1997 Lokerse Festival, features their big hits  Me, Myself And I  (with its sample of Funkadelic s  (Not Just) Knee Deep ),  Ring, Ring, Ring  and  Breakadawn .

name: Spring Awakening: Filmed Live on Astral Theater
description: Spring Awakening is a coming-of-age rock musical with music by Duncan Sheik and a book and lyrics by Steven Sater. It is based on the 1891 German play Spring Awakening by Frank Wedekind. Set in late 19th-century Germany, the musical tells the story of teenagers discovering the inner and outer tumult of adolescent sexuality. In the musical, alternative rock is employed as part of the folk-infused rock score.

name: Netta: Queen of Eurovision
description: Follow Netta: Queen of Eurovision through her celebrations after victory.

name: Count Basie Jam 75 - Live In Montreux
description: Count Basie Jam Session at the Montreux Jazz Festival 1975, also referred to as Basie Jam, is a live album by pianist/bandleader Count Basie recorded in 1976 and released by the Pablo label.

name: PittyNando: As Suas, As Minhas e As Nossas Ao Vivo
CeCe Winans: Live in the Throne Room
description: Recorded before an enthusiastic crowd of worshippers at Cornerstone Church in Madison, Cece Winans and her electrifying five-piece band and singers presented a set list that include music from her praise and worship CD "Throne Room" as well as popular songs from her vast repertoire.

name: Ainbusk Singers: Från När till fjärran
description: Live performance by the group Ainbusk Singers.

name: Stikkan om Stikkan
description: Legendary Swedish song writer and ABBA s manager Stikkan Anderson tells the story of his life in his own words.

name: Dark Side Cowboys: Observance
description: Dark Side Cowboys join forces with the dancers from Swedish Dark Dance Society to bring you a one time live performance!  The show contains 11 songs from the DSC-catalogue, many of them never before played live and some in new versions. DSC will also be joined by fellow musicians and have invited a number of special guests.

name: Badinerie z II Suity orkiestrowej h-moll BWV 1067
The Spider
description: Refusing to leave his place of work, a projectionist finds himself facing a crowd that threatens to destroy the cinema hall.

name: My Music, My Roots: ANAVITÓRIA
description: For Ana Caetano and Vitória Falcão, Tocantins  city of Araguaína is one of the most special places in the world. They both grew up there and where they received their musical education before, they even knew each other. They have since moved on to become one of the biggest names in Brazilian music.

name: Images for music
description: Images "inspired" from music by Bernard Benoit

name: Stars Will Fall
description: Sunrise and sunset overlayered to Duster s "Stars Will Fall".

name: Enter the Cowboy
description: This 13 minute short, is a genre mix between spaghetti westerns and hong-kong martial arts.

name: League of Legends: Warriors
description: We are Warriors.

name: Most of All, I Love Me
description: The songs "The 16th Sheep" and "This Kid Is Me", along with the children s songs of Arik Einstein, Chava Alberstein, Matti Caspi and others, have long been Israeli classics. Almost everyone can quote at least a line or two from "The Prettiest Girl in the Kindergarten", "Closed Kindergarten", "Lightning and Thunder", and "How is a Song Born"; Or close your eyes and see in your mind s eye the painted windows in the series "And This Kid", in which Yehuda Atlas told us in honest and touching verses, what the world of a child really looks like.  Through interviews with Yehonatan Geffen, Yehuda Atlas, Yoni Rechter, Chava Alberstein, Matti Caspi and others, the film brings the untold story of the creation of the children s songs we grew up with. Along with the interviews, home movies and archive materials are shown, and the viewer embarks on a musical journey to the early days of the "me" generation.

name: Grateful Dead Meet-Up At The Movies 2023
description: A year after Brent Mydland s passing, the Grateful Dead returned to the summer stadium circuit, playing Chicago s Soldier Field for the first time, with two keyboard players filling the seat Brent left vacant. Bruce Hornsby and Vince Welnick’s presence and musical contributions reinvigorated and revitalized the Grateful Dead, and the inspiration of the Dead s playing was palpable. On a Saturday night in front of 60,000 fans, the Dead played what is often considered one of the greatest shows of the Bruce-Vince era, up there with the second Giants Stadium show from a few days earlier. The Soldier field show was filled with favorites, including “Shakedown Street,”“Brown-Eyed Women,” “Playing In The Band,” “Terrapin Station,” and “Dark Star.” From the original six-camera video feed that appeared on the stadium s big screens and the pristine soundboard audio, Chicago 6/22/91 is an incredible performance start-to-finish.

name: Harry Belafonte in Concert
description: Harry Belafonte live at the Sankei Hall, Tokyo, Japan, 18 July 1960. Setlist: Did You Hear About Jerry, Gotta Travel On, Suzanne, John Henry, Man Smart (Woman Smarter), All My Trials, Mama Look a Boo Boo, Cu Cu Ru Cu Cu Paloma, The Marching Saints, Hava Nageela, Jamaica Farewell, I Know Where I m Going, Day-O (The Banana Boat Song), La Bamba, Matilda, Sakura

name: Garage Band Basics
description: A band of friends try to jam out their song in the garage, hijinks ensue before they can do so.

name: Severed Heads: If I ve Told You Once I ve Told You a 1,000 Times
description: Detail from 1987 Australian tour, a collection of music videos from the abstract industrial group.

name: February 2022
description: Wah and Yee are two young strangers who live next to each other in subdivided units. In February 2022, at the peak of the pandemic, they first become aware of each other’s existence when both are tested positive for COVID-19 and are required to self-isolate at home. The two soon form a bond through music, rekindling their passion for life. Like the partition between the two units is no barrier against the flow of music, social isolation does not bar the growing affection between them. But when the quarantine ends, they become hesitant: Will the magic survive beyond the protective/restrictive wall? A pandemic and local version of Begin Again (2013), the two characters bare their hearts as they chase their dreams amid struggles through music and lyrics.

name: Seiko Live  97 My Story
description: Seiko Live  97 My Story is Matsuda Seiko s 14th live video release. It was filmed at Osaka-jo Hall on July 5, 1997. The concert was re-released in DVD format in 2000 and 2003.

name: The Earth Voice Night
description: A musical night in which the fans of the late Talal Maddah are waiting for the largest concert by a group of artists in Riyadh, in honor of the artist s immortal works during his long artistic career.

name: Rokki Diggari
description: A collection of rock performances interspersed with the antics of a young "Rock n Roll digger"

name: 0009: The Sharks Make Contact
description: In the sharks  second adventure, a shark s refusal to return a glass of pesto leads to a terrorist crisis.

name: Soul(Signs): Opera
description: A series of three short films exploring the intersection of opera and American Sign Language, starring some of today’s most acclaimed Deaf and signing performers. Created by Up Until Now Collective.

name: Years of Pilgrimage: The Wandering Soul of Franz Liszt / Fashionable Empire
description: YEARS OF PILGRIMAGE: Franz Liszt was a virtuoso pianist that took early nineteenth-century Europe by storm. He conquered the Parisian salons with passionate performances marked by excellent technique and handsome features that became the downfall of many women. But what was he truly after? The musical narrates the story of Liszt s early years, and his pilgrimage across Europe in an attempt to find a place where his soul could belong, focusing on the romance with the Countess Marie d Agoult, and his greatest friend and rival, Chopin.  FASHIONABLE EMPIRE: A revue that transforms the stage into the "Empire" where the pioneering fashionistas of our time gather. The stylish array of scenes will enchant the audience, at times with the cool atmosphere, and at times with the hot beats. While focusing on the sophisticated and metropolitan appeal of top star Yuzuka Rei this revue also shows off the unique, scintillating members of Flower Troupe through many groovy scenes.

name: RAY Z Music Live ~STRAHL~
description: The one-night-only special live stage event "RAY Z MUSIC LIVE-STRAHL" held on September 9, 2022 at SELENEB2 in Shirokane-Takanawa, featuring songs from Taito s iconic shooting game "Ray" series, was fully recorded. The performers are Taito sound team ZUNTATA, former ZUNTATA member and DJ, COSIO, the creator of the RAY Z series soundscape, TAMAYO, and vocalist Cyua s tribal techno unit "BETTA FLASH". The genre-defying performances of these artists will usher in a new era for the RAY Z sound.

name: Falcom jdk Band 2011 Summer Live in Nicofarre
description: The "Falcom jdk band 2011 Summer Live in Nicofarre" was held on August 12 at Nicofarre in Roppongi, Tokyo. This USB flash drive contains the complete live performance of the first part of the event, and was sold on the day of the event.

name: Kiko Loureiro - The White Balance
description: Recorded live at the Ibirapuera Auditorium (São Paulo, Brazil) on June 14th 2013.

name: Alicia Keys - Landmarks Live in Concert
description: Landmarks Live in Concert rebroadcasts Friday, June 23 at 10PM with a native New Yorker from Hell’s Kitchen, Grammy Award-winning artist, Alicia Keys.  Her collaboration with Jay Z, “Empire State of Mind,” instantly became the City’s newest anthem.  In this debut Landmarks Live special recorded over a one-year period, Alicia’s love affair with New York continues as she performs on City’s world famous Circle Line harbor tour and in Harlem’s Apollo Theater.

name: Lohengrin: Wenn ich im Kampf für dich siege
description: Tonbild (Sound Picture) for the duet "Wenn ich im Kampf für dich siege" from the first act of Richard Wagner s opera "Lohengrin".

name: Symphonie Nr. 3 Es-Dur opus 55 (Eroica) von Ludwig van Beethoven
This Is a F*cking Dream
description: A documentary following Austrian indie band Bilderbuch on their first tour in the United States.

name: Tuyu Live Tour 2022
description: Live concert from the japanese band Tuyu.

name: DOUBLE BEST LIVE We R&B TOUR FINAL @ STUDIO COAST
description: DOUBLE BEST LIVE We R&B TOUR FINAL @ STUDIO COAST is DOUBLE s first concert DVD, featuring footage from her performance at the Shinkiba STUDIO COAST on July 31, 2008.

name: LIVING WITH A GHOST
description: Features the concert held by Chihiro Onitsuka at Tokyo Bunkamura Orchard Hall on November 17, 2020. She performed new song "Kakikake no Tegami," ones performed live for the first time, "Dining Kitchen," "End of the world," and more.

name: Dr. Devious & The Wisemen: In Yer Face in Cyberspace (VR3 - Hardcore Style)
description: Megamix of tunes and FX from VR1 and VR2 - hardcore style.

name: ULTIMATE CRASH  02 LIVE AT BUDOKAN
description: ULTIMATE CRASH  02 LIVE AT BUDOKAN is Onitsuka Chihiro s second live DVD, and is a recording from her one-night show on November 5, 2002 at the Nippon Budokan. It featured songs from her first three albums (although the last had not yet been released) and one cover.

name: CRADLE ON MY NOISE L*I*V*E -LIVE INSOMNIA VIDEO EDITION
description: CRADLE ON MY NOISE L*I*V*E -LIVE INSOMNIA VIDEO EDITION is Onitsuka Chihiro s first live DVD, and consists mostly of songs from her Insomnia era. Both versions of "Gekkou" sung were close to the album version arrangements, with the difference being that the first time singing the song she started acapella. It was shot at SHIBUYA-AX on April 28, 2001.

name: The Cotton-Eyed Joes
description: The Joes of the Quad hear the war cry and take arms.

name: Gado Gado
description: Wahid provides a brief account of his life beginning with his move to the city in search for employment after persuasion from his girlfriend, Rahmah.  He soon finds himself caught in a host of sticky situations as he navigates towards finding steady employment.  Gado Gado is one of the 91 sole-surviving Cathay-Keris Malay Classics film titles made during Singapore’s Golden Cinema era from the 1950s to early 1970s, and preserved by the Asian Film Archive. In 2014, the collection was inscribed onto the UNESCO Memory of The World Asia-Pacific Register, a list of endangered library and archive holdings. At 35 minutes long, the film is the only musical variety short from the Cathay-Keris catalogue.

name: The Farewell Song
description: Documentary tribute to the Egyptian singer Abdel Halim Hafez produced in 1977 consisting of archive images of the singer during his visit to Paris in September 1974, joined by fictional scenes which take the form of a journalistic investigation. A little-known film in the filmography of Ahmed Rachedi who during this Parisian period will direct another feature film that we would very much like to see again: "A Finger in the Gear" (1973), on a screenplay by Rachid Boudjedra. The credits and some images of "La chanson de l Adieu", released in France in December 1981 in the famous Luxor hall in Paris where more than 5,000 spectators came to see it.

name: Blind Melon: Live in Chattanooga
description: Blind Melon performs a live set at Rhythm & Brews in Chattanooga, TN on March 12, 2008.

name: Blind Melon: Intimate and Interactive
description: Blind Melon s live performance and interviews on MuchMusic s "Intimate & Interactive" series on September 12, 1995. Songs include No Rain, Lemonade, Galaxie, Toes Across the Floor, and more.

name: Wars Go by, Humans Stay
description: 20 years after the concert that marked the first performance of a Serbian artist in post-war Bosnia, Đorđe Balašević returned to Sarajevo. With new songs and unforgettable memories. An emotional two-night performance opened the question – how much has changed in the previous two decades?

name: Verdi: Macbeth
description: David McVicar s production of Verdi s 1847 opera Macbeth.

name: Parkway Drive: Wacken Open Air
description: Setlist: 01. Wishing Wells 02. Prey 03. Carrion 04. Vice Grip 05. Karma 06. Cemetery Bloom 07. The Void 08. Idols and Anchors 09. Dedicated 10. Absolute Power 11. Writings On The Wall 12. Shadow Boxing 13. Wild Eyes 14. Chronos 15. Crushed 16. Bottom Feeder

name: Jason Molina - Farewell Transmission
description: Secretly Canadian presents Farewell Transmission - an archival time capsule to celebrate the life and music of singer/ songwriter Jason Molina, spanning the years 1997-2017. Farewell Transmission welcomes viewers to dive into a cinema collage including Secretly Canadian video files, fan recordings, and unearthings from dark corners of the internet, to remember and rejoice in all the incarnations of Jason s beloved career including: Songs: Ohia, Magnolia Electric Co. as well as his solo work.

name: Nutter in the Night
description: A lonely figure does a little dance.

name: Lauriete - 25 Anos de Louvor e Adoração
Totality
description: A unique look at total eclipses, capturing the experience within the scenery of a wide range of settings around the planet, from ancient ruins to city skylines. Totality is constantly growing as a film, as it represents "a lifelong dance with the Moon s shadow". Thus far the film has been shot on location in Venezuela, France, Turkey, China and Easter Island. Mallery also composes the original score for each segment as the film progresses.

name: Frenzy of Exultations
description: A point of view on the intimate sensations of a woman.

name: Whisper s counterpoint
description: Maia is a young musician, who suffers a creative crisis. She seeks to overcome it through forced practice until she receives unexpected help.

name: Anathema: The Optimist
description: 【The Optimist】The album begins with the first song "32.63N 117.14W", which is a landmark located on a beach on the west coast of the United States, and it is the place where the protagonist of the story was last seen. The concept of the new album comes from Anathema’s earlier work [A Fine Day To Exit]. Lead guitarist Daniel Cavanagh explained: "The protagonist of the story suddenly disappeared. Where did he go? Did he start a new life or start a new life? Knocked down by fate, not accounted for, and no one knows his whereabouts." Album producer Tony Doogan [Mogwai, Belle & Sebastian, Super Furry Animals] suggested recording the album with a full orchestra, which is also Anathema A method that has not been tried in many years. Lead singer Vincent Cavanagh said: "Tony wanted to capture the drama of the band, the tension that can only be found when all the members are playing together face to face, and the results are quite admirable."

name: From her to eternity
description: From her to eternity portrays the contained anger of a rock artist. The combustion of the cigarette transforms melancholy and frustration into the smoke that shoots from her mouth, from her towards the sadness that drowns her behind the scenes minutes before going on stage, from her, to eternity.

name: Shirley Carvalhaes - Tudo Sobre Mim (Ao Vivo)
Darkness
description: When a mysterious girl living far away from human civilization is kidnapped by the slick and incredibly handsome man of pure evil, she must learn to trust in a young boy scout to keep her safe from the Darkness of the Night.

name: The Ostrich Has Run Away
description: Shui Yuan take a biting look at Chinese society, at the ostrich’s blind rush to freedom and at the social media frenzy surrounding it. The music video backs it up with bold, striking, black-and-white graphics and collage, showing an age of information overload — but always returning to that image of the running ostrich at the center. (IRL This incident took place in Anqing back in 2021, when an ostrich escaped its enclosure and ran through the city. It traveled over 12 miles and became a social media sensation in China, only to die tragically of exhaustion.

name: TOUR 2007 "Thinking Out Loud" Final at Nihon Budokan
description: TOUR 2007 "Thinking Out Loud" Final at Nihon Budokan" is the fifth DVD and third concert DVD released by BONNIE PINK. It includes footage from her "Thinking Out Loud" Tour finale at the Nippon Budokan.

name: TOUR 2005 "Golden Tears"
description: TOUR 2005 "Golden Tears" is the fourth DVD and second concert DVD released by BONNIE PINK. It was recorded at the Tokyo Kosei Nenkin Hall in October 23, 2005. The first press comes with bonus off-shot footage, the opening movies and commentary.

name: ayaka LIVE TOUR 2012 "The beginning" ~Hajimari no Toki~
description: ayaka LIVE TOUR2012 "The beginning" ~Hajimari no Toki~ is the third DVD (third live video DVD) and second Blu-ray released by ayaka.

name: Aoyama Thelma TOUR 2009 "DIARY"
description: Aoyama Thelma s first DVD release which contains her "DIARY" tour.

name: Angela Aki Concert Tour 2014 TAPESTRY OF SONGS - THE BEST OF ANGELA AKI in Budokan 0804
description: Angela Aki s  last concert before her hiatus held at Nippon Budokan on August 4, 2014.

name: HOME SWEET HOME "5YEARS" ~Best Hit & All Request~ in Budokan + Awa no MY KEYS ~Piano Hikigatari Live in Asty Tokushima~
description: Angela Aki s performance at Budokan to commemorate the 5th anniversary of her career. Also contains footage of her performance in her hometown, Tokushima

name: ANGELA AKI Concert Tour 2009 ANSWER LIVE
description: Concert film performed at Tokyo International Forum for her ANSWER tour.

name: Angela Aki MY KEYS 2006 in Budoukan
description: Angela Aki MY KEYS 2006 in Budoukan is the first live DVD released by Angela Aki. It includes footage from her December 26th, 2006 performance at the Budokan and behind-the-scenes footage as bonus video. The song "Sakurairo" had been composed especially for the occasion. The concert includes three covers: "We Are the Champions", "We Will Rock You" (both Queen covers) and "TRAIN-TRAIN", a cover of THE BLUE HEARTS.

name: Viva Edy! The Story of an Indestructible Music
description: Edy Martinez, the story of the evolution of Latin jazz and Salsa during the 50s in New York, seen through a Colombian musician, who today can walk among the crowds, whose don´t recognizing his immense legacy.

name: Take Away Phoenix
description: "Take Away Phoenix" is a 21 minutes movie where you can see the band Phoenix playing four songs for La Blogotheque s Take Away Shows, in a single movie.

name: Poison Idea: Live in Belgium
description: Formed in 1980, POISON IDEA became a household name in the hardcore/punk scenes early in their career, and are known as one of the most notoriously in-your-face acts in the American musical underworld, with an enraged, high-energy live set even more rambunctious than the massive roster of singles, EPs, full-length studio and live releases and more, across a realm of labels including Pusmort, Tim/Kerr, Epitaph, Farewell, TKO, Southern Lord, and their own Fatal Erection. They’ve been an incredibly influential act to major performers including Nirvana, Pantera, Napalm Death, Machine Head, Eyehategod, Emperor, Turbonegro and an endless list of others. In 2019, Poison Idea performed at Leperfest in Belgium, mixing classics and newer material.

name: Johnny Mathis - Gold
description: Johnny Mathis is the popular singer-songwriter who began his career with a string of hit singles before going on to achieve further success as an album artist, with dozens of his albums achieving gold or platinum status and an impressive 73 making the US Billboard charts. Decades after his initial success, Mathis remains a much admired figure and continues to be a popular concert attraction today.

name: Magma - À la croisée des temps
Christian Vander, un homme, une batterie
Manuel Carrasco: Me dijeron de pequeño
Ongaku to Watashi
description: Tomoyo Harada live at Bunkamura Orchard Hall.

name: Hirano Aya 2nd LIVE TOUR 2009 "Speed Star Tour" LIVE DVD
description: Hirano Aya s 2nd Live Tour promoting her second album Speed Star.

name: ayumi hamasaki COUNTDOWN LIVE 2021-2022 A ~23rd Monster~
description: Ayumi Hamasaki s COUNTDOWN Tour live 2021 to 2022, which took place on New Years Eve and was released as a special bonus disc on her ASIA TOUR ~24th Anniversary special @PIA ARENA MM~.

name: ayumi hamasaki DOME TOUR 2001 A
description: ayumi hamasaki DOME TOUR 2001 A is the third concert DVD released by Hamasaki Ayumi.

name: Grand Corps Malade en concert - Mesdames
Nino Bravo: vivir
description: An account of the life and work of Spanish singer and songwriter Nino Bravo (1944-73), a brilliant and charismatic artist with a portentous voice whose intense flame was extinguished too soon.

name: Bernard Lavilliers au Zénith de Paris
Outtakes From the Life of a Bitter Old Man
description: An old man is looking for his place in the world which seems have let him behind. But who are the boys with their stockings?

name: A Song For Scotland
description: How do you write a great Eurovision song? How did a made-up band from Glasgow end up on stage in San Marino as part of their official Eurovision selection process? Part travelogue, part comedy entertainment with a dose of Scottish Eurovision history -this hilarious and irreverent film looks to answer those questions and more.

name: Eurovision Calling: Jason and Chelcee’s Ultimate Guide
description: Comedian Jason Manford and singer-songwriter Chelcee Grimes present Eurovision Calling: Jason and Chelcee’s Ultimate Guide. This entertainment programme will see the pair explore why the Eurovision Song Contest is the greatest show on Earth. Using a mix of fascinating archive footage and revealing interviews with fans, experts and competitors, this one hour film will delve into the story of how the Contest has become the world’s largest live music event, creating global superstars and leaving an impact on the lives of many.

name: LovePump: A Guido Rockumentary
description: A short comedy mockumentary that follows Lovepump, a 1980s Guido hair band that ruled the fictional charts with hits like, "Death by the Slice", "Take it Eeezze", and "The Meatball Song".  Inspired by the classic film, This is Spinal Tap.

name: miwa concert tour 2018-2019 "miwa THE BEST"
description: miwa concert tour 2018-2019 "miwa THE BEST" performed at Nippon Budokan on 3/15/2019 and 3/16/2019

name: KODA KUMI 15th Anniversary Premium Live a-nation Island
description: Koda Kumi s 15th Anniversary Premium Live at a-nation Island to celebrate 15 years in the industry and performed at Yoyogi National Stadium. This was released as a special concert DVD on the Fanclub edition of her WINTER of LOVE album.

name: Koda Kumi 15th Anniversary First Class 2nd LIMITED LIVE at STUDIO COAST
description: Koda Kumi s 15th Anniversary First Class 2nd LIMITED LIVE at STUDIO COAST performed on 12/6/2014

name: Dream Music Park at Yokohama Stadium
description: Koda Kumi s Dream Music Park concert performed at Yokohama Stadium on 2010.7.3 and 7.4

name: KODA KUMI Fanclub Live Tour ~Let s Party Vol.2~ LIVE
description: Koda Kumi s Fanclub Live Tour ~Let s Party Vol. 2~ which was included on the Fanclub edition of her Bon Voyage album.

name: KODA KUMI Love & Songs 2022
description: KODA KUMI Love & Songs 2022 is the 30th video release by Koda Kumi. The footage for the concert series was taken from her final performance at KT Zepp Yokohama on April 24.

name: Takarazuka Elisabeth 25th Anniversary Special Gala Concert (25th Anniversary Version)
description: Since its premiere in Vienna in 1992, the musical "Elisabeth" has been performed all over the world. In Japan, "Elisabeth" was first performed by the Takarazuka Snow troupe in 1996, prior to the first performances in other countries. A total of 10 versions of the musical have been performed by different troupes, making it one of Takarazuka Revue s most popular musicals. The "Elisabeth TAKARAZUKA 25th Anniversary Special Gala Concert" was held in 2021 to commemorate the 25th anniversary of the Snow troupe s first performance.

name: Bijelo dugme:  Live Belgrade Arena 2016
description: The concert of Bijelo dugme at Belgrade Arena in 2016.

name: Synth Britannia at the BBC
description: A journey through the BBC s synthpop archives from Roxy Music and Tubeway Army to New Order and Sparks. Turn your Moogs up to 11 as we take a trip back into the 70s and 80s!

name: Into the Spotlight
description: On the heels of a tragedy and the COVID-19 pandemic, a Dallas-based theatre troupe comprised of people with intellectual and developmental disabilities are determined to write, rehearse, and perform their 11th annual original musical.

name: Ginette - Ma Vie
description: Interview without filters, Paul Arcand questions the 76-year-old performer on the sidelines of the release of her autobiography "Ginette" and her most recent album, "C est tout moi".

name: Yellow Sunshine - O Despertar
description: A group of young people come together to face life s difficulties through music.

name: Understanding Arabic Music, with Simon Shaheen & Qantara
description: Western music is very connected to the rich history of Arabic music. Many of our Western musical instruments are direct descendants of Arabic stringed and reed instruments as well as the use of complex melodies and improvisation in performance. Master musician and composer Simon Shaheen, along with his ensemble Qantara, demonstrates the unique sound and range of several Arabic instruments, performs traditional Arabic music with jazz and classical influences, and involves students in learning rhythms and patterns used most frequently in traditional/classical Arab music

name: Voyage au coeur de la culture celte
Amy Macdonald - Under Stars - Live beim Rudolstadt Festival
dust: the road to where?
description: dust: the road to where?  is a documentary uncovering the recent success of the band dust, based in Newcastle, NSW. Viewing the ups and downs of the band and their outlook on the newly announced European tour.

name: The Passenger
description: Mieczyslaw Weinberg s powerful Holocaust drama Die Passagierin channels his and his family s ordeals of wartime and Soviet persecution, applying them musically to Zofia Posmysz s autobiographical novel.

name: Leningrad: Voyage
description: Ilya Naishuller s second music video made for the Russian band Leningrad which depicts the grief of a robber.

name: Fok Nabo Distorio
description: Experimental abstract animation based on "Liivaterade Raamat" composed by Liis Viira. This short film is improvised by animating in stop-motion different objects through optical lenses.

name: Richard Strauss: Die Frau ohne Schatten
Charles Gounod: Roméo et Juliette - Opernhaus Zürich
Picture Me Rollin
description: A black Lamborghini spins in circles, cheered on by men in white T-shirts and medallion necklaces. Larry W. Cook has reused a clip from the 2000 music video "Get Your Roll On" by the rap group Big Tymers but replaced the audio with a version of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. s "I Have a Dream" speech. The civil rights leader s speech has been chopped and screwed, a hip-hop turntable technique that involves slowing down a track.

name: Porcupine Tree: Deadwing
description: A 3CD/Blu-Ray deluxe hardback book edition of Porcupine Tree’s classic 2005 release, Deadwing.  The CDs include a 2018 remaster of the album by Steven Wilson, b-sides, additional tracks, and over 70 minutes of Deadwing demos (offering a rare insight into the creative process for the album).  The blu-ray features a new  making of  documentary (Never Stop the Car On A Drive in the Dark), the ‘Lazarus’ promo video, Deadwing remastered in 96/24 LPCM stereo, B-sides in 96/24 LPCM stereo, the complete Deadwing album and 4 bonus tracks in 5.1 surround sound (from 2005) mixed by Elliot Scheiner and Steven Wilson. The 2005 ‘Rockpalast  German TV special appears in its original 77 minute broadcast form, but now with newly mixed and improved audio.  The 108-page book contains an in-depth history of the band by Stephen Humphries plus rare photographs taken from Lasse Hoile and the band s personal archives.

name: Joy of Life
description: The 5 animation poems singing joy of life, inspired by Normand Roger’s music.  Mystery, dangerous, hope and anxiety, battles. The tiny little light is coming to us from beyond the darkness. This is a miracle. This is a big message. We are shining ourselves receiving light . We are the human, we are the nature.

name: Ginga -Nagareboshi Gin- Gajo Kessen Hen (The Battle of the Stronghold)
description: Based on the popular Japanese manga series "Ginga -Nagareboshi Gin-" by Takahashi Yoshihiro, this stage musicals follow the story of an Akita dog Gin, the son of the mighty hunting dog Riki.

name: Get Dusted the Movie
description: Crystal Methyd, Daegen Michelle, Daya Betty and Lux perform in an online version of their show  Get Dusted . The first instalment in the Get Dusted movie trilogy.

name: Dino Merlin: Live Zagreb Arena
description: Dino Merlin s concert in Zagreb Arena.

name: Babb Bird Bird Show #1-5 Highlight Collection
description: Revisits Thai pop icon Thongchai "Bird" McIntyre s electrifying performances and unforgettable onstage moments from 1986 to 1991.

name: SIAMÉS: Mr. Fear
description: Official music video for "Mr. Fear" by SIAMÉS.

name: Eternal
description: Boredom sets in.

name: Steve Hillage Germany-77
description: Steve Hillage in concert.  Filmed and recorded in concertat Ott-Hahn-Schule, Bensberg, Germany 20th March 1977.

name: No Time
description: Two lovers take polaroid photos of each other while speeding down a highway. The photos are found by a gay man, who attends a concert where the two women and their female driver are performing. Realizing that the band are also queer, he removes his coat and begins to dance, having found a safe place.

name: Péripéties et perfections des acteurs de l Opéra de Pékin
description: From an early age, the future actors of the Peking opera undergo intensive training to be able to interpret their roles once they become adults. Their ancestral art requires a perfect mastery of their body. In addition to acting, they must learn to sing, dance or even juggle. Later, the best of them will be chosen to join Peking Opera.

name: Not Enough of You
description: Two very good friends struggle with having to share the intimacy they crave from each other with their boyfriends. Music video.

name: Suzane en concert à la Mer de Glace
Elvis Costello and the Brodsky Quartet - The Juliet Letters
Um Barzinho, Um Violão 2 ao Vivo
Hypnosis Mic: Division Rap Battle - Rule the Stage [Bad Ass Temple vs Matenro]
description: Blu-ray release of character rap project “Hypnosis Mic -Division Rap Battle-: Rule the Stage [Bad Ass Temple vs Matenro]”.

name: G. Mahler II. symfónia c mol "Vzkriesenie"
Our Choir s Trip to Großarl in October 2009
description: Director Fabuli Schnibuli s cinematic tour de force takes the audience on a poetic and melancholic journey with singing seniors – tormented artists searching for meaning in a world devoid of it – to the picturesque village of Großarl. Both daring and experimental, the film transcends all boundaries and conventions: It is a meandering ode to the absurdity and fragility of life, a profound meditation on the human condition, a dreamlike tapestry of lingering vignettes about past and present, remembrance and oblivion. With his trademark wit and sensitivity, Schnibuli crafts a haunting and ethereal hymn to nature s beauty and human intimacy, all underscored by the gentle rustling of leaves, the babbling of streams, the hum of Günther s remarkable baritone. Those who embrace this thought-provoking and inspiring opportunity to rediscover their lives in the subjunctive will lose themselves and find themselves again – a true testament to the possibilities of cinema!

name: Dave Kerzner - Static Live
description: Another blur from Dave Kerzner. Beautifully played, a good picture, interspersed with video inserts of nature, but again there is no normal menu with the ability to select the desired composition On two tracks before the end of the album, Francis Dunnery from The Syn played the guitar. And on the very last track, regular guitarist Fernando Perdomo came off. The plump, bearded man Fernando fell heartily across the stage, smiling at the maestro himself, who usually performs with an extremely serious face. By the way, the well-known Belarusian Ed Yunitskiy was engaged in the design of the album, I remember him from his work with the rock magazine "Colossus". The concert was played on September 14, 2017 at the Progstock in Raway, New Jersey.

name: Dave Kerzner - New World Live in Miami
description: As Dave wrote on the bandcamp, this is the very first performance of his solo album. The composition menu is missing again, aaaa! The scrawl on the cover is the maestra s autograph. The cover is 2019, but the credits of the concert are 2021... After "Redemption" there are interviews with Dave and the band for 10 minutes, keep in mind.

name: Koda Kumi Fanclub Tour ~AND~ at Zepp Diver City
description: Koda Kumi Fanclub Tour -AND- was filmed at Zepp Diver City in Tokyo. This was released only on the Fanclub edition of her DNA tour.

name: KODA KUMI LIVE TOUR 2017 ~W FACE~
description: KODA KUMI LIVE TOUR 2017 ~W FACE~ is the 17th live video released by Koda Kumi and 26th video release. The footage was taken from her August 6th performance at Tokyo International Forum Hall A.

name: KODA KUMI LIVE TOUR 2009 TRICK
description: KODA KUMI LIVE TOUR 2009 ~TRICK~ is the tenth video released by Koda Kumi, and her sixth concert video

name: Mr. Gallagher and Mr. Shean
description: Al Shean performs a solo version of the classic vaudeville song "Mr. Gallagher and Mr. Shean".

name: Joost Prinsen: Caruso & Caransa
description: Television Registration of the theatre program by the Dutch actor, singer and raconteur Joost Prinsen and the pianist Dick van der Stoep.

name: En nu naar bed
description: Television recording of the Dutch musical by Annie M.G. Schmidt (lyrics) and Harry Bannink (music) from 1971. Two fairies guide the life of young Frans. The good fairy wishes him that he will become a decent man, with a good job and an exemplary family. The evil fairy wishes him bad luck. Her goal is to make the boy as unhappy as possible. Both bring twists and turns in the boy s life. They accompany his life in different guises, as a teacher, as a cashier, as a customer in a shop, as a psychiatrist, as aunts at a reception. Their fight continues until morals begin to scramble. Because what is actually still good and what is really bad?

name: B. Martinů: Koncert pro cembalo a malý orchestr
Hutzul Land
description: “HUTZULSHCHYNA” produced by Kalyna Film Company in 1938, was brought from Western Ukraine by Mykola Novak, in order to acquaint the people with the life of the Ukrainian mountaineer. Hutzulshchyna is now divided by two Governments, part is occupied by Poland and another part is occupied by the Hungarian Government. The Hutzuls have lived through a very tragic episode in their struggle to regain their freedom from Poland, and recently from March 13 to March 30, 1939, thousands of Hutzuls were killed by the Hungarian Army in their fight for freedom.

name: Varos Amarcord: The Three Singers Who Made It Big
description: A documentary about the Varos district in Sibenik, Croatia, which once was a home to Arsen Dedic, Vice Vukov and Miso Kovac - three singers who marked 50 years of pop music in former Yugoslavia.

name: No Smoking in Sarajevo
description: Until 1991, Nele Karajlić and Sejo Sexon have been together leaders of the biggest Yugoslavian rock band : Zabranjeno pušenje (No smoking in Serbo-Croatian). After their split-up, Nele continues playing with the No Smoking Orchestra, internationally known and related to director Emir Kusturica. In parallel, Sejo Sexon succeed in the Balkans with Zabranjeno pušenje, other version of the band. Sejo is Bosnian, Nele is Serbian. It has been 20 years since the last time these two old neighbors and friends have seen each other. United by music and separated by war their story is a mirror of the country its own.

name: YMO – Live At Budokan 1980
description: Yellow Magic Orchestra perform at Nippon Budokan on December 27, Tokyo 1980

name: Taikonaut
description: A creature is born from the cosmos. In his journey through the void he searches for what it means to be human. Marching he soon finds himself chased by the chaos that comes along with finding a safe home-ground.

name: Black Sea People
description: Billed as the first Ukrainian art film in colour to be produced in Canada, the film received mixed reviews from the Ukrainian press despite its folksy, mass appeal. The transfer onto film of a staged musical production without fuly understanding the specific demands of the film medium is reportedly one of the drawbacks.

name: The Field of Gray Dreams
description: A group of junkies go to a deserted part of town at night to get high. They cross paths with "the one in the woods". After that moment it is impossible to know where the journey is to.

name: The Bala Brothers Live
description: On 3 March 2015, Warner Classics, the classical division of Warner Music Group released the Bala Brothers US Debut, the self-titled Bala Brothers (Live). The album was recorded live at the Lyric Theatre in Johannesburg. By 12 March, the brothers  new album had reached 8th on Billboard s World Music Charts

name: Alfie Boe - Bring Him Home Tour Live
description: Filmed live at the Royal Festival Hall in London, during Alfie Boers sell out tour; the star of Les Misérables and the much loved tenor showcases his mesmerising and outstanding voice in his very own  show  Bring Him Home . With an impressively diverse collection of tracks including the impassioned "Maria" from West Side Story, Ewan MacColl s heartfelt "The First Time Ever I Saw Your Face", a truly breathtaking rendition of "Bring Him Home" from Les Misérables and an emotional performance of Martina McBride s  In My Daughters Eyes . Plus, Alfie performs a wonderful medley of James Bond theme tunes, and uniquely inspired renditions of tune: from Moulin Rouge, Chitty Chitty Bang Bang and much more. Alfie is also joined on stage for some unique performances by his very special guests, including Matt Lucas, Melanie C, Tom Fletcher from McFly Claude-Michel Schönberg and Shakira Riddell-Morales.

name: Mawal
description: A choir of young women is singing in a sacred music evening. Carried away by the voice and the beauty of a young singer, a man recalls an old memory.

name: Shirt Factory
description: A musical performed by schoolchildren from a secondary modern (Markfield) in North London, combining lively dance to the sounds from a transistor radio, and the automative actions of a production line to the monotonous music of the sewing machines.

name: The Moor s Pavane
description: Studio-filmed performance of Jose Limon s landmark 1949 ballet.  Shot in 16mm Kodachrome, this is an Ektachrome reversal print.  Made in 1951 for Brandon Films.

name: Perlman in Russia
description: This documentary follows Itzhak Perlman when he travelled to Russia for the first time in 1991, accompanied by Zubin Mehta and the Israel Philharmonic. Perlman describes his experiences with wit and warmth, and speaks movingly of what it means to him, as a Jew, to perform in Russia with a Jewish orchestra.

name: The Girl with the Red Beret
description: A girl takes a wild ride on the metro in Montreal. Travelling from station to station, she encounters an array of colourful characters in a bizarre musical journey that’s peppered with hilarious and unexpected incidents. This joyful, heartwarming animated film portrays Montreal in all its vitality, creativity and diversity, with plenty of humour and good cheer, to the tune of Kate and Anna McGarrigle’s timeless hit “Complainte pour Ste-Catherine.”

name: Dale Watson & The Texas Two: The Sun Sessions
description: On The Sun Sessions, not only does Dale Watson evoke an era, but he revives it to the point that it seems that it never faded. Embodying the early recordings of Johnny Cash, Elvis, Carl Perkins brewed with his signature Texas juke joint cool, Dale Watson is what country is, was and should always be. Recorded at the fabled Sun Studios in Memphis, TN, The Sun Sessions is an album that deserves the label of "instant classic." Backed by The Texas Two, these 14 original tracks turn love, heartache and the unsung heroes of our everyday lives into legend.

name: IZ The Man Behind The Music
description: Beloved Hawaiian musician, Israel Kamakawiwo ole, music performs music. In this DVD we explore this man, we will discover IZ- The Man Behind The Music.

name: The Cavaliers Drum and Bugle
description: The 2004 Cavaliers Drum and Bugle Corps perform James Bond action with percussion and brass. The "green machine"  perform showing that spies need to have some fun.

name: Golden Hour  Billkin The First Fanmeeting
CK LIVE 2012 "VIVID"
description: CK LIVE 2012 "VIVID" is the second live and fourth overall DVD released by Crystal Kay, at the same time it s her first video release under Universal Music Japan. Over Facebook she wrote, that she want all of her fans definitely to check the DVD out, because her dancers, staff and her put their heart into.

name: Crystal Kay Live in NHK Hall: 10th Anniversary Tour CK10
description: Crystal Kay Live in NHK Hall: 10th Anniversary Tour CK10 is the first live and third overall DVD released by Crystal Kay, and her first item to be released in Blu-ray Disc format. The video contains footage from the finale of Crystal Kay s 10th Anniversary Tour CK10, which was held at NHK Hall on December 2nd, 2009

name: miwa Concert Tour 2015 ONENESS
description: miwa Concert Tour 2015 ONENESS held by miwa at Yokohama Arena on June 15, 2015.

name: Richard Abel "Elegancia"
description: Richard Abel performs elequently 19 epic Waltz selections.

name: Special Live: Here I am
description: BoA Special Live: Here I am

name: miwa live at Budokan ~acoguissimo~
description: miwa live at Budokan ~acoguissimo~ is miwa s ninth video release

name: miwa live at Budokan ~Sotsugyou-Shiki~
description: miwa live at Budokan ~Sotsugyou-Shiki~ is the  fourth DVD and Blu-ray released by miwa, and third live concert video. This tour was performed at Budokan.

name: miwa spring concert 2014 "Shibuya Monogatari ~Kan~"
description: miwa spring concert 2014 "Shibuya Monogatari ~Kan~" is the sixth DVD and Blu-ray released by miwa.

name: miwa concert tour 2012 "guitarium"
description: miwa concert tour 2012 "guitarium" is the third DVD and Blu-ray released by miwa, and second live concert video. It features the concert held at Tokyo Dome City Hall on June 23rd, 2012 from her first hall concert tour miwa concert tour 2012 "guitarium".

name: Devil Music
description: Debut short film of the Texan band Portrayal of Guilt.

name: Karadzicu, vodi Srbe svoje
description: Serbian music video related to the Croatian War (1991-1995), origin of the Internet meme "Remove Kebab".

name: Crossroads
description: Borrowing a beloved song from his own 1984 feature Sister Stella L., Mike De Leon made this video in a damning response to the victory election of Ferdinand “Bongbong” Marcos Jr. as president of the Philippines. In a prepared statement at the Cannes premiere of his recently restored Itim, he wrote, “Horror has now acquired a more sinister meaning. It is no longer about a ghost but about the monsters of Philippine politics, monsters that, after a long wait in the subterranean caverns of hell, have returned to ravage and rape my country all over again. The crazy thing is that we invited them back.”

name: NCM Live向祖儿狂呼-SAFARI萨花拉音乐剧
"CELEBRATION" tour 2018
description: "CELEBRATION" tour 2018 is the twelth live concert DVD and nineth blu-ray released by Miliyah Kato.It includes her Celebratration Tour 2018 performed at Zepp Tokyo on 2018/6/11 and her Birthday Bash Live 2018 performed at Studio Coast on 2018/6/22

name: "DRAMATIC LIBERTY" tour 2016
description: "DRAMATIC LIBERTY" tour 2016 is the tenth live concert DVD and seventh blu-ray released by Miliyah Kato.

name: 10th Anniversary "A MUSE" Tour 2015
description: 10th Anniversary "A MUSE" Tour 2015 is the ninth live concert DVD and sixth blu-ray released by Miliyah Kato. This release commemorates her 10th Anniversary from her debut in the industry.

name: THE BEST 2 MAN TOUR 2014
description: THE BEST 2 MAN TOUR 2014 is first split video release by both Kato Miliyah and Shimizu Shota.

name: Loveland Tour 2014
description: Loveland tour 2014 is the (seventh live concert DVD and fourth Blu-ray released by Miliyah Kato.

name: True Lovers Tour 2013
description: TRUE LOVERS TOUR 2013 is the sixth live concert DVD and third Blu-ray released by Miliyah Kato. This was released on the same date as her seventh studio album "LOVELAND",

name: M Best Tour 2011
description: M Best Tour 2011 is the fifth concert DVD and second blu-ray released by Miliyah Kato.

name: "ETERNAL HEAVEN" TOUR 2010-2011
description: "ETERNAL HEAVEN" TOUR 2010-2011 is the fourth live concert DVD and first blu-ray released by Miliyah Kato. It features the final day of her "ETERNAL HEAVEN" TOUR 2010 concert held at Osaka-jo Hall.

name: Muddy Waters at Newport
description: A hugely groundbreaking and influential live recording, that set the tone for generations of Blues artist afterwards. Performed during a tumultuous time at the Newport Jazz Festival, where just the day prior police used teargas and water hoses to control a drunken, riotous crowd, this extraordinary, historic set includes old blues standards as well as new Waters compositions. Despite the somewhat dangerous and unruly atmosphere at the festival, Waters and his electric blues band delivered an exquisite, confident performance. Featuring an all-star band with the likes of the legendary James Cotton, Otis Spann and John Lee Hooker, Muddy Waters at Newport 1960 would go on to become one of the most revered albums in modern day Chicago blues history.

name: GUTTER: Girls of Noise
description: In April 2008, LRS toured across the USA and met some amazing female noise artists.  This is what it is like to be a girl of noise.

name: Sections for Screen, Performers and Audience
description: “I was always fascinated by music scores and often imagined how concerts might be changed if performers were not hidden behind music on stands. In the 1960’s, I made several films that used oscilloscope imagery and, in doing so, learned to ‘play’ various synthesizers to generate images. For this film, I used colored gels while filming and chose to optically print a few visual phrases, allowing for repeated sections. I also super-imposed hi-contrast notation over the film. So, Sections became a kind of feedback piece: sound generated the images for the score and performers created new sounds and a new piece from these images.” (Richard Lerman)

name: From All the Power
description: As the sun of the New Wave was setting, a new music scene was being born which passed under the large record companies’ radar. The underground scene in Croatia was incoherent, many tried to find their way through different subspecies of post art rock and new wave. Zdenko Franjić, a former employee of the National Bank of Croatia, a passionate lover of underground, psychobilly, garage rock and indie music, decided to establish an independent record label. The label was independent in every sense of the word, he financed it himself and copied the tapes he issued, he made his own covers and revealed new bands. The peak was the vinyl edition called "Bombardiranje New Yorka", a compilation that turned everything upside down…

name: Ernie Ball: The Pursuit of Tone - Buddy Guy
description: Blues legend Buddy Guy talks about his life and career.

name: Tinica
description: A young man on a mountaintop improvising empty tin cans into a drum set. Overlooking the suburbs of Batman, a Turkish city near Iraq, he abruptly stops playing and kicks the cans down the hillside—a rebellious gesture as familiar to rock and roll as it is to performance art.

name: Best Driver
description: Three people who accidentally left to Jeju Island find an old woman next to their tent - an old woman who would never wake up. As they start wondering whether the old woman is asleep or dead, it becomes more obscure whether they are concerned about or waiting for the death. Five songs drift away while the contemplation for the death. This is a film, as well as a new album of musician, Yozoh.

name: Counting Stars
description: Han-byeol and Hye-seong are working as interns at a company. For a long time, Han-byeol dreamed of becoming a singer, and Hye-seong dreamed of becoming a musical actor. Receiving a sudden full-time job offer, they agonize between dreams and reality.

name: Oceanic: Queering the Ocean
description: Three dancers at Natural Bridges Beach reflect on climate change, sea level rise, and personal loss, seeking and imagining queer, trans abolitionist futures.

name: Barry Manilow: Big Fun on Swing Street
description: Barry Manilow and friends perform 1940s songs updated with a 1980s flair.

name: Sara Bareilles - Live from the Artists Den
description: Los Angeles’ historic Orpheum Theatre hosted a dynamic performance from musician Sara Bareilles one late October evening. One-thousand guests filled the downtown theater, built in 1926, to witness the singer-songwriter’s soaring set. Bareilles performed several songs off The Blessed Unrest, her Album of the Year-nominated fourth studio album, including the hit single “Brave,” a song that champions gay rights. The singer showcased her powerful, evocative vocals on fan favorites like “Love Song” and “King of Anything,” ending the set with an emotionally compelling rendition of her breakout song “Gravity.”

name: El cantor del pueblo
description: A worker looking for money for his blind mother s operation, presents himself as a tango singer and achieves success.

name: Van der Graaf Generator: The Bath Forum Concert
Confesiones de un artista de mierda
Seven Flavours
description: Animation short videoclip for jazz band Demo Rumudo.

name: Mirage
description: Musical video animation for Demo Rumudo jazz band.

name: Sound of the Shadow
description: The animated short talks about the real pandemic experienced in Spain since 2020. The whole world is suffering from an economic crisis, but also a health crisis in the field of mental health.

name: PERSONA SUPER LIVE P-SOUND WISH 2022 ~Crossing Journey~ Day 1
description: PERSONA SUPER LIVE P-SOUND WISH 2022 ～交差する旅路～ (lit. Crossing Journey) was a two-day concert held on October 8th-9th, 2022. It featured songs from Persona, Persona 2 Innocent Sin, Eternal Punishment, Persona 3, Portable, The Movie, Dancing in Moonlight, Persona 4, Arena, Arena Ultimax, Dancing All Night, Persona 4 The Animation, Persona 4 The Golden Animation, Persona 5, Royal, Strikers, Dancing in Starlight, Persona 5 The Animation and Persona Q2: New Cinema Labyrinth. Day 1 contains the songs performed on October 8th, 2022

name: Otra cosa es con guitarra
description: A young woman falls in love with a singer and when he disappears, a lookalike replaces him.

name: Joni Mitchell: In Concert at the BBC
description: ON SEPTEMBER 3RD, 1970, Joni Mitchell stopped by the BBC’s Television Centre in London to perform for the premiere of their In Concert series. She would play songs from previous albums, including “Cactus Tree” from her 1968 David Crosby–produced debut and “Chelsea Morning” from Clouds, but the majority of her 11-song set came from her then-new album, Ladies of the Canyon. With tracks like “Big Yellow Taxi” and “The Circle Game” — the latter her response to Neil Young’s “Sugar Mountain” — Ladies of the Canyon marked Mitchell’s first platinum record. It was also her first to feature the piano, an instrument she’d use to produce warm, introspective songs less than a year later on Blue.

name: Mile Deep Hollow
description: The Mile Deep Hollow documentary follows Chris Corner and his live band (Janine Gezang, Sammi Doll, and Jon Siren) from their early rehearsals in Southern California to the end of the tour in Moscow. With behind the scenes footage and detailed interviews, this documentary offers a deeper insight into the music and art project, and marks an unprecedented openness for IAMX in an effort to create a deeper connection with his fans.  Known for colossal live productions that include performance, light, and video art, IAMX shows offer fans a catharsis through the spectacle of stage. Mental health is a core component of the IAMX philosophy, and as a unique feature of this tour, IAMX partnered with The You Rock Foundation to host Mental Health Gatherings at select stops. These gatherings brought fans together to share their experiences and resources, and to find support through the IAMX community.

name: FERG
description: When a group of teenagers get together in the summer, things get out of hand

name: Pulling Teeth
description: After a delirious man murders his wife he is sent down a spiral of disturbing nightmares.

Meets the small community of Tunisian Salsa dancers in the spotlight. They tell their Salsa experience and their addiction to this dance. For some of them, like Faten, 26, Salsa was even a catharsis during a painful divorce trial.

name: Laurent Garnier: Coloured City
description: A music video for the single "Coloured City".

name: Arlo Parks - 6 Music Festival
description: Powerful poetic songs from the superstar singer-songwriter.

name: Mahler Symphonies 1 & 8 (Symphony of a Thousand)
description: These recordings are with two different orchestras (Mahler 1st with the Chicago Symphony and the 8th with the London Philharmonic). Tennstedt s live performances are much better than his studio versions of the same works, and it s wonderful to watch him coaxing what he wants from the players. Even though he conducts from the score rather than from memory, he always seems to be directly connected to the orchestra in an almost magical way. The sound is good in both performances, and there is a sense, on both occasions, of being present for something quite special. These are great performances.

name: Loyle Carner - 6 Music Festival
description: The acclaimed rapper brings heartfelt lyrics and catchy hits to 6 Music Festival.

name: 零点乐队 2017“我还爱着你”专辑庆功演唱会
Mark Shreeve - Live at Emma
description: One of four live acts throughout the Emma concert from 1994

name: Diamond Princess Tour 2007
description: Diamond Princess Tour 2007 is the first DVD released by Miliyah Kato.

description: This show captures the band right at the peak after The Joker, and in the middle of Fly Like an Eagle and Book of Dreams, a stream of hits… We decided to call it Breaking Ground because that’s exactly what we were doing.

description: A filmed concert special starring Trisha Yearwood.

name: La traviata
description: The tragic tale of a Parisian courtesan who finds true love.

name: The Offspring: Americana
description: The Offspring present exactly what you re looking for in camcorder entertainment. "Americana" is the video that gives you the inside story behind this band s humble beginnings. Watch the true story of a Californian garage band as they stumble into the limelight. Also check out America s finest boarders (skate, wake, snow & surf) and America s finest bikers (BMX & Moto-X) as they huck their shit. This is no Hollywood production. No actors and no stuntmen, just friends and the Offspring.

name: work today!
description: This film is about work today!

name: Dedari
description: Indonesia has a variety of local wisdom to prevent or fight epidemics.  This ritual is not just incantations and prayers but in the form of dances and poetry which are still preserved today.  The Sang Hyang Dedari dance combines dance and chants to drive away reinforcements and ask for the protection of the gods.  This dance is very related to what is happening in the world today, a pagebluk that destroys human life.  This pandemic is nature s answer to human greed. Only by purifying the heart, nature and knowledge can all these obstacles be overcome together.

name: June
description: This experimental short film chronicles the character of June and her struggle with drugs and relationships.

Tokyo Ska Paradise Orchestra Down Beat Arena
Billy s Band - Весенние обострения (Концерт в Мюзик-Холле)
The Dollyrots: Family Vacation-Live in Los Angeles
description: The Dollyrots  first live concert film: Live in Los Angeles captures the exuberant duo in top form on a 2015 tour of the USA, with their toddler son along for the adventure & in support of a catalog spanning 15 years and 5 albums. From a single special concert performance filmed at the World-famous Roxy in their hometown of Los Angeles in Sep 2015.

name: NOFX: Rocklife Rock Night 1993
description: Recorded in Essen, Germany, May 29, 1993

name: Supersuckers: Live in Orange County
description: Few bands can get away with the cross-section of sleaze, rockabilly, and punk like the Supersuckers and still be both hilarious and talented. LIVE IN ORANGE CO. celebrates nearly two decades of the band s trawl through the Americana sewer with both their second live DVD and fourth live release. Fans should lap up this "unrated" package; it features a more blistering, electric set than its lone predecessor, LIVE IN ANAHEIM, and proves that the adage "if it ain t broke, don t fix it" applies to oversexed, Satan-honoring, greased-back gutter punks perhaps better than anything else. And that s a compliment.

name: Supersuckers: Live at Helldorado
description: Shot at the Helldorado in Vitoria, a furious and memorable concert of these American rock masters, shot in Basque Country, Spain.

name: Supersuckers: XX 20th Anniversary Show
description: We were there to celebrate our existence. To go chronologically through our repertoire and bring it to a sold out house at the fabulous Showbox in downtown Seattle, where we cut our teeth for the last 20 years. I mean, how long could it take to run through our history (or at least touch on most of the highlights)? Well, it turns out it took us about two and a half hours. That s right, there is about two and a half hours of glorious Supersuckers mayhem right here. Warts and all.

name: Me First and the Gimme Gimmes: Paste Studio Acoustic Sessions
description: Live Acoustic session and interview, Paste Studios, NYC 4-24-17

name: À force d’usure — instrumentarium altéré
description: "À force d’usure" exposes the atypical path of three percussionists attempting to capture unlikely sonic moments: a rusty bath, dissolving flutes, sugaring on drums, melting ice, soaking wood… A variety of material reactions take place on different timescales. The Bascaille trio uses its worn-out instrumentarium in a video that has itself undergone various alterations and hybridizations.

name: Yannick Noah - Concert acoustique - Vaison la Romaine
Wanton
description: A collection of exorcisms, performed in a tangled and disorienting daydream of the ‘self’.

name: Michael Olivera & The Cuban Jazz Syndicate
description: A musical show by a spirited Cuban band as part of the Las Noches del Monumental series on Spanish television... The Cuban Michael Olivera is closely connected to the jazz scene. He is one of the most important drummers in the contemporary music scene. Despite his young age, he has more than 50 recorded albums and hundreds of projects with which he participated in important festivals. He performed his art at Jazz a Vienne, Montroux Jazz Festival, Barcelona Jazz Festival and many others. In 2021, together with The Cuban Jazz Syndicate, he presented his album "Y llegó la luz". During a concert at the Teatro Monumental in Madrid at the beginning of 2022, Olivera and his bandmates performed not only songs from the mentioned album - "Para Tito Puente", "Bolero Danzongo" or "Danza del Carnaval" - but also other hits, such as "Mozambique"

name: Ginger Wildheart: Songs & Words
description: The live show of Ginger Wildheart’s Songs & Words, featuring the stories behind all of his songs from the very beginning to the extremely successful 555%, as told by the man himself. No holds barred!  Recorded live at the Leicester Square Theatre London, Sunday 26th April 2015.  The full show plus bonus interview and behind the scenes footage.

name: A Night In Stockholm
description: When Nellie and Anton meet at a New Years party, they decide to spend the evening together. While exploring Stockholm on a romantic night like New Yeas Eve they only have one goal in mind; to create the perfect night. There s just one catch... They cannot fall in love!

name: Fiction - The Dizziness of Lucifer
description: Band featuring Lucifer. They changed their name from Gille  Loves to Fiction at this time and released this VHS.

name: Gille Loves - Theatre of Vampire
description: 1990-1996 Live & Image Clips

name: Moto perpetuo
description: Naked women dancing and performing to the music of Paganini.

name: Hustle with My Muscle
description: This rapid-montage music video for John Sex’s song “Hustle with My Muscle” portrays the singer as a ladies’ man with ample endowment to share. “Can you handle all the man below my belt?” he provocatively asks.

name: Tri Am the Movie
description: Vietnamese pop queen Mỹ Tâm presents a behind-the-scenes look at her landmark Tri Âm concert in this emotionally charged documentary.

name: Arundhati
description: Arundhati wants to marry Manoj but Biswajit claims Arundhati is his wife Madhu who supposedly died in a train accident. Eventually the confusion is resolved.

name: Basanta Rasa
description: This is a musical movie. It is based on rasa leela of Prabhu SriKrushna. There were total 81 songs in this film. More than hundred child artist worked in the film.

name: The End of History
description: Written and filmed in four days apiece, "The End Of History" tracks Australian techno producers Darcy & Pat as they struggle to acclimatise to a changing Berlin where the clubs have (briefly) been closed down. Forced to either talk to each other or to finally engage with a city they know only as a playground for high-as-f*ck expats ("artists"), they leave as fast as they can to East Germany proper to create "something no one s ever done before".

name: Syrius Orbitter
description: MS-DOS demoscene short film that showcases computer animation, art and music.

name: Eon
description: Amiga demoscene short film that showcases computer animation and music. Made in modern times on old Amiga computers.

name: Joan Armatrading - Live at the Royal Albert Hall
description: Live at Royal Albert Hall, recorded at the prestigious London venue as part of the sold-out world tour supporting This Charming Life. It took her through North America, Europe, and the U.K. Backed by bassist John Giblin, drummer and saxophonist Gary Foote, and keyboardist Spencer Cozens. The show was recorded in a four r-camera shoot and captures the concert -- and two performances from Denver.

description: Sound source & visualization of Sekai Symphony!  The orchestra concert "Sekai Symphony" will be held on Saturday, October 16th at Pacifico Yokohama National Convention Hall with two performances, day and night. This performance will be released in two forms, CD and Blu-ray!

name: Sekai Symphony 2022 Live
description: Compiles the orchestral concert of Sega & Colorful Palette s rhythm & adventure game for iOS/Android, "Project Sekai Colorful Stage! Hatsune Miku" held on June 11 at the Pacifico Yokohama National Grand Hall for two performances, one in the daytime and the other in the evening. 25-Ji, Night Code de performs as a special guest.

name: The Metropolitan Opera: Wagner s Dream
description: Wagner s Dream-the documentary highlighting the creative process and technical aspects involved in realizing Robert LePage’s production of the MET s newest staging of Wagner s ring cycle is highly enjoyable and provides the viewer with much fascinating information about how this production evolved from nascent ideas to brilliant performances. Most opera lovers had to be intrigued by the amazing hybridization of animation and the technologically complex use of "The Machine" to make these operas come alive with astonishing sets that are true to Wagner s intentions for his monumental ring cycle. I thoroughly enjoyed every minute of this video and wished there was another hour or two (like a Wagnerian opera!).

name: Hatsune Miku Symphony 2022 Orchestra Live
description: "Hatsune Miku Symphony" is a concert that performs VOCALOID songs centered on Hatsune Miku with a gorgeous full orchestra. The contents of the recording are the Pacifico Yokohama performance on Sunday, September 25, 2022.
