Europakonzert 2014 from Berlin
description: Otto Nicolai: Overture to Die lustigen Weiber von Windsor (The Merry Wives of Windsor)  Edward Elgar: Falstaff in C minor, Op. 68  Piotr Tchaikovsky: Symphony No. 5 in E Minor, Op. 64

name: The Jangling Man: The Martin Newell Story
description: Regarded by many as an influential figure in the history of cassette culture and DIY recording, Martin Newell has been an integral part of the British music scene since the 1970s, and his music career spans over six decades. He’s been produced by XTC’s Andy Partridge, and written for the likes of Captain Sensible of The Damned. Though it would be wrong to call him an "unknown", he has never been directly in the limelight. This film brings to light the amazing career and life work of the artist, who, on top of being the most published contemporary British poet as well as an established gardener, continues to record and release music today.

name: The Girl in the Yellow Dress
Josh Groban: An Evening in New York City
description: In this Soundstage special event, Josh Groban performs favorites from his best-selling albums in an intimate theatre setting at Lincoln center

name: Ibrahim Maalouf à l AccorHotels Arena
Krylon Spit
description: Childhood best friends and Hip-Hop artists, Michelle Shockley and Brandon Rothrock, struggle with their lives and artistic endeavors as they mourn the loss of their crew member and find themselves moving in different directions.

name: Yannick Nézet-Séguin et l Orchestre Métropolitain - Des airs de fêtes 2022
Dream Catcher
description: Rapunzel eagerly awaits her prince from her tower top singing “Someday My Prince Will Come”. Her hair is extremely long and can reach far away outside of the tower. She starts to spin and rewind her locks in order to catch her unseen prince. As the spinning movement proceeds, Rapunzel becomes highly emotional. Eventually she loses sight of her initial aspiration and transforms into a mere yarn-ball-like, cocoon-like black mass. Meanwhile, the world outside of the tower is ruined by Rapunzel’s rampaging hair. The chaos created is as if some apocalyptic natural disaster has taken place.

name: LEAVE BRITNEY ALONE!
description: LEAVE BRITNEY ALONE!

name: Miss Evening Sweet
description: A Shaw and Sons production.

name: Springtime in Paradise
description: A Shaw and Sons production

name: The Dances of Charm
description: A Shaw and Sons production.

name: from soil to soul
description: The film takes the theme of folk music as its starting point and puts old hardanger fiddle traditions from Telemark in a new perspective. Through a meeting between three women, "from soil to soul" reflects on what it is like to be human today: The need to be in contact with nature, the urge to create something of your own and express yourself, and the desire for community and to feel alive. Together, the musicians Johanna and Marianna and the gardener Ana get time to stand still.

name: All Crusties Spending Loud Night 2002
description: A concert film with performances from the Japanese punk bands Zoe, Poikkeus, Deconstruction, Framtid, Abraham Cross, Disclose, Defector, Life, Reality Crisis, and Effigy.

name: AM PHIBIAN
description: another audiovisual experience from seafood diet

name: Alabama Shakes - Austin City Limits
description: Mixing classic R and B vocals with a soulful blues-rock base, Alabama Shakes have taken garage rock and turned it on its head. Alabama Shakes takes the Austin City Limits stage for the second time in support of their newest album Sound and Color.

name: Kelly Clarkson: London Live
description: Direct from the heart of London s live music scene, this dynamic music program features the world s hottest artists of today and tomorrow. Featuring: Kelly Clarkson

name: 365x : 20
description: A look into the formative stages of Jonathon Ng s (aka EDEN) music journey.

name: The Making Of Cataclasm, Episode 1: Lásabrjótur
description: At the beginning of this year I started feeling an intense dissatisfaction with where I was creatively. I felt stifled from being so deep in the music industry - felt so much pressure to be so many things I wasn t. I decided to get away for a month and a half to a cabin in the remote Icelandic village of Bildudalur, population 65, to intensively write and record the skeleton for my debut album. What I returned with was more than I could have dreamed of, and is by far the greatest creative accomplishment of my life so far.

name: The Weird
description: Didko (aka the devil) is a character of Ukrainian folk demonology. The narrative conveys that didko is waiting for everyone who misbehaves and will torture them. Only this work doesn t depict them in a traditional way, with little horns upon the pig s face, with goat legs and covered in fur. Instead, it suggests their appearance as humans, implying that anyone could be a sinner and anyone could be a devil.

name: Aspekt
description: Alice explores the influence of the chemical properties of insects on the human psyche and gets on a trip where she has to face her essence.

name: Irène Schweizer
description: It s there, it s been Irène Schweizer s faithful companion for over 40 years, sharing her joys and sorrows, inspiring her and allowing her to live her dreams: her piano.

name: Co je to ta koule žlutá
Émile Bilodeau et ses invités aux Francos 2022
Fujii Kaze "HELP EVER ARENA TOUR"
description: The final of Fujii Kaze s "HELP EVER ARENA TOUR" at Yoyogi National Gymnasium on November 28, 2021. Includes a documentary "HEAT".

name: Fujii Kaze "NAN-NAN SHOW 2020" Help Ever Hurt Never
description: The first concert held by Kaze Fujii at Nippon Budokan in 2020.

name: Joe Bonamassa Live at ACL April 2021
description: TWO TIME GRAMMY-nominated Joe Bonamassa is breaking out the blues-rock power trio in an epic CONCERT on Thursday, April 1st.  This virtual event will bring fans together around the world as Bonamassa broadcasts to their living room in an unforgettable night of guitar wizardry! With a setlist chosen by Bonamassa fans, this specially curated power trio set will not disappoint.

name: Fleet Foxes Live on Boston Harbor
description: On the Autumnal Equinox Sept 22, 2022, stream Fleet Foxes Live On Boston Harbor, a full band event. On the second anniversary of the GRAMMY nominated album s release, join us to celebrate + experience the Shore Tour + the Westerlies.

name: KADAL
description: A girl standing alone in the beach remembers moments with her ex at the same place .Yet even in solitude she finds peace

name: Pendulum Live @ Reading Festival
description: Pendulum Secret Set Live from Reading & Leeds Festival

name: Roots of Fire
description: The battle to revive dying tradition comes to life through the young musicians of Southwest Louisiana in this powerful musical documentary. Amidst shuttered rural dance clubs and encroaching globalization, five Grammy award-winning artists lend their voices, examine the discrimination that almost erased their customs, and share the unique sounds created when the forces of fresh talent and deep history collide to fight for cultural survival.

name: Grauer Sand
description: Grauer Sand  by Pole, track taken from the new album  Tempus .

name: Scott Ross: Playing & Teaching
description: Scott Ross in an exclusive master class, recorded in Rome, a few times before his death in 1989.

name: Duet
description: In this film, Melina gets the chance to prove herself as a musical actress while learning about the beauty and difficulty of love.

name: GG Allin: Live and Pissed
description: With his startlingly outrageous behavior, GG Allin became one of the most infamous performers in the history of rock and roll. GG Allin: Live & Pissed 1988 contains a collection of live performances, television appearances, and interviews that pain a full portrait of the controversial singer. The DVD release of the documentary contains a San Francisco concert appearance.

name: Lattoo
description: Lattoo is a story about an aspiring singer who gets the lyrics for his songs from a secret admirer.

name: The Story of the Kinks
description: Discover the inside story of the most influential English rock band of the  60s. Inspired by a mix of genres including rhythm and blues, folk and country, their music created a British Invasion around the world. Their third single "You Really Got Me" became an international hit and went straight to the top of the charts in the UK. With seventeen top 20 singles and five top ten albums in the UK, the Kinks had an incredibly successful career spanning over 30 years. Featuring interviews with key members of the group, this is their story.

name: 25 Years  My Way
description: Usher reflects on his breakthrough album  My Way  25 years later.

name: Maggie Lindemann - PARANOIA (Live at the Roxy)
description: A livestream concert event performed by artist Maggie Lindemann for her debut EP ‘PARANOIA’, performed live at the Roxy.

name: Pique Dame - Oper von Peter Tschaikowsky
Et in Arcadia Ego
description: An idyllic summer scene : A sleeping woman reclines between two trees, a straw hat covering her knees and her double circling her form.

name: A Cherry Orchard
description: Short animated musical performance of a work by Valentin Silvestrov based on Taras Shevchenko s verses, combined with animation of each line of the poem by different young directors.

name: RY X - Live From Lençóis Maranhenses National Park, in Brazil for Cercle
description: Lençóis Maranhenses National Park is a graceful composition of shapes of land and water, located in the "majestic and sensual world of Northern Brazil" - as RY X musingly expresses it. The 155 thousand hectares is unique for its white sand dunes and topaz lagoons that the wind reshapes endlessly.

name: Howie Pyro Rock ‘n’ Roll Monster Mash!
description: It’s a movie & music memorial celebrating the patron saint of weird! Get ready for a Rock ‘n’ Roll rumble! Thrill-Hungry, always Reckless and Willing! The Gangs and Go-Go Girls Who Go TOO FAR! Mad Doctors! Mayhem! Girl-Crazed Monsters & Goofy Gorilllas! Can You Take It?! We DARE You To Sit Thru It All!

name: Modulo
description: A musical documentary and tribute to Hugh Le Caine. The story of early electronic instruments, and the nearly forgotten Canadian music pioneer who created the first synthesizers. As told through interviews with three modern-day modular synth musicians.

name: Fourteen Days
description: Fourteen Days is a thought-provoking exploration about the methods artists employ to create their work. Given just fourteen days, 4 internationally acclaimed choreographers worked with 4 world-renowned composers to make 4 new commissions that challenge and stimulate both the audience and the dancers. Highlighting the diversity of styles and approaches, the show plays with the concept of balance and imbalance and proves to be an exciting, varied programme of dance and music.

name: Life
description: An elegant, powerful and sometimes provocative look at life and death presented in BalletBoyz’s inimitable style.

name: Eye Candy
description: Our body is the vessel with which we experience the physical world, and it houses our deepest instinctive parts. It’s where we feel pleasure and love, judge and destroy, bleed and smile, Since David and Venus, we’ve put the human body on the highest pedestal, shaping and perpetuating an unattainable beauty standard. Through this distorted lens of beauty, our natural form has been sexualized, demonized, and sometimes shamed into a taboo. Why is the naked body offensive? Does it hold a political charge? Are we not more than meets the eye?

name: Harawi
description: A poetic Super 8mm film created by Rachael Wilson and Anderson Matthew set to accompany the live recital performance of Olivier Messiaen’s Harawi – Chant d’amour et de mort (1945).

name: The Angels: Kickin  Down The Door
description: The Angels came hurtling out of Adelaide in the 1970s with the searing guitar sound of the Brewster brothers and Doc Neeson, a frontman who was beyond intense. Their songs remain etched in the DNA of this city: Am I Ever Goin’ to See Your Face Again, Take a Long Line, No Secrets. They worked their way up, developing an unmistakably unique musical style. By 1978 they were a behemoth of the local rock scene and on the path to international success… until they just missed their chance. Yet they still revolutionised the Aussie music scene transforming it from pretty pop to gritty guitar rock featuring ferocious and theatrical live shows. Adelaide director Maddie Parry (Hannah Gadsby: Nanette) has made a surprisingly intimate documentary, with band members’ home videos and never-before-seen photos, exploring the internal tensions that strained relationships to breaking point, even while producing incandescent rock’n’roll.  - AFF

name: Out Of This World
description: OUT OF THIS WORLD IS A SHORT FILM BUILT AROUND THE SONG ‘LONELY STAR’ BY ARIANA AND THE ROSE. IT TELLS THE STORY OF NEBBY, A TEENAGE ALIEN WHO ESCAPES THEIR SPACESHIP TO ENJOY ONE NIGHT OUT ON THE PLANET THEY’VE BEEN DYING TO VISIT: OURS. ON EARTH THEY FORM A STRONG BOND WITH ARIANA, A FORMER SINGER TURNED WAITRESS STUCK IN THE BURBS AT A LONELY DINER WHO YEARNS TO BRANCH OUT BEYOND THE STARS. DURING THEIR DREAM NIGHT OUT THE TWO LEARN THAT SOMETIMES YOU NEED SOMEONE OUT OF YOUR WORLD—OR EVEN OUT OF YOUR SOLAR SYSTEM—TO RECOGNIZE THE UNIQUE YOU, AND REMIND YOU THAT YOU ARE NEVER ALONE.

name: The Sleeping Beauty
description: A Musical fairy tale in three acts (1922)/Revised 1934. Performed by Orchestra E Coro Del Teatro Lirico di Cagliari.  Originally commissioned by the renowned puppeteer Vittorio Podrecca, The Sleeping Beauty has been revised for live performance

name: Chabrier: The Star
description: L’Étoile did much to establish Chabrier as a major force on the Parisian stage and his contemporary Henri Duparc praised him specifically for creating a French comic genre, both funny and musical – described as something of a French Die Meistersinger. The fanciful story is set in an imaginary kingdom and all, naturally, ends well. However, despite the slight plot line L’Étoile is something of a pivotal work, a unique example of French 19th-century light opera, orchestrated with great sophistication and flooded with gossamer wit.

name: Tape20
description: Preview of lost oklahoma monday tape!!!  Never before seen!!

description: 01. Intro (mashup com trechos de "don t say goodbye» "liberdade (quando o grave bate forte)",  "deep down", "piece of your Heart (alok remix), "big jet Plane","alive","byob","Always Fel like")  02. description: 20 days of mania: 4 shows, 3 cities, no sleep, and diving head first into the rift.

description: The Sundays - (live) Electric Factory Philadelphia,Pa 12.2.97

name: The Monster of Phantom Lake: The Musical!
description: Based on the multi-award winning film, "The Monster of Phantom Lake: The Musical!" follows guitar-wielding, a-rockin  scientist Professor Jackson, his smitten graduate student and five swell teenagers as they discover the terrifying effects of "Atomic Waste" in the form of a horribly mutated shell-shocked-World-War-II-soldier/lake algae monster!  "The Monster of Phantom Lake: The Musical!" was filmed in July of 2016, during the play s world premiere run at the historic Mabel Tainter Center for the Arts in Menomonie, Wisconsin!

name: Deluge
description: Deluge is a 2010 post-apocalyptic short film directed by Australian musician Lulu Collard.

name: Life of Agony: Broken Valley
description: From the limited edition release. Featuring exclusive live performances, interviews and in-the-studio footage.

Julie Andrews – Live In Concert
description: Live concert recorded at the Wiltern Theatre in Los Angeles.

description: The entertainer performs and takes audience questions at the University of Pennsylvania s Irvine Auditorium in Philadelphia.

Astutuli
description: Carl Orff opera.

name: Ingenting är sant, allting är möjligt – en liten film om Freddie Wadling
description: Documentary about the Swedish artist Freddie Wadling

name: Sing Along With Frank Woehrle
description: Musician and singer Frank Woehrle performs ten classic songs and you can sing along too!  Featuring guest vocalist Linda Kilty.

name: Ed Gein: The Musical
description: A glimpse inside the mind of one of America s most notorious murderers set to a unique musical score.

name: Passeggiata Disney
description: A procession of Disney characters are followed into a TV broadcasting Station located inside of a sequoia tree.

description: Live performance by Bizkit Park at Pukkelpop 2022

name: Run Lola Run The Jewels Run
description: "Run Lola Run" + "Run The Jewels" + 14 Editors = Run Lola Run The Jewels Run

name: Se nos va
description: A group of friends meet again despite the earthiness. Nature and nostalgia invade your picnic day until the last ray of sun.

name: Ukrainian Freedom Orchestra at The Kennedy Center
description: The Ukrainian Freedom Orchestra brings together Ukrainian musicians from around the world in artistic defense of their homeland. Organized by the Metropolitan Opera and the Polish National Opera in a gesture of solidarity with the victims of the Russian invasion, the orchestra is led by Canadian-Ukrainian conductor Keri-Lynn Wilson, who grew up in Winnipeg, the home of the largest concentration of Ukrainians in North America.

name: Ojos
description: Marisol is a depressed drug addict who, while living alone, remembers when she was surrounded by her loved ones and the time when she was a great artist. Her nostalgia will be interrupted by Sombra, an entity that wanders around her house looking at her, following her and judging her, but Marisol has a limit.

name: Flackstock
description: A CELEBRATION OF CAROLINE FLACK’S LIFE WITH COMEDY, DANCE AND MUSIC - RAISING AWARENESS OF MENTAL HEALTH ISSUES AND FUNDS FOR MENTAL HEALTH CHARITIES

name: Fleddy Melculy: Live at Pukkelpop
description: Live performance at Pukkelpop 2022

name: Rod s Christmas Concert
description: The Old Grey Whistle Test presents Rod s Christmas Concert featuring The Rod Stewart Group performing on stage at The Olympia, London. With a new introduction to the 1976 programme by Bob Harris, the performances include Maggie May, Sailing, Tonight s the Night and I Don t Want to Talk About It.

name: Rammstein: Industrial Angels
description: As one of Germany s most popular musical exports, Rammstein have forged a bold and original new sound for European music. Fusing heavy metal guitar riffs with techno rhythms and machine-like fury of the industrial underground. This biography takes you the bands incarnation, through the controversy and on to what makes them one of the biggest bands in the world.

name: The Red Hot Chili Peppers Phenomenon - The Independent Review
description: This is the powerful critical review of the Red Hot Chili Peppers on record, on stage and on film. Drawing on live performance footage drawn from Woodstock and Red Square, the DVD features rare archive film and extensive interviews with the band, along with the reflections of RHCP insiders and critics, including the first full length interview with former Chilis producer Andy Gill.

name: In Search of Bidesia
description: In Search of Bidesia is a musical documentary on Bhojpuri folk music that connects the history of indentured labour migration from the states of Uttar Pradesh and Bihar to the last living musicians in these states, who are now struggling to ensure these songs of love and longing do not slip into oblivion.

name: Maluma en vivo: Medallo en el Mapa
張智霖我係外星人演唱會
Tennessee Adventure
description: A diverse group of friends meet up at a cabin in Tennessee to party. Antics ensue.

name: The Good Times Are Killing Me
description: Documentary about the rapidly fading Cajun culture in rural Louisiana. About half of the tape focuses on Nathan Abshire, "Mr. Accordion," who performs traditional music with his band and talks about the old life. The other major focus of the tape is the celebration of Cajun Mardi Gras.

name: Bring Me The Horizon Live At Reading And Leeds
description: The metalcore icons perform a riotous headline set.

name: The Planet of Doom
description: Our hero, Halvar the Brave, seeks vengeance aboard a witch-born chopper, journeying across a psychedelic landscape on a quest to defeat the deadly beast Mördvél for the slaying of his bride.

name: Iguana
description: This beat must be on the spectrum.

name: This is the Verve: Do Not Panic
description: 10 classic songs from The Verve shot through the eyes of 10 US cities from NYC to San Francisco. Featuring life on the bus and interviews with the band.

name: Kameleoni - The Beatles of Former Yugoslavia
description: A musical-documentary film about five high school students from Koper who drove Yugoslavia crazy in the late 1960s. Despite a handful of their own original compositions, they filled halls and football stadiums with more than 10,000 visitors. The Ljubljana Exhibition and Convention Center and the Tivoli Hall were opened in Ljubljana. They laid the foundations of the Yugoslav music industry. The Kameleoni pulled back the Yugoslav Iron Curtain and helped the entire generation break free from the shackles of ideological and cultural post-war monumentalism.

name: Norma Loy: Live in the Real
description: Tracks 3, 4, 7 & 11 recorded live, La Locomotive, Paris, july 1992. Tracks 2, 5, 6, 9, 10, 12 & 13 recorded live, Elysée Montmartre, Paris, april 1989. Tracks 1 & 8 recorded live, Atheneum, Dijon, june 1988. Tracks 14-17 are video clips.

description: Highlights of a May 1987 set in Montreux, Switzerland.

description: Animated short film made in pixilation. The film tells the amusing story of an attempt at seduction that is certainly out of the ordinary.

description: 1942 Soundies musical short

description: 1946 Soundies musical short

description: Lew Hearn and Phyllis Kenny perform "Deep in the Heart of Texas"

name: Jammin  in the Panoram
description: Helen Huntley and Stan Kenton and His Orchestra perform "Jammin  in the Panoram."

name: Swingin’ at the Séance
description: 1941 Soundies musical short starring Johnny Long and Helen Young

name: My Lost Horizon
description: Les Brown and His Orchestra perform "My Lost Horizon" with Doris Day

name: Read All My Dreams
description: This short movie consists of the 3 previously released music videos by Sixth June:  "Winter Didn t Come", "Negde neko" and "In Dreams" from their latest album "Trust" (2020).

description: Tracklist 1 Acte I 2 Frustration 3 Cimetière Des Anges 4 Tourment 5 Totem 6 Couloir FC4 7 Les Mains Du Mal 8 Jesus

description: Anne Curtis ends her four-year concert hiatus this June with a Resorts World Manila show.

name: DUMP
description: A bunny in the city runs out of sleeping pills.

the Mountain Goats: the Jordan Lake Sessions (Volume 5)
description: the Mountain Goats, Recorded live in studio at Manifold Recording in Pittsboro, NC, August 2022

name: Symphony No. 5
description: An experimental animated short film of shapes and music notes animated by being drawn directly on Adobe Animate.

name: Queen Live in Rock in Rio
JURASSIC COAST
description: audiovisual experience by seafood diet

name: Projector Visions
description: At night a projector comes alive and takes a journey through the images it displays.

name: The Raincoats, Fairytales – A Work in Progress
description: A documentary about the influential band.

name: Hermaphrodites
description: Swissair (Jari Härkönen, Pietari Koskinen, Mikko Kuusaari, Anton Nikkilä, Juha Soivio and Mika Taanila) were formed in the early 80s. This film (1979-1984) is an oddball summing up of edited-in-camera reels combined with a soundtrack consisting of some dynamite tracks from their punk and post-punk inspired cassette albums.

name: The Collins Kids at Town Hall Party Vol.1
description: We ve heard so much about how great the Collins Kids were on the old Town Hall Party shows, but now there s finally a chance for us all to see just how great they really were. Lorrie looked like an angel and sang like an angel. Larry was among the era s most dynamic performers. He could run, jump, and duckwalk…all while playing a guitar that was almost as big as he was. This DVD really sets the record straight. The Collins Kids might have had no hits, but they were among the brightest stars in early rock  n roll. Here (from 1954-58) they re mostly playing other peoples  hits, blues hits, and pop classics, but they re never outclassed by the originals.

name: Arena: Pete Doherty
description: Pete Doherty, one of the most discussed, intriguing and charismatic pop artists at this time, has always received more attention for his controversial private life than for his music. For several months, a documentary team from the prestigious British television series Arena was given free access to Doherty and filmed him on tour and at his home in London.

name: The River s Edge
description: England educated Dr. Sarath Pathirana (Vijaya Kumaratunga), who is willing to try out new methods to treat his patients, is directed towards a special patient by the Head Doctor (Henry Jayasena) at the mental hospital. This patient is a beautiful girl named Nirmala…

name: Trash Boat: Don t You Feel Amazing?: Album Documentary
description: St Albans  own, Trash boat, filmed the process of creating their third studio album,  Don t You Feel Amazing?  and turned it into a documentary.

name: Paul Pizzera: Sex & Drugs & Klei n kunst
Kendji Girac au Dôme de Paris
A Night of Vivid Escapism
description: Centres around a young man on an epic nightly odyssey through lights and colours - embodying the emotional experience of seeing a resonant film in theatres

name: Who Killed Nancy?
description: "It was fashionable not to know how to play" summarizes François Rousseau aka Jo Ravioli in the Wroomble Experience. Making a career made no sense, the precariousness of living conditions was swept away by the tremendous enthusiasm that fed all the musiciens on the Nancy micro-scene. To document this period, Otomo de Manuel plunged into his own archives, nourished by 40 years of activism, as an artist and organizer.

name: 60 LAL ATENEUM
description: A theatre production in 1988 Poland at the 60 Lat Teatru Ateneum. A rip exists somewhere on the web.

name: Marvin Gaye - Let s get it on
Un hombre bueno
description: A hotel waiter, a femme fatale and a failure.

name: The End of the Road
description: Itinerant Scot performers: One daughter of a veteran trouper weds a ne er do well and dies in childbirth.Her spendthrift man goes but later returns to bleed the old man out of remaining savings.Another daughter makes good as a singer.

name: Le Grand Spectacle du Festival interceltique de Lorient 2022
Pone, sans rémission
description: Pone is the producer of Fonky Family. With his group, he entered the pantheon of French rap. For BrutX, he opens the album of his life. A life of beats, samples and instrumentals but also a life of resilience. For 6 years, Pone has been entirely paralysed by ALS but from his bed, he continues exercizing his passion : music.

name: Mercyful Fate Live - Wacken Open Air 2022
Genesis | Live in London: The Lyceum Tapes May 7, 1980
description: Two nights (May 6th and 7th, 1980) capturing the band with a foot between two worlds — their prog rock roots and their growing pop music sensibilities. Right before their explosion to stadiums and arenas, this intimate show looks back at the band that once was.

name: Ópera villera
description: In several popular neighborhoods of Buenos Aires, opera seduces young people to revitalize themselves with new talents. Mailen is a music teacher who intends to add children and adolescents to the world of music and particularly to the lyrical genre. She thus strives every day to help young people discover a new universe and overcome the enormous obstacles in which they are immersed in their daily lives, while breaking social myths around opera. A story of overcoming through art.

name: Tech N9ne: EuroTech Tour
description: Tech N9ne invites you to join him on his EuroTech Tour as he crosses Europe and spends his summer bringing KC, MO to the world.

name: 萧亚轩2002香港红磡演唱会
Preludia
description: Short film directed by Hieronim Neumann.

name: Up Next On... American Ink @ The Middle East
description: A portrait documentary on Boston-based pop-punk/alt-rock band American Ink with bassist Aidan Crotty, guitarist Michael Romano, and drummer Nick Fauza.

name: I Heard Sarah
description: A troubled rockstar escapes mandated rehab in a desperate attempt to confront his deepest demons.

name: Black District Blues
description: They say that the blues was born from suffering and from a desperate desire to overcome it, through music, through constant aimless travels, drowning in alcohol. If we talk about blues as all this, then Vili Fajdiga s life was a typical blues one. At that time (1920), in Zasavje and Trbovlje, similar social conditions were evidently established as in the American Mississippi Delta, necessary for the birth of blues music. This is a story about a difficult and varied life, creativity, passion, hope, about falls and not always ups and downs, about love for a woman, for music, for life.

name: Baligh’s Music
description: The documentary is about the life of Egyptian composer "Baligh Hamdi", showing both personal and musical sides, and the major artistic influence he left through dozens of songs, starting with Umm Kulthum and ending with his compositions for young singers, to approach his career in chronological sequence in which he captured the Arab hearts for more than fifty years

name: Bleed From Within Live - Wacken Open Air 2022
Emam Tunisia
description: The film reveals an unknown period in Sheikh Imam’s life and his first journey after a long ban. And how a group of young Tunisians in France were interested in making his first record and persevered to meet their favorite artist, who sang with their voice and ideas and formed the awareness of the audience. The film also reveals the Sheikh s separation from his companion Ahmed Fouad Nagem. We see that the Sheikh still lives in their hearts as being  present in their revolution and became popular even to the new generations in Tunisia.

name: Babbling Bess
description: The Chanticleers perform "Babbling Bess."

name: Only in America
description: Hampton Boyer’s short film and Matthew E. White’s EP is a collaboration between two Virginia-based artists about police brutality, white supremacy and systematic racism.

name: Turkey in the Straw
description: Original Schnickelfritz Band perform "Turkey in the Straw."

name: The Skunk Song
description: Cab Calloway and The Cabaliers are singing about how The Big Bad Wolf only talks about his Disney money, Felix the Cat is fat and rich, and Mickey the Mouse is riding in his motor car, while the skunk moans about how "nobody loves me" on account of him just being a "dirty old skunk".

name: Basin Street Boogie
description: Will Bradley s Six Texas Hot Dogs perform "Basin Street Boogie."

name: Some Things Have To Be Said - Halfway (3/3)
description: Third and last part of the musical short film Halfway.

name: The Call Of The Sun - Halfway (2/3)
description: The second part of the musical short film Halfway ( 9 months after the first events).

name: The Ballad of a Great Disordered Heart
description: A collaborative film by Aidan O’Rourke, Becky Manson and Mark Cousins.  A musical melange of fiddles, friendship and a search for home.  An evocative film about Edinburgh’s Old Town and the communities who have called it home. During lockdown, musician Aidan O’Rourke befriended his three octogenarian neighbours, all called Margaret. Inspired by their tales, with a renewed curiosity for his own roots, he takes a musical journey into the meaning of home and belonging. This celebratory film about folk music and its power to connect features a foot-stomping original soundtrack by O’Rourke and live performances by sensational Irish and Scottish folk musicians.

name: Ban Phool
description: The Hindi film starring Kanan Devi and Krishnankant.

name: A Bag of Sentiments
description: A documentary following Kaveret s last tour.

name: Axêro
description: Musical documentary about the trajectory of people of color in Brazil.

name: Hupalo Vasyl
description: Vasyl Hupalo is a superhero who protects the interests of ordinary people. He can be in two phases: Vasyl is an ordinary person, and then he becomes a giant who single-handedly destroys legions of enemies. Both phases differ, in addition to physical size, and eyes... Some researchers call the second phase the "turbo" mode.

name: PLUG PLUG #1 : Quizás Mañana
description: First part of a mini docu series that follows peruvian post-hardcore band Plug Plug

name: Asia in Asia Live at The Budokan Tokyo 1983
description: The second of three shows at the historic Budokan arena in Tokyo, on 6th December 1983, would make history as first live broadcast between Japan and MTV in America, an amazing achievement for its time. This performance has previously only been available on VHS. The concert featured some of ASIA’s biggest and most memorable tracks including, Time Again, Only Time Will Tell, Sole Survivor, Wildest Dreams and the global hit single Heat Of The Moment.

name: Amigo the Devil ─ Caving In: Alive and Alone
description: Your gateway to an intimate set of songs performed in an isolated world eight stories underground. Different from a live show and separate from recorded material, this raw and honest stream promises to be a unique one-of-a-kind experience.

name: Hurricane Casper
description: Taemin, Sihyeong and Jitae’s rock band ‘Hurricane Casper’ perform regularly in stage bars. When they make it to the finals in an audition, the lead singer Taemin is the only one who passes and they all go their separate ways. While Sihyeong and Jitae are searching for a new lead singer, they come across Taemin accidently. Overwhelmed with complex emotions, they recall their old memories on stage together.

name: His Sisters
description: Mohsen has three sisters, the eldest is Karima, who hasn t finished her education and stays at home, the second is Laila, studying at the Faculty of Arts, the third is Souad, a high school student who loves to dance folklore. Mohsen tries to dominate his sisters and control their lives while trying to marry his beloved Nawal.

name: Remember Our Sister
description: In the 1980s, Dongducheon base village. Hong spends a pleasant time with her older sister Yeon-ok. But the hostess disturbs Hong’s perfect daily life.

name: The Second Language
description: Yeonghwa and Myungjin, studying Korean traditional music at the university, suffer from the death of their best friend Yuna. The Yeonghwa tries to share the sadness with Myungjin, but Myungjin keeps avoiding speaking about Yuna s death, and their relationship starts to creak.

name: City of Masks
description: This is the second short film directed by Jack Neo, who created it as an unofficial music video for the Singapore Video Competition in 1988. Neo used musician Lee Wei Song’s original song from his 1987 debut album and also casted Lee in the film. Lee Wei Song is one half of Singapore’s most prolific song writing and music producing twins. Lee won the male category in the singing competition “Talentime 1985/1986” and when offered his first recording contract, he wrote this upbeat title track that describes how a jaded man loses his way in life and conforms to the behaviour of a materialistic and pretentious society.

name: Being a Woman
description: Being a Woman is Singaporean director Jack Neo’s first short film, produced during his time in the Singapore Armed Forces Music & Drama Company (MDC). An unofficial music video played to a same-titled track by Taiwanese 80s songstress Lin Ling, it tells the story of a tomboy who tries to change herself to please her boyfriend but is rejected by him for a more ladylike woman.  According to Jack Neo, the music video helped kickstart his interest in directing and was shot using a VHS camcorder that the MDC had acquired in 1985. The talents in the music video were his colleagues at the MDC and parts of the video were filmed at the former Central Manpower Base in Tanglin Camp on Dempsey Road.

name: Krenek: Karl V
description: Ernst Krenek s theatrical piece Karl V. consisting completely of twelve-tone series should have premiered at the Vienna State Opera. The political situation in the Vienna of 1933 and the fact that Krenek was despised by the Nazis because of this Jazz opera Jonny spielt auf, prevented the première. It only took place five years later in Prague, however Krenek had already emigrated to the USA. Karl V was the last emperor to hold to the idea of a Christian empire in which the sun never set, although its downfall was always inevitable, for numerous reasons. For the second production of Karl V. in the Nationaltheater, Carlus Padrissa in particular seeks out political power systems that are highly topical, and so very precisely analyses the treatment in the theatrical piece. At the core of the intellectually and linguistically highly qualified libretto, written by the composer himself, Karl V. reflects on his life and makes his confession to a young monk below Titian s La Gloria.

name: Mulheres do Rap
description: Two women in their hamlets fight for space in the midst of machismo and oppression. Through rap, they cast their voices on the winding waves of the internet and guide a new debate in the music scene.

name: Sigur Rós: Live At Norður og Niður (Harpa Concert Hall Reykjavík, Island)
description: 127 shows over 19 months in 37 countries on 5 continents - it’s been, as they say, a long strange trip, and tonight it comes to an end with the final show, where else, but in the band s hometown of reykjavík, as the climax of their norður og niður 4-day festival extravaganza. and you can watch it all, live in real time at 8pm gmt, saturday december 30th 2017, via our homepage. the future is unwritten, so be present. over and out.

name: Makes This World Live Young Again
description: Set against a utopian 3D rendering of Singapore, Makes This World Live Young Again is a music video featuring ant mascots in uncanny settings including cruising down the Singapore River on a giant plastic bottle and frolicking in a burning garden. With an infectious soundtrack reminiscent of national education sing-a-longs, the language of a didactic instructional video is enmeshed with universal climate movement aesthetics to hallucinatory effect.

name: All American Rejects: Live at Soundstage
description: Power pop is arguably one of Americas greatest gifts, The All-American Rejects are champions of the genre. Group members Tyson Ritter, Nick Wheeler, Mike Kennerty, and Chris Gaylor made their mark in 2002 with a memorable self-titled debut, which houses the buoyant hit Swing Swing. The All-American Rejects rev high with big, loud guitars and anthemic choruses. Catch the rocking All-American Rejects wave with Dirty Little Secret, Swing Swing, and The Last Song on Soundstage. The All-American Rejects is like a feel-good summer trip on a sunny highway windows down, great pop blaring, and not a care in the world.

name: Stalking Pete Doherty
description: A rockumentary assembled from footage shot by filmmaker Max Carlish. As the title suggests, it is about both attempts by Carlish to interview Pete Doherty.

name: Ζουζούνια: Η Χιονάτη και οι Επτά Νάνοι
Freddie Gibbs - Live at Flow Festival 2022
description: Live at Flow Festival 2022

name: Juliet s Dinner
description: JULIET’S DINNER is a collaborative experimental film between Elsa Wong and Stephanie Jane Burt featuring the track, “Last Day” by Subsonic Eye, which follows the character Juliet who escapes a dinner party through an encounter with an enigmatic dollhouse. Originally created for video art platform Monzoom.xyz in a 12-part series, the video explores notions of identity, pop culture and translocal histories through karaoke and sci-fi aesthetics.

name: JPEGMAFIA - Live at Fuji Rock Festival 2022
Skindred: Rude Boys For Life
description: Documentary about the band Skindred, following the release of their 2015 record, "Volume".

name: Attack of the Baby Doll
description: The eerie tale of a musical theater writer with a mania for doll collecting who conspires with his wanna b-movie actress aunt for a one-of-a-kind baby doll.

name: Through Tears
description: Indie pop artist Justin Carter performs his independent hit "Through Tears".

name: The Singing Kettle: Pirates
description: Wicked Captain Crabelane and his gang of greedy pirates have sneaked aboard the Goodship Singalong and stolen her cargo of precious Singalong Kettles. They ve hidden the booty on Devil s Island and now it s up to Cilla,  Artie and Gary - disguised as pirates themselves - to track down and rescue the kidnapped kettles.

name: Elisabeth: The Rondo of Love & Death
description: Elizabeth- Musical 2016 Cosmos Troupe, Takarazuka  A performance commemorating the 20th anniversary of Japan s premiere.

name: Jacques Brel - Ne me quitte pas
In the Year of Hip Hop
description: In the Year of Hip Hop takes a retrospective look at the Slovenian hip hop/rap music scene. Boris Petkovič explores in great detail the evolution of a music style which, from the very start, has intimately reflected the social situation of its artists. Hip hop has always absorbed the "vibes" of the place where it is taking root, and Slovenia is no exception. According to Petkovič, in today s Slovenia, rap is the one and only form of music that discusses the state of our society and of human relationships without any inhibitions. If rap is not your cup of tea, this film can make you change your mind.

name: Chicago Live In Japan 1995
description: The concert is recorded in Japan in support of the Chicago Night and Day (Big Band) album. Not released and performed with a Japan Big Band ensemble and one of my personal favorites in my Chicago live concert video collection. Setlist:  Band Introductions  Saturday In The Park  Questions 67 and 68  You re The Inspiration  Free  Hard Habit To Break  Colour My World  Look Away  The Making Of Night and Day - Big Band  Night And Day  Chicago  Don t Get Around Much Anymore  Moonlight Serenade  Goody Goody  Make Me Smile  Beginnings  Just You And Me  Does Anybody Rally Know What Time It Is  I m A Man  Hard To Say I m Sorry  In The Mood  25 Or Six To 4  If You Leave Me Now

name: The Ballet of Othello
description: The Moorish general Othello is manipulated into thinking that his new wife Desdemona has been carrying on an affair with his lieutenant Michael Cassio when in reality it is all part of the scheme of a bitter ensign named Iago.

name: Bianca Wu Body n Soul Concert 2015
Laskar Semut Merah
description: This children s musical drama film tells the story of the friendship and adventures of five girls who call their group the Red Ants. In the midst of the excitement of participating in scouting activities in the forest, they do not realize the danger that is threatening.

name: Roni Size & Reprazent. Maida Vale 1997
description: Live session recorded at Maida Vale studios and broadcast on both Radio 1 & BBC2 as part of BBC2 s Radio 1 night.

name: Şebnem Ferah 10 Mart 2007 İstanbul Bostancı Gösteri Merkezi Konseri
Burnout
description: A dilapidated Australian truck stop diner is the setting for a whiskey-voiced rumination on life and love. An official selection of the 2000 Sundance Film Festival.

name: Bad Habit Ultimate Collection 1987 - 2009
description: A collection of video clips and behind the scenes footage tracing the history of Swedish AOR rockers Bad Habit, from their formation in 1987 through to 2009.  1		Need Somebody 2		More Than a Feeling 3		Never Find Another You 4		Rainbow 5		Another Night 6		Alive 7		Walk Of Life 8		I Don t Want you 9		Above And Beyond

name: Mob Rules Signs of the Times
description: Live show filmed in the band s hometown of Wilhemshaven during the European tour supporting their "Among the Gods" studio album.

name: Mitch Malloy Live From Rock City
description: Recorded live at Firefest V, at Nottingham s Rock City on October the 26th 2008.  The show featured Mitch Malloy on vocals and guitar, the legendary Tommy Denander on guitar, Victor Broden on bass, and Magnus Ulfstedt on drums.

name: Pantera: [1991] Live in Moscow
description: A video containing live performances by AC/DC, Metallica, The Black Crowes, Pantera and E.S.T. in the Tushino Airfield in Moscow, during the implosion of the Soviet Union.

name: A Nova Estrela
description: Sugestives images about the music A Nova Estrela by Wagner Tiso.

name: The Poet
description: The life story of the great Russian poet Aleksandr Sergeevich Pushkin.

name: The Push Kings - Live at Green Street Grill
description: Following their album release show, The Push Kings hit the road and continue playing a hit-filled set list - this time, at Green Street Grill.

name: where time stood still
description: A girl reminiscences the conversations and past memories by listening to a vinyl left behind by her dead lover.

name: Beethovens Blätterwirbel - The Lost Music
description: A musical hunt for lost Beethoven manuscripts.  Shown during the intermission of 2020 New Year s Day Concert from Vienna.

name: YENA [SMARTPHONE] Showcase
description: Yena’s first comeback!

name: Christmas Burns Red
description: This year our annual Christmas Show will be a livestream event! We are busting out all the stops for this one! Lights, decorations...maybe even snow?

name: Ticket to the Divine Comedy
description: The musical film by director, actor, musician and choreographer Anton Adasinsky was created at the junction of cinema, music, theater and video art. This is a fairy tale-parable, where the theme of Dante s "Divine Comedy" is intertwined with reality. A fairy tale for children and adults. Only Children and Birds can get to the place where the World Clock broke. Taking the magic notes with them, they, having passed through all the adversities and obstacles, will find themselves at the goal. But is it necessary to fix the Running of Time? Maybe not to rush to grow up?

name: Bile: When the Dead Come Home
description: Dark industrial metal band Bile mix up live and promotional video work on WHEN THE DEAD COME HOME. Much of the live material has a bootleg feel to it, and is interspersed with some interesting backstage and behind the scenes footage. The concert footage is shot in New York City, and as the band hail from the Big Apple there is naturally a heightened sense of fervor from the audience and band alike.

name: Tom Jones – Live At This Moment
description: Live concert footage featuring 16 songs spanning Tom Jones  career including: "It s Not Unusual", "Kiss", "Delilah", "Green, Green Grass of Home", "What s New Pussycat?" "Move Closer", "Satisfaction" and "Help Yourself".

name: Cómo bailar en un mundo raro
description: A homeless person causes repulsion among people, a child dancer is the laughing stock of others. This is a story of friendship and acceptance despite appearances.

name: Song of Africa
description: fantasy tale about a young Zulu who leaves his village to go to the city, falls in love with the new music he hears there, and returns home to form a Zulu jazz band.  The South African production and distribution company African Films followed up the success of Zonk! with Song of Africa. This is a fantasy tale about a young Zulu who leaves his village to go to the city, falls in love with the new music he hears there, and returns home to form a Zulu jazz band – which then goes to the city to compete with other bands, and comes out on top. As in the earlier films, the impact of American jazz and popular music is enormous.  Like African Jim and Zonk!, Song of Africa draws on the best talent from the townships. Director Emil Nofal and director of photography Dave Millin ensure high production values, making it an above-average B-movie.

name: Dame Shirley Bassey: BBC Electric Proms
description: Dame Shirley Bassey graced the Roundhouse stage with a unique performance celebrating 50 years at the top of show business.

name: The Push Kings - Live At TT The Bear s
description: The Push Kings are back in action, this time live at Boston venue TT The Bear s. They celebrated their sophomore release, Far Places, with this hour-long setlist containing hits both old and new!

name: Paul Young | Live at Rockpalast
description: Young and his band, tagged The Royal Family, appeared live on Rockpalast in Essen on 30th March 1985.

name: Summer Sensation
description: A showcase of summer sensations and desire.

name: The Curse of Fred Astaire
description: Modern Faust story of a tall, overweight man who longs to be a tap-dancer.

name: The Place between Heaven and Hell
description: After losing his parents to a terrible accident, singer and musician Liam must put his life on hold in order to help raise his little sister Sheila.

name: Cogumelo 35 Anos
description: Remembering that this documentary is not an official documentary by Cogumelo Records, which aims to launch an official project about its history soon.  I would like to take this opportunity to apologize to the bands and people who were not mentioned in the documentary, as it is impossible to cover everyone, especially the way we work, without sponsorship, without a producer, with our own resources. I hope you understand.

name: Allegro Vivace
description: With the loss of their music sheet, the protagonist is trying to find a way of winning back what is theirs.

name: Maize
description: A stylized take on a man preparing his breakfast cereal in his home.

name: Il Nascimento dell Aurora
description: Olympian gods and nymphs are celebrating Aurora s birth in the Vale of Tempe, crossed by the river Peneo. They praise her features in verse and song, comparing them to rivers and flowers. The text is anonymous and hints at a regal birth, probably Maria Theresa of Austria s in 1717.

name: The two minute film inspired by unknown filmmakers
description: A musical kaledioscopic slow shuttered psychedelic short

name: Nothing But Thieves :: Road to the O2
description: A documentary concert film chronicling British band Nothing But Thieves  journey to their biggest performance yet.

name: Velho Amigo - O Universo Musical De Baden Powell
description: Documentary on Brazilian guitarist Baden Powell.

name: Ivan & Alyosha: Live at Benaroya Hall with the Seattle Symphony
description: In March 2021, Ivan & Alyosha had the amazing opportunity to perform with the Seattle Symphony as part of its Essential Series. After months of work and the show being cancelled and rescheduled due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, the performance was live-streamed from Benaroya Hall in Seattle, Washington. This documentary captured the band’s time with the symphony.

name: Il Combattimento di Tancredi e Clorinda
description: Monteverdi s mini-opera, starring Cathy Berberian.

name: Black Mountain - Rockpalast Freak Valley Festival

description: Yumi works at a record store, dreams about Kurt Cobain could take her away from the boring life she lives. As she is approaching 27 years old, she begins to think about what can she do to resist the social norms.

name: Captain Henry s Radio Show
description: Recreation of the popular radio show "The Maxwell House Show Boat" offers us a variety show of singers, including a syrupy duet version of "Please" and two white actors in blackface. They are billed as "Molasses and January", and do a routine about a horse race. It won t play well to a modern audience, alas.

name: Sugar Chile  Robinson, Billie Holiday, Count Basie and His Sextet
description: Short film featuring performances by Frank "Sugar Chile" Robinson, Billie Holiday and Count Basie and his sextet. From the Cinema Apart Collection.

name: O komínku zedníky laškovně nakřivo postaveném aneb Souboj pantátův se zedníky
Soul II Soul
description: At London s Metropolis Studios, the British R&B collective Soul II Soul performs some of their smash hits, including the chart-topper "Back to Life".

name: Life Support In Concert
description: Life Support In Concert is the first virtual concert by Madison Beer.

name: Kill A Criminal in His Marriage Ceremony
When A Woman Sings
description: A documentary about the singing movement in Egypt, and on the role of the song in the social and political conflict, as it shows the lives of Umm Kulthum and Munira al-Mahdiyya and their impact on the women s liberation movement and on the field of singing in the Arab world

name: Twenty One Pilots: Live at Southside Music Festival 2022
description: Twenty One Pilots take to the stage to perform a range of songs from their discography at Southside Music Festival

name: Fair To Midland – Live @ Andy s Bar
description: Recorded live at Andy s Bar in Denton, TX on March 31st, 2012.

name: Fair to Midland - Welcome to the Dirt
description: 45 minutes of select footage from 2007 to 2011 made for our fans by our fans.

name: Fair to Midland – Live at The Machine Shop
description: Over an hour of live HD footage and behind the scenes footage from our live DVD recording at the Machine Shop on December 17th, 2011.

name: Three Dates with Genesis
description: Documentary covering three gigs during Genesis  1978  And Then There Were Three...  tour.

name: What Happened in Larisa? A Music Story About Nat Birchall
description: Nat Birchall is one of the most important representatives of the British Jazz scene. Costas Voultsidis is the inspirer of Duende Jazz Bar in Larissa, in 2009. The documentary traces their paths and focuses on the creation of the legendary album Nat Birchall Quintet: Live In Larissa, which received universal acclaim from audiences and critics in 2014. It is an album that became the reason for a deep human relationship and created new perspectives in the career of the unconventional artist Nat Birchall. It was the year that many music lovers wondered: “Where is Larissa? What happened in Larissa?”

name: Jacky Cheung A Classic Tour - Finale Taipei 《學友·經典世界巡迴演唱會》台北站再見篇
Leyenda Viva
description: A musical journey hand in hand with some of the great composers of the vallenato region. What is Vallenato? Where was it born? What is the vallenato triphony? What were the so-called juglares? What is the role of women in vallenato? Is it true that "Cien años de soledad" is a vallenato? What is the future of vallenato?

name: Doja Cat: Hot Pink Sessions
description: Doja Cat shares performances of her hit songs Streets, Juicy and Talk Dirty with her fans.

name: He Was Her Man
description: A dancer is jealous for her lover.

name: Ave Maria
description: In the garden of a convent, Mme. Frances Alda enters, prays before a statue of the Virgin Mary, and sings "Ave Maria" from Otello (Verdi).

name: I m a Creative Animal - A Portrait of Barbara Hannigan
description: The film follows Canadian singer, conductor and actress Barbara Hannigan backstage in an attempt to reveal the secret behind this wild, fearless and remarkably versatile woman.

name: Spring Waltz
description: A young musician lives in an apartment where noise is duly prohibited by her neighbors and she is thus forced to live in silence. One day, a new tenant moves into the apartment above. Also a musician, he does not intend to live by the neighbors’ complaints.

name: CROSBY, STILLS & NASH Live 1990: MTV Unplugged, Nov.8th
description: Chapter 1: MTV Unplugged 8 November 1990 (stereo):  1. Wasted on the way - 2:50  2. Helplessly hoping - 2:35  3. 4+20 - 2:25  4. Daylight again/Find the cost of freedom - 3:55  5. Suite: Judy Blue Eyes - 9:00

name: Third World - Live at Uprising Festival 2019
description: Legendary Jamaican reggae band Third World live and direct at the 12th annual Uprising Festival in Bratislava, Slovakia.

name: The Last Summer Nut
description: Two friends eat nuts while listening to classical music. Their enjoyment is interrupted when they discover there s only one left. They then start a chase to see who gets to keep it, influenced by the frenetic piece of music that is playing.

name: Lacee
description: Four talented girls from different backgrounds form a R&B group with the intentions of being the best. They will soon find out that their dark journey consists of sex, power, and betrayal.

name: Ievan Polkka
description: With her synthesized voice and trusty leek, the acclaimed virtual diva Miku Hatsune, as a clay figure, sings "Ievan Polkka." However, would thinking the song would end without incident be a little too hopeful?

name: Nature We & I
description: A solo performance work for voice & guitars. Exploring, what we do, what we miss in life s pursuits. Delving one person’s interactions with the nature that’s surrounding them, as they make there way in New York City. Witnessing some of the lessons learned about an individual’s nature, human nature, and the consequences of how we are living in this moment.

name: Live From London: Pete Shelley
description: Recorded in 1986, Pete Shelley (the leader of the seminal punk band The Buzzcocks) performs solo as part of the  Live from London  series.

name: Live From London: The Belle Stars
description: Recorded in 1984 at the peak of their fame, the group treated the audience to a high tempo and energetic set featuring their greatest hits including ‘The Clapping Song’, ‘Sweet Memory’ and ‘Sign of the Times’.

name: First Avenue: Closer to the Stars
description: A possibly true story of the legendary Minneapolis nightclub First Avenue. Prince may have made the club famous, but many others have toiled backstage to keep this landmark standing. From the days of Woodstock, through disco, punk, and hip-hop this "pirate ship that goes nowhere" has weathered the storm - just barely. Discover the story of a Minneapolis nightclub that launched the careers of Hüsker Dü, the Replacements, Semisonic, Soul Asylum and more. The film includes images and interviews of an array of musicians and bands that have played the club. From the days of Woodstock, through disco, punk and hip-hop, this "pirate ship that goes nowhere" has weathered the storm to become a part of music history.

name: Chet Baker in Tokyo
description: This performance by legendary jazz horn player Chet Baker was recorded in Tokyo, Japan on June 14, 1987, and features such classics as "Stella by Starlight," "My Funny Valentine," and "I m a Fool to Want You." Accompanying Baker in the performance are Harold Danko on piano, Hein van de Gein on bass, and John Engels on drums.

name: Carnival of Excess
description: You won t see any of the bloodshed and mayhem for which GG s live performances were known, nor any of the spectacle that has helped create a cult around his public persona since his death in 1993. This is GG at his most candid, talking about his life and his art, as well as the baggage that goes with being GG Allin. The footage, pictures and music are from time spent with GG in Charlotte, North Carolina and Tampa, Florida.

name: EVERYONE MEET HERE
description: Lo-fi documentary feature chronicling the writing and recording of Nathan Veshecco s sixth studio album, EVERYONE MEET HERE (2011), featuring interviews with Veshecco and their collaborators, family, and friends.

name: Concert Tour 2015 “THE BEST” DEARS & TEARS
description: Following the release of her best-of albums DEARS and TEARS last year, Nakashima Mika embarked on a nationwide tour in the beginning of 2015. The tour saw the songstress perform her biggest hits for over 80,000 fans, and now audiences can enjoy the enchanting concert experience on home video in Mika Nakashima Concert Tour 2015 "THE BEST" DEARS & TEARS, featuring Always, Candy Girl, Life, Glamorous Sky and Yuki no Hana.

name: Pub: The Movie
description: The outrageous true story of Australian cartoonist and punk rocker, Fred Negro, creator of PUB, the cartoon strip that chronicled the history of the St Kilda music scene that spawned the likes of Nick Cave and The Birthday Party and his own controversial shock-rock band, I SPIT ON YOUR GRAVY.

name: Utada: In the Flesh 2010
description: Concert tour by Japanese-American singer Utada Hikaru.

name: On Tour: Big Sandy & His Fly Rite Boys
description: Rockabilly Hall of Fame band, Big Sandy & His Fly Rite Boys, performed their rockabilly, rock & roll, honky-tonk, R&B, soul and doo-wop music around the world many times in the past 25 years. This rockin’ quartet is often considered torch bearers of American roots music. In this episode, we explore the plethora of song elements in their vast category and experience the inspirations of the man behind the band, “Big Sandy”. On Tour is a music and performance program recorded live on location at local venues in PA, NJ & DE.

name: Musiclove
description: In a modern world, Cupid tries to make certain characters fall in love with his accurate arrow, but they prove to him that they don t need the mischievous little angel to choose their soul mate.

name: On Tour: The Waterboys
description: The Waterboys, led by Mike Scott, is said to defy genre. With influences of Celtic, folk and rock, Scott insists on keeping the band’s songwriting fresh with creative new ideas and explosive instrumentation. In this episode, we learn about the realization of a 20-year dream, as the band performs hits like “The Whole of the Moon” and others. On Tour is a music and performance program recorded live on location at local venues in PA, NJ & DE.

name: On Tour: Southern Culture on the Skids
description: Southern Culture on the Skids have always embodied a raucous, good natured, good time take on the culture of the South. SCOTS play a unique hybrid of Americana, surf, rockabilly and swamp pop while entertaining fans with their Southern fried chicken flinging’ trashabilly antics. In this episode, even the audience engaged in antics on and off the stage. On Tour is a music and performance program recorded live on location at local venues in PA, NJ & DE.

name: λ
description: Animated music video to Marco Tontodonati s "λ" from the 2022 album "HYBERNATION".

name: HBD Purple Rain
description: Recontextualized version of Purple Rain with video artists from five continents building vignettes around each song on the Purple Rain LP.

name: Music of Tables
description: A short film for three pairs of hands and three tables, based on a notable composition by the director.

name: Arc – A Dance Trilogy
description: ARC is a trilogy of solo dance works created and performed by acclaimed New Zealand choreographer Douglas Wright.

name: The Byrds: That s for The Byrds
description: This Belgian studio concert by the Byrds features some of their biggest hits. The setlist includes  Lover of the Bayou,   You Ain t Goin  nowhere,   Truck Stop Girl,  and more.

name: New Order: Rox Box
description: Go back to 1985 for a concert by one of the most influential and acclaimed bands of the era, New Order. The genius of the band s post-punk, electronic, and dance music is on full display in front of an appreciative crowd. Touring in support of Low-Life, this concert was produced for Belgian Television music program, Rox Box.

name: Be Here Soon
description: The fourth audiovisual installment in the iamamiwhoami project by Swedish singer-songwriter Jonna Lee and producer Claes Björklund.

name: Virtual Mirages
description: Virtual Mirages is a trilogy that includes three music and dance films written and directed by Marikki Hakola. The films have been digitally visualized using virtual staging.

name: Ivy Gold - Live at the Jovel 2021
description: 2022, FIRST TOUR – FIRST LIVE RECORDING! After the phenomenal debut, the multinational bluesrock band is back with their first live recording!  In November 2021, IVY GOLD played their very first live shows with the awesome studio line-up and the show in Münster @ Jovel was recorded live on stage. The „Jovel“ is an amazing venue that was founded in 1979 by Sfeffi Stephan from the Udo Lindenberg Band. Over the years, people experienced many unforgettable concert highlights with bands such as the Simple Minds or Miles Davis. Now the „Jovel“ has also become IVY GOLD’s home and is perpetuated on the bands DVD „Live at the Jovel“. IVY GOLD took care of a huge production including 6 high end live cameras and some extra fancy light scenarios. The audio mix & mastering was done by Yossi Shakked in Los Angeles.

name: Nazi Hate Rock
description: Donal MacIntyre investigates the secretive world of white power music and how the money made helps fund far right political organizations in many countries, including the British National Party in the UK. In this documentary, the crew gained access to the men and women behind one of the most disturbing musical movements. It reveals how British neo-Nazis and skinheads plan to launch  Project School-Yard  in Britain after a similar scheme was tried out in the United States. In the UK, the team follows one of the most infamous British white-power bands, Whitelaw, as they prepare for one of the biggest gigs of their career. The band are filmed on stage, with riot police surrounding the venue, performing as the forces of law and order move in to shut down their hate-filled act. The film also contains shocking images of hate rock concerts in the USA where, thanks to the first amendment protecting freedom of speech, anything goes.

name: trf TOUR  95 dAnce to positive Overnight Sensation
description: trf TOUR  95 dAnce to positive Overnight Sensation was a nationwide tour held by trf in 1995. The shows were held in support of their studio album of the same name, dAnce to positive.

name: G. F. Händel: La Resurrezione – Vzkříšení
La Symphonie des jeux vidéo aux Chorégies d Orange
Story of an Icon
description: A documentary about singing-life of the greatest artist in Saudi Arabia, Mohammad Abdu.  Edited, written , and directed by:  Turki Alharbi.

name: Flow Time s Long Live Music Vol.1
description: A new way to enjoy music by sharing the love of music in this new experience brought to us by FlowTimes and Jerryraveloo

name: Virgo – Long Story Short
description: VIRGO is the story of an artist named NIX, known in his country for his music but also for his tumultuous relationships with women. He decides to make a spiritual retreat in Casamance (south of Senegal), but his last love affair haunts him regularly during his stay. This is an immersion in the thoughts and memories of an artist visibly torn, who tries to rebuild himself with the pieces of a break-up.

name: Girl in Red at Glastonbury 2022
description: Girl in Red performing on stage at Glastonbury 2022.

name: Clinching a Sale
description: Harry Richman stars in this bizarre comedy musical short. I say bizarre because he is a door-to-door broom salesman who sings to make sales. However, his potential sale (June O Dea) is not an easy one, as she complains that the previous door-to-door salesman was more impressive...so Richman brings out a trio to accompany him. But this lady is no pushover...so what will he need to do to clinch the sale?

name: The Metropolitan Opera: Don Giovanni
description: Tony Award–winning director Ivo van Hove makes a major Met debut with a new take on Mozart’s tragicomedy, re-setting the familiar tale of deceit and damnation in an abstract architectural landscape and shining a light into the dark corners of the story and its characters. Maestro Nathalie Stutzmann makes her Met debut conducting a star-studded cast led by baritone Peter Mattei as a magnetic Don Giovanni, alongside the Leporello of bass-baritone Adam Plachetka. Sopranos Federica Lombardi, Ana María Martínez, and Ying Fang make a superlative trio as Giovanni’s conquests—Donna Anna, Donna Elvira, and Zerlina—and tenor Ben Bliss is Don Ottavio.

name: Mother Love Bone: The Love Bone Earth Affair
description: The home video features never-before-seen footage of Mother Love Bone live in concert combined with previously unreleased interviews with frontman Andrew Wood, bassist Jeff Ament, and guitarist Stone Gossard. The documentary covers the band s formation and its eventual disbandment due to the death of Wood. Additionally, the videos for "Stardog Champion" and "Holy Roller" are included.

name: Ahi Ataahua
description: This performance-based film could potentially be filed under  Pasifika tribal fusion . Cinematographer Waka Attewell captures the talents of percussion group Strike (including then long-haired composer Gareth Farr) and choreographer/dancer Mika.

name: Red Hook
description: In the slums of postwar Brooklyn, three city-dwellers contemplate the weight of their desires, as they prepare for the impending prison release of the enigmatic and villainous High Roller.

name: Dreamcatcher at Primavera Sound 2022
description: Dreamcatcher concert film, Spain 2022.

name: 14 Video Paintings
description: 14 Video Paintings is comprised of two separate works ("Mistaken Memories of Mediaeval Manhattan" and "Thursday Afternoon") created in the early 80s by Brian Eno for art gallery exhibition only. Viewers are presented with a series of slowly evolving "video paintings," with "Thursday Afternoon" focusing on the human figure and "Mistaken Memories" on the Manhattan skyline. The music for "Thursday Afternoon" is a different version than what appears on Eno s album of the same name, while the music that accompanies "Mistaken Memories" comes from two of his acclaimed ambient albums (On Land and Music For Airports) and features an unreleased track.

name: Sid: The Final Curtain
description: Short film documenting the final live performance of Sex Pistols bassist Sid Vicious at Max s Kansas City in Sept. 1978 featuring rare live footage and exclusive interviews from those who witnessed it.

name: Bebe Rexha Live: On the Record
description: In advance of the release of her album Expectations, Bebe Rexha appeared before hometown fans in New York to perform material from the album, including "I m a Mess" and "Shining Star" and some older hits like "Me, Myself & I." Between songs, she gives some inspirational advice to the crowd.

name: IS EVERYTHING OK? - Tilly Birds | Cinematic Virtual Concert
description: Cinematic Virtual Concert for thai band s latest album.

name: MANKAI STAGE『A3!』Troupe LIVE ~AUTUMN 2021~
description: In Autumn Troupe Live, the music that was shown at "Four Seasons LIVE 2020" and the new songs recorded in the album released on October 13, 2021 will be performed by the cast members.

name: MANKAI STAGE『A3!』Troupe LIVE ~SPRING 2021~
description: In Spring Troupe Live, the music that was shown at "Four Seasons LIVE 2020" and the new songs recorded in the album released on June 16, 2021 will be performed by the cast members.

name: Belle & Sebastian: The Party Line
description: The official music video for Belle and Sebastian s "The Party Line."

name: Country s Family Reunion: Precious Memories (Vol. 1)
description: We’ve created Precious Memories, a two volume collection to remember the lives of the members we ve lost since we started over a decade ago.  STARRING Chet Atkins,  Ben Colder, Goldie Hill, Box Car Willie,  Roy Drusky, Billy Walker,  Del Reeves, Bill Carlisle

name: Accept - Live at Rock Hard Festival
description: Live at Rock Hard Festival 2022

name: Unlucky Morpheus - Live 2017
description: A live DVD that packages the ever-evolving current status of Unlucky Morpheus. It includes the band s overwhelming superlative technique and aggressive performance.

name: Shakthi
description: Shakthi is a politician s chauffeur who is always misunderstood by his father and his love interest, Manasi. As he is uneducated and struggles to make a mark professionally, his personal life witnesses a surprising turn.

name: Blackwater
description: Promo video for Rain Tree Crow

name: A Private Music Lesson with Yvonne Loriod
description: Yvonne Loriod was not only an incredible performer of the music of her time, but also Olivier Messiaen s muse, the one in whom and for whom he found the natural and concrete extension of his art, of his inspiration. This documentary is a beautiful testament to what this great artist represented.

name: Jeremy s Christmas Tree
description: Based on a children s picture book of the same name. A Christmas tale about a bird who was raised by tree after it was abandoned. The tree was then cut down for people in the city to use for Christmas celebrations. The bird desperately is trying to find its adoptive tree mother with the help of Jeremy, a penniless orphan, who heard her story so they go and search every tree being used in town. The search in the cold takes a toll on Jeremy until Santa Claus appears, but is it really him?

name: Live in Memphis
description: Including previously unreleased live performances from her multi-platinum album Falling into You, this 17 song concert-length program also features a rare performance of "The Power of the Dream" written exclusively for the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta, Georgia, and The Isley Brothers song "Twist and Shout". Dion also performed "River Deep, Mountain High".

name: The Ruins Of Beverast - Au Hellfest 2022
Soul Intact
description: Intentional messaging addressing the power of group economics in the Black community. It’s a “medicine in the candy” approach to delivering an action plan that has proven effective.

name: Falling Down Stairs
description: Renowned cello virtuoso Yo-Yo Ma embarks on an intense year long collaboration with choreographer Mark Morris, which culminates in a spectacular performance.

name: A Music Video...
description: [Plot kept under wraps]

name: Céline: 3 Boys and a New Show
description: Reveals intimate behind-the-scenes look at Celine Dion as she creates her new Las Vegas show and balances motherhood.

name: Comeback Kid au hellfast 2022
description: Canadians Comeback Kid have just released the album Heavy Steps. Only one place to celebrate the release of this new gem: the Hellfest Warzone. Comeback Kid focuses the energy of Stuart Ross and Jeremy Hiebert on guitar, Andrew Neufeld on vocals, Matt Keil on bass and Jesse Labovitz on drums. The five acolytes arrive from Winnipeg, Canada s seventh city. Being born far from the usual epicenters of Hardcore did not prevent Comeback Kid from conquering the whole of North America and even the whole world! Inducted in 2003 by the album Turn It Around, the Canadians of Comeback Kid are the darlings of the hardcore scene. Energetic and unifying, the quintet s music hits the mark every time: it s impossible not to nod your head and tap your foot while listening to "Die Tonight", "GM

name: Lagu Untukmu
description: Containing eight songs, the film is like TV variety show of music and singers. Charma, an architecture student, falls in love with Anita. Thanks to advice from Bagio Sumarto, an old artist, Charma manages to win Anita, even though her mother, who has a royal lineage, considers that an artist would lower the family’s prestige. It was a strange assumption, present at the time of the film’s production. Charma then helps Bagio realise his dream of building a village for artists by staging a big successful show. And Anita turns out to be the daughter of Bagio who has long been separated from his wife.

name: DARK DAYS
description: When it comes to self-promotion, no one can beat Blackout Problems: On their website and social media clips, white roses, gas masks and burning shopping wagons. On YouTube, the well-designed studio documentary "Dark Days", thick with pathos, is a gripping introduction to the third long player by the Munich-based band.

name: Siddhartha at the end of the road
description: In a small house, spending his last years is Millapol, my music teacher for many years. After more than a year without seeing each other, we resumed our Sitar classes, delving into his last teachings and his eternal legacy as a Guru.

name: Discos High
description: A musical drama about a dull woman working at a music office who struggles to produce a music video for an unsuccessful band.

name: 何韻诗 Hocc 《你尚未成為的》Shouson Live 2021 演唱会
Burr: A New Muscial
description: Following his duel with Alexander Hamilton, Vice President Aaron Burr devises a plan to lead the first secession in US history.

name: From Heart to Heart
description: A short message between a boy and a girl.

name: Simfoni Satu Tanda
description: Darsono, the son of a poor farmer, fights against many difficulties and challenges to reach his dream. His father does not understand the importance of education. Even so this barrier never diminish the hope of his future and dreams he builds together with Jamhari, his best friend since childhood, who always support him. His friendship with Jamhari and the struggle to tackle the poverty, social conflicts in society, and his affair with Ika become a unity of signs in his symphony of life.

name: Built to Spill: Hi, How Are You - Live at the Moody Theater
description: Built to Spill plays a special, 4-song set at the Hi, How Are You Project benefit, a foundation set up in memory of Daniel Johnston to end the stigma around Mental Health conversations. Filmed live at the Moody Theater in Austin Texas in 2019.

name: Magie des Étoiles
description: A play by King James VI of Scotland, re-imagined in ancient Athens.

name: Tammy Wynette and Country Sisters: Legends In Concert
description: Tammy Wynette is joined in this fabulous performance with eight of her lovely singing sisters, with twenty one tracks of pure country pleasure. Tammy s line-up of country sisters includes Gail Davies with a number of her top hits and Lyn Paul with number one hit  Stand By Your Man.  Tammy also plays some of her number one hits such as "Till I Can Make It On My Own  and  Womanhood  in this unforgettable hour long show.

name: Charlie Rich and Friends: Legends In Concert
description: In this unforgettable television special, we have some of the finest performances by some of America s greatest country rock singers. Featuring 19 great songs by Charlie Rich and his friends. Charlie s charm and unique country-rock sound helps to make this an epic performance to watch. Nicknamed  The Silver Fox  due to his unique charm, Charlie performs hits such as  Big Boss Man,   Let s Take It Nice And Easy  and  Behind Closed Doors.

name: Old Time Rock  n  Roll: Legends In Concert
description: Some of the biggest Rock and Roll stars are united on this mesmerizing compilation. Recorded at the Rock and Roll Palace, artists who performed include Brian Hyland with  Ginny Come Lately,   The Dovells  with  The Bristol Stomp, Del Shannon with  Runaway  and many more.

name: Bellamy Brothers & Friends: Legends In Concert
description: One of the most successful duos in the history of country music, who pushed the borders and included elements of rock, reggae and even rap. Their first hit  Let Your Love Flow   in 1975 topped the pop charts and gained recognition throughout the  80s.  Eighteen unforgettable tracks, including  If I Said You Had A Beautiful Body," "Sugar Daddy" and "Redneck Girl." Directed by Bayron Binkley and Dennis Glore and recorded at Church Street Station.

name: Johnny Cash: Legends In Concert
description: Johnny Cash - The Man In Black - His Early Years  Johnny Cash has been described as one of the most influential figures in country music history. Achieving over 100 hit singles in the United States, he was to become one of the biggest stars through the 50 s to the 70 s.
