description: The protagonist hates the Japanese hiragana letter "hee." Just the sight of it bothers her. But one day, she finds herself in a parallel world where the same syllabary lives a spectacular life.

name: Stay Inside: The Mini Musical
description: From the minds of Kyle Hanagami (director/choreographer) and Toby Marlow & Lucy Moss (writers/composers of SIX on Broadway), comes the romantic comedy musical, Stay Inside.

name: Torpedo: The Musical
description: Recife, in Brazil, is the capital of brega, but it is also the capital of drama. Iconic songs from the band “Torpedo” are part of the soundtrack that accompanies the decision that Blair will have to make: regain Nate or stay with Chuck, her best friend.

name: Resterà con te
description: Every expectant mother dreams of a bright future for the child she is carrying. As in anticipation, a shooting star falls from a night sky, tracing the dreams of mothers and fathers alike.

name: The House Where We Grew Up
description: This time capsule was shot shortly after the release of Raising Your Voice... Trying to Stop an Echo (2006) by one of Marc s old friends, Travis Winkler.

name: Lakhmi
description: Based on “Shahar Theke Doore”, a Bengali story by Sailajananda Mukherjee

name: Saturday Night Square Dance
description: "Saturday Night Square Dance" was released in 1949 as a Soundie. Featured here are Jim Boyd and His Men of the West. Jim Boyd was the brother of Bill Boyd, well known for western swing music, and this film combines some western swing music with calls. The footage shows some fine examples, like the styling sometimes called the Abilene Lift.

name: The Devil Wears Prada Live: ZII UNDEADSTREAM
description: The Devil Wears Prada performed their recently released Zombie II EP in its entirety during a special live stream event on May 15th, 2021.

name: David Bowie - The Plastic Soul Review
description: There were 3 distinct periods in the life of David Bowie during the 1970s. The first of course consisted of his Glam years, defined best by the startling Ziggy Stardust album. At the other end of the decade came the Berlin trilogy three dark, industrial yet ambient and often joyous works. But sandwiched between these is what has come to be known via the man s own comments as the Plastic Soul Era, an era just as creative, magnificent and popular as any other during Bowie s career, yet one rarely considered as a stand alone and separate entity within his complete body of work.

name: Ray Charles: A Man & His Soul
description: A special celebrating Ray Charles  40 years in show business, taped at the Cocoanut Grove club in LA in the early summer of 1983.

name: Daniel Balavoine 35 ans déjà - sa vie, sa bataille
Perry Como s Christmas in New York
description: Perry Como takes the Big Apple for Christmas.

name: Bug Tangmo
description: Runaway billionaire found true love, But the obstacle is her mother and his rival.

name: Monk
description: To whom does a monk raise a glass? To whom does he read his prayers? When the sun sits down the river, everything becomes gray and it s more difficult to distinguish between white and black and the borderline between them. The monk crosses this line in search of the answer.

name: The Get Up!
description: One-Time-Only Global Livestream Scripted by Charlie Higson Featuring Live Music, Classic Madness Songs, New Madness Songs, Comedy, Mike Barson as HRH Queen Elizabeth II and Some Very, Very Special Guests.

name: Worm and Piuui
description: Worm synth and musical saw drone performance at the Ground Floor Arts Centre, March 2019.

name: All You Can Eat
description: A music video for Alex Ballantyne s "Obedience Training".

name: Tala: The Film Concert
description: Join Asia s Popstar Royalty Sarah Geronimo in her first ever digital concert in celebration of her 18th year in the industry.

name: Charlotte s Photographs
description: The forgotten snapshots of a nurse in 1940 s Minneapolis take us into the world of women s work in this animated musical documentary.

name: tricot緊急謝罪会見
description: tricot movie june

name: Rossini: Il Barbiere di Siviglia
description: Part of the celebrations for the 150th anniversary of the death of the Pesaro composer, Il Barbiere di Siviglia staged in Lugano, is the result of a virtuous collaboration that involved Swiss Radio and Television, LuganoInScena and LuganoMusica. The musical part was entrusted to Maestro Diego Fasolis who, together with his Barocchisti ensemble, was involved in the project from the very beginning. Internationally renowned soloists such as Edgardo Rocha (who embodies the Count of Almaviva), Riccardo Novaro (Bartolo), Lucia Cirillo (Rosina), Giorgio Caoduro (Figaro), Ugo Guagliardo (Basilio) and Alessandra Palomba (Berta) performed on stage.

name: Itzcóatl
description: The scales of the snake refract a trance and invocation. In the epicenter, the pyramids join Izcóatl’s battle, the Obsidian Serpent propagates an exhortation: all the dances against the war.

name: Suzanne Somers... And 10,000 G.I.s
description: A variety special starring Suzanne Somers as she entertains Army and Air Force personnel at Ramstein Air Base in Kaiserslautern, West Germany.

name: Perry Como s Christmas in Paris
description: Perry Como hosts this Christmas special, featuring music and songs Parisian-style.

name: Perry Como s French-Canadian Christmas
description: This televised Christmas special, filmed in Quebec, features the music of Perry Como and a number of guests.

name: Rod Stewart: Tonight He s Yours
description: Rod Stewart performs 20 full length songs in this concert special.

name: Delivery Night
description: A pizza delivery man is constantly late for work. His boss gives him one last chance to keep his job.  When he arrives at the delivery address, he meets his ultimate idol, the rock star Charly Dopamine and his girlfriend Lucy.

name: David Bowie - Total Rock Review
description: Critical review of the music and story behind the legend of David Bowie and his band The Spiders from Mars during the period 1969-1974. Features interviews with original Spiders Trevor Bolder and Woody Woodmansey, plus Angie Bowie, David Bowie s then-wife, as well as rare performance footage and a critical assessment of every album from the period.

name: David bowie - Up Close and Personal
description: The Up Close and Personal series continues with this entry on the chameleon-like talents of pop star David Bowie.

name: T-Square Super Band - Concert tour 2008 Final Wonderful Days
description: T-Square s 30th anniversary concert.

name: The Hives: Tick Tick Boom!
description: From the pre Black & White tour...

name: Macumba Live in Recife
description: The concert “Macumba live in Recife” starring Johnny Hooker. Recorded live at Baile Perfumado in Recife in April 2016.

name: Live In Italy Arena Di Verona Zucchero Sugar Fornaciari - (Musicale) (Concerti)
My Indie Rock Darling
description: Tells the story of the adventures of four teenagers to Kuala Lumpur to watch their favorite band. My Indie Rock Darling is a documentation of the independent music circa 2005-2008.

name: BI-2
description: The first solo concert of the group "BI-2" in the club of the Moscow Aviation Institute, November 12, 2000. The history of the band, unknown pages, exclusive interviews with the members. How the famous soundtrack to the movie "Brother 2" was recorded.

name: Modà - Passione Maledetta 2.0 Live San Siro
Death Angel: Live at Whisky A Go Go
description: Liveset: 0:13 Thrown To The Wolves (2004) 7:09 Claws In So Deep (2010) 12:35 Voracious Souls (1987) 20:34 Father of Lies (2016) 25:53 The Moth (2016) 31:21 Seemingly Endless Time (1990) 35:04 The Dream Calls For Blood (2013) 41:09 Mistress of Pain (1987) 46:08 Lost (2016) 51:24 Humanicide (2019) 1:03:13 I Came For Blood (2019) 1:16:48 The Pack (2019) 1:10:54 The Ultra-Violence (1987) / Kill As One (1987)

name: Giorgia MTV Unplugged
description: MTV Unplugged is a live album by Giorgia, recorded during the MTV television broadcast of the same name in an acoustic version in Milan on April 29, 2005. It is the first Italian MTV Unplugged. During the same concert the DVD of the same name was recorded and released on the market a few months later.  In the press conference that followed the concert, the Roman singer also said she was a bit tired of singing, also due to the pressures in the record industry. So then it was not, because after the Unplugged Giorgia worked on other projects and in 2007 she also released a new album, Stonata.

name: Old Records
description: Many older people have nostalgia for the hits of their youth. Knowing this, we decided to create a musical film where popular melodies of 30-40 years were played, such as "Splash of Champagne", "Carioca", "Tiko-tiko", "Joseph", "No need to be sad", etc. The film is structured as a conversation between a pop singer (Vera Beradze) and a collector of old records (Boris Shcherbakov). After the selected record is put on the gramophone and a familiar melody sounds, the old collector suddenly appears in the frame with the singer and transforms into a brave Mexican, then a playboy, or a guy from the outskirts of Moscow, depending on the song being played.

name: Excepter: Black Beach
description: Here, at the literal End of the West ... Watch as Excepter descends the great stair down to Sand Dollar beach, armed only with a flute and a small bag of percussion. Listen as Excepter walks on Morro Bay to the dread beat of the setting Sun. See Excepter dressed head-to-toe in black in the noon-day heat on a nudist beach (Parental Guidance Suggested). Feel the hostile surf continuously lash the last soundclash.

name: Uptown: A Tribute to the Apollo Theatre
description: Film clips of stars like Billie Holiday and Bojangles Robinson meld nicely with burlesque skits, singing and dancing by the hosts, Billy Eckstine, Bunny Briggs, Cab Calloway, Gladys Knight and the Pips, the Mighty Clouds of Joy, Nipsey Russell, Doc Severinsen, Sandman Sims, the Temptations, Jack Albertson and Sarah Vaughan. Natalie Cole, Lou Rawls, Flip Wilson and Ben Vereen headline a flamboyant yet sophisticated paean to Harlem s famed music-and-comedy crucible.

name: Massacre: En el cinerama (En vivo Mandarine Park)
description: Massacre live show on Sunday, November 1, 2020, in what was the seventh date of the Renault Drive In show cycle at the Mandarine Park Drive-in - Punta Carrasco (Buenos Aires). New format for shows with the protocols adjusted to the Covid-19.

name: Racer X: Snowball of Doom - Live at the Whisky
BUSH Virtual Live Experience
description: BUSH performs live on an all LED stage their greatest hits as well as songs from new album TheKingdom. See band leader Gavin Rossdale lead his band in a total rocking show thats is one the best performances captured to todate.

name: House Of Shakira: Live At Firefest 2005
What s What
description: What s What tips it s hat to the tradition of cross-dressing and gender-bending entertainment in twentieth century vaudeville and early filmmaking. Inspired by the 1926 song,  Masculine Women, Feminine Men,  the filmmakers contribute a contemporary comment on gender performance.

name: An Evening with Diana Ross
description: Diana Ross performs her one-woman show in Los Angeles.

name: Icehouse - 40 Years Live Roche Estate Full Concert
description: ICEHOUSE performing at Roche Estate, Hunter Valley, NSW on 25th March, 2017

name: Elbow - Asleep in the Back
description: The film was compiled by long time collaborators Soup Collective who documented the entire album campaign, bringing together videos for the singles, with home movies from the band’s time on tour. The movie features exclusive live footage, including Guy’s memorable stalling during a technical breakdown at a show in Glasgow.

name: Grief Night Club
description: As a young man struggles through moments of uncertainty, grief, mortality and being unable to cope with the influx of emotion, he is brought along on a mental journey of self-discovery and self-worth through a language that speaks when words no longer work -- music.

name: BoA THE LIVE 2018 "X mas"
description: BoA s first Christmas Concert in 7 years that was performed on 12/10/2018.

name: BoA LIVE TOUR 2019 #mood
description: Concert film by multi lingual artist BoA to celebrate her Nationwide tour of Japan and was held at Omiya Sonic City

name: BoA THE LIVE 2018 ~Unchained~
description: BoA s THE LIVE 2018 tour ~Unchained~, which was her first national tour in three and a half years.

name: childish whim.archive
description: Childish Whim is a commentary on the feelings of angst and rebellion teenagers are inclined to feel.  This short dance film is depicts a young teen who is entirely aware that all of the feelings he is acting upon are momentary impulses, however, he still gives into them.

name: Rabbit Hole
description: Short animation by Holly Lo

name: Samba Social Clube - O Melhor do Samba Social
Samba Social Clube - Roda de Samba em Homenagem a Paulo César Pinheiro
WATERPARKS: THE ANTI TOUR PERFORMANCE
description: The Anti Tour Performance Livestream on March 27, 2021

name: How to Live a Normal Life
description: A story about Nashville based Kurt Wagner and his band Lambchop, his parents, his dogs and his incredible basement. The man who wants to be just a normal blue collar worker and his mother who took him to the theater.

name: Foley Room: Found Footage
description: A behind-the-scenes special included with some pressings of Amon Tobin s 2007 CD Foley Room.

name: Miong
description: When Spanish colonizers assert their power over Filipinos by turning them against each other, a young Miong understands that the key to freedom lies in unity. Though he wants his countrymen to be liberated from oppression, he is a conflicted...

name: Son of Cornwall
description: Son of Cornwall is about opera singer John Treleaven. John has had a forty year career performing in thousands of opera productions including playing the leading roles in Siegfried, Carmen, Tannhauser, and many more classics. Each of these operas are included in the documentary through a combination of archive theatre footage, historical photos, audio excerpts, and interviews from some of John s colleagues.

name: Pinkfong 50 Best Hits: Baby Shark and More
description: Enjoy a collection of songs about animals, including "Baby Shark", cars, dinosaurs, and many more! Meet Pinkfong s fun, educational videos that captured the hearts of millions of children around the world. Enjoy hundreds of kids  favorite songs and stories created by Pinkfong, the official creator of global hit Baby Shark behind #BabySharkChallenge.

name: Man
description: An all-male tango set against the backdrop of patriarchal civic geography.

name: Let It All Burn
description: With songs like This World Is Sick and Sad Bitch, IC3PEAK had acquired a reputation for laying bare the malaise of many Russian millennials. By the time they reached Voronezh, the group already had been briefly detained in the Siberian city of Novosibirsk for unclear reasons and had seen a string of performances canceled.  Now, a December 6, 2018 police investigation into alleged food poisoning at the Voronezh billiards club where IC3PEAK was scheduled to perform looked like it might lead to the same.  In Let It All Burn, Russian filmmaker and TV journalist Andrey Loshak went behind the scenes to document the club and band’s struggle with local police and officials over the right to perform.

name: A Studio - Юбилейный концерт к 25-летию группы
The Old World Underground: Oh No!
description: Music video for The Old World Underground s new single.

name: Gigantes do Samba - Ao Vivo Multishow
Mass Hysteria
description: Mass Hysteria

name: Polysics - Now is the Live!!!
description: Live concert from Polysics featuring their May 14, 2006 performance at the Shibuya AX in support of their hit album "Now is the Time." Also includes documentary footage for their British concert.

name: Polysics - Bukodan or Die!!!
description: A recording of the Nippon Budokan one-man live held on March 14th to celebrate the 10th anniversary of their major debut and the graduation of Kayo s band.

name: Kezia X Live
description: The founding members of Canadian progressive metal outfit Protest the Hero reunite in their hometown of Toronto to play their debut album Kezia one last time.

name: MEUTE: Live in Paris
description: Meute s first concert movie, which they recorded in March 2019 at Le Trianon in Paris.

name: Existance
description: "Heavy Metal in your veins, Fury in your brain !"

name: Seth
description: Come and discuss live with French black pioneers SETH about the release of  La morsure du Christ , an album that rekindles the flame of the famous  Les blessures de l âme !

name: TAEMIN : N.G.D.A (Never Gonna Dance Again)
description: Taemin s solo ‘Beyond LIVE’ concert titled N.G.D.A (Never Gonna Dance Again) performed in KSPO Dome.

name: Her Sugar Is?
description: A playful burlesque performance peels away layers of history to reveal a persuasive and thought-provoking dance that informs as much as it delights.

name: The Heist
description: The Heist is a dance film about a robbery wrong. In this high-heeled caper, four glamorous voguing cat burglars attempt to break into a prestigious gallery to attain their final score—a diamond studded shoe.

name: Gone (Remembering Where You Came From)
description: Adapted from a work by The Holy Body Tattoo, this stunning performance-film, featuring Noam Gagnon, suggests a struggle with the past as we are taken away from it.

name: Recording in Progress
description: Exploring current music technology, how music is consumed, and how the recording studio fits into that puzzle. The gateway to a new era of sound.

name: Toska - Ode to the Author
description: Live studio performance of Toska’s first release, Ode To The Author - recorded at Brighton Electric Studios  Filmed & Edited by Dark Fable Media.  Mixed & Mastered by Rabea Massaad and Dave Hollingworth.

name: Pete Seeger & Arlo Guthrie: Together in Concert
description: Full concert recorded live at Wolf Trap, VA for PBS broadcast. Arlo and Pete are joined onstage by the band Shanandoah on many of their well-loved Folk classics, across their long careers.

name: Fogão a luz
description: Backed by an echoed horn music, the light passes through a magnifying glass. On the walls, they portrait pans being held on top of a stove.

name: Widespread Panic Live From New Orleans
description: Widespread Panic Live From New Orleans in 2012

name: Cheap Trick: Guitar Center Sessions
description: Over the past four decades, Illinois rockers Cheap Trick have released 16 studio albums, sold more than 20 million units, played over 5,000 concerts, and inspired countless artists throughout multiple generations. 1979 s Cheap Trick at Budokan launched the band into international stardom and brought their overseas success home to the United States.

name: Celebrating Out of Body
description: In celebration of their new album Out Of Body, Needtobreathe performed the album front to back for the first time in Nashville, TN. The performance includes new versions of classic Needtobreathe songs as well.

name: welcome_home.exe
description: As technology accelerates, our species  collective imagination of the future grows ever more kaleidoscopic. We are all haunted by temporal distortion, perhaps no more than when we attempt to remember what the future looked like to our younger selves. As the mist of time devours our memories, the future recedes; each of us burdened by the gaping mouth of entropy. Yet, emerging technology provides a glimmer of hope; transhumanism promises a future free from mortality, disease and pain. Does our salvation lie in digital simulacra? We re here to sell you the answer to that question, for the low, low price of four hundred and seventy seconds.

name: Running Up That Hill
description: In this animation/live-action hybrid hand-colored by over 2100 children, we follow as Meg Myers transforms from caterpillar to moth, and reaches beyond the stars.

name: Samambaia
description: A computer generated fern follows a modular synthesizer soundtrack.

name: Nightingale From Cairo: Umm Kulthum
description: 40 years ago, Umm Kulthum s death was mourned all around the world. Through the power of her song, her unique voice that captured the crowds, and an exceptional repertoire, she performed the unheard-of feat of sweeping away the barriers between peoples - which, to this day, no politician has ever successfully done.

name: Heart of Brass
description: Heart of Brass is a surreal account of events surrounding a determined passion for brass music when your teeth are standing in the way. This autobiographical film reflects the bitter-sweet love of finding joy from an outside perspective.

name: London Grammar: Californian Soil - The Live Show
description: London Grammar: Californian Soil - The Live Show

name: Maarten van Roozendaal: Barmhart
description: This theatre performance is built around the  seven corporal works of mercy . Comedian Maarten van Roozendaal tells and sings about life, death, love, spring and bears. He is accompanied by Egon Kracht on double bass and Marcel de Groot on guitar.

name: Vinterriket ‎– Kontemplative Antagonismen Des Augenblicks
description: Kontemplative Antagonismen Des Augenblicks  DVD contains 40 minutes of exclusive music and exclusive video material

name: Millenium - The Cinema Show
description: Recorded live at Kijów-Centrum, Kraków, 7.11.2015

name: Alloy Dream - Into the Realm
description: "In my soul is encased a dove." Ballad Rock Song of seeking and searching by the psychedelic progressive band Alloy Dream. 3d sculpture art of an angel torso, for they not have the same sense, swims in fluid abstract fashion to swirling color delivering both beauty of sight and sound. Alloy Dream is Audioweapon and Rybird. A Rybird Music Production. Art and sculpture by Rybird

name: Irina Allegrova. Confessions of an Unbroken Woman
description: For the first time in many years, the singer opened the veil of secrets of her personal life and Russian show business. Such an Allegrova has never been seen before. This is a real musical performance, in which each number is a separate story. Irina Allegrova tells the story of a woman-on behalf of a woman and for her. After all, who but a woman knows what she wants most?

name: Laugh At Me
description: Vancouver, Canada’s queer village breaks into song in the incredibly coordinated and locally produced Laugh At Me.

name: Orpheus in the Record Shop
description: Ancient myth is charged with the magical crackle of vinyl in rapper and playwright Testament’s timely musical story of a young man’s journey out of isolation.

name: The Irish Rovers, 50th Anniversary LIVE on St. Patrick s Day
description: For the first time on DVD see the Rovers up close and personal while enjoying front row tickets to the show. See what happens when things go wrong or the lads try to crack each other up on stage. This time, cameras keep rolling! No retakes!

name: The Irish Rovers Christmas
description: Join The Irish Rovers for their rollicking Christmas concert, then come along as the lads kick up their heels in the mountains and pubs of Banff National Park. They are joined onstage by old friends and guest musicians Gerry O’Connor, Patrick Davey, Morris Crum, Irish tenor John McDermott, and guitarist Jason Fowler.

name: The Irish Rovers Home In Ireland
description: The Irish Rovers celebrate the beauty of their homeland in Northern Ireland, performing on location at Carnlough Harbour, Dunluce Castle, The Giant’s Causeway, Slemish Mountain, Glenarm and Galgorm Manor near Ballymena.

name: getforward
description: Companion short film to Golden Vessel s "getforward".

name: Porter Robinson: Nurture Live @ Secret Sky 2021
description: Porter Robinson s debut  Nurture Live  performance at Secret Sky Music Festival 2021.

name: Twenty One Pilots - BBC Radio 1 s Big Weekend
Dreamcatcher [Crossroads: Part 2. Dystopia]
description: Dystopia series concert day 2, Saturday 27th of March 2021.  Dreamcatcher performs top hits from their discography with the rock sound that only dreamcatcher can bring to life.  All the 7 members showcases their powerful vocals with a live band, and captivates you with dynamic choreography, all with the familiar backtracks of electric guitars and hard-hitting drums.  Join them as they run from dystopia and conclude the trilogy part dystopia series.

name: Three Top Hats
description: Zarzuela based on the play with the same name by Miguel Mihura. European premiere.  Broadcast live from El Teatro de la Zarzuela on November 27, 2019.

name: The Little Barber of Lavapiés
description: Zarzuela in three acts. Broadcast live from El Teatro de la Zarzuela on April 12, 2019.

name: Turbotronic
description: A documentary about the rising alternative turbo-folk scene in Serbia.

name: Johnny Orlando: It s Never Really Over (Virtual World Tour)
description: Johnny will be streaming the It s Never Really Over virtual world tour on Moment House, giving fans a unique live experience across 13 tour dates. Watch Johnny perform from Toronto s Danforth Music Hall, in a one hour fully produced concert that will have fans dancing in their homes across the world. Performing his sophomore EP It s Never Really Over for the first time ever, Johnny is excited to provide fans with an intimate digital experience like never before. (Available Worldwide)

name: Rick Astley BBC Radio 2 Live In Hyde Park
Bars & Melody: Live & Undplugged
description: Live & Unplugged marts 13., 2021 - marts 15., 2021  Join Bars & Melody for a stripped down, acoustic session airing on Moment House. You ll get to hear them play a selection of their songs in an intimate style that you won t want to miss.

name: La verbena de la Paloma
description: Lyric farce in one act. This new adaptation preserves all musical numbers, but alters the spoken dialogue, situating the story in a modern community centre. Broadcast live from the Teatro de la Zarzuela on March 1, 2019.

name: La del Manojo de Rosas
description: La del Manojo de Rosas, the Teatro de la Zarzuela s most emblematic and popular production, turns 30 years old. At its premiere in September 1990, it was very well received by the public and critics, and has continued to be so during the last three decades. Several generations of singers, artists, technicians and the public have enjoyed what is now Sorozábal s best-known zarzuela.

name: McCrea 1971: Louisiana s Forgotten Rock Festival
description: Slated as an 8-day music festival in June of 1971, the Celebration of Life drew over 60,000 attendees from across America to a small crossroads called McCrea, situated along Louisiana s Atchafalaya River.

name: Graham Nash: Dirty Little Secret
description: The Tulsa Race Massacre of 1921 is retold in song and animation.

name: Luisa Fernanda
description: With this new production by the Teatro de la Zarzuela, the Italian stage director Davide Livermore and the British musical director Karel Mark Chichon show us a series of pictures of customs that shine through in Luisa Fernanda.

name: Benamor
description: Considered the greatest musical success of Pablo Luna s career, this operetta was released at the end of 1923 in El Teatro de la Zarzuela. Many consider it the best of his compositions, bolstered by an inspired and amusing libretto. After its premiere, it went on to be produced in Cuba, Mexico and continued its life cycle on stage until the 1950s.

name: Ramones - Live at Winterland
description: San Francisco, California, Winterland, December 28, 1978  1 - Rockaway Beach  2 - Teenage Lobotomy  3 - Blitzkrieg Bop  4 - I Don t Want You  5 - Gimme Gimme Shock Treatment  6 - Rock  N  Roll High School  7 - I Wanna Be Sedated  8 - I Just Wanna Have Something To Do  9 - Sheena Is A Punk Rocker  10 - I m Against It  11 - Commando  12 - Needles And Pins  13 - Surfin  Bird  14 - Cretin Hop  15 - Listen To My Heart  16 - California Sun  17 - I Don t Wanna Walk Around With You  18 - Pinhead  19 - Do You Wanna Dance?  20 - We re A Happy Family

name: Subharambha
description: Music is all she ever understood, but will that be enough when your heart is still searching for something more?

name: Yora Rienstra: Eerlijk Gezegd
description: Dutch comedian Yora Rienstra talks and sings about her life. After reaching the age of 37, Yora Rienstra starts doubting about her purpose. She decides to take a sabbatical to figure things out. Inspired by the book by the Dalai Lama that she got for her birthday, she sets herself the goal of doing things she fears.

name: ESE EME: The Unauthorized History
description: An independent rockumentary that comprises first-hand testimonials about the history of Sentimiento Muerto, the most influential band in Venezuela, as well as the projects that came after its dissolution: Dermis Tatú and PAN.

name: The Sound of Scars
description: The story of three lifelong friends who overcame domestic violence, substance abuse and depression to form Life of Agony, one of the most influential bands in its genre, led by the very first openly transgender singer. Through the success of their groundbreaking 1993 debut "River Runs Red", hailed by Rolling Stone as "One of the Greatest Metal Albums of All Time", they channeled their cumulative life stories into a soundtrack for a broken generation. This new found fame allowed them to suppress the tragedies of their past, but in its wake new obstacles arose.

name: The Four Seasons
description: A performance of Vivaldi s The Four Seasons performed by Julia Fischer at the National Botanic Gardens of Wales

name: Afternoon With Stewart Bradley
description: Short interview discussing Stewart Bradley s creative processes and influences with his music, while also showing Stewart s personality.

name: Fartasia
description: "Fartasia" was made by running film through a sewing machine. The result is, as the filmmaker says, "surprisingly organic."

name: Sea of Love
description: "In the Town of Banff they must have 50 candy stores on the main street. They sell these little candy deer. Banff is a National Park and so the real dear are all around you, and the stuffed and mounted ones too. I played with the images of the deer and idea of anthropomorphism in this piece. The sound track really up the ante on that." - Christina Zeidler

name: My Life in 5 Minutes
description: The autobiopic "My Life in 5 Minutes" tells a life story with a bittersweet song, animation and family snaps. Some photos hold painful or awkward members for the artist; through computer animation, she enlarges her own eyes to blink the pain away.

name: Precious Little Tiny Love
description: An ode by a socially conscious carnivore to creatures that get crunched.

name: Glitter
description: As two twits dance their fears away at a roadside farmers market, via costumery and choreography, they bring lesbian glamour where it was not ever.

name: Chow Down
description: A chubby girl tries to find the perfect outfit for the big concert. Trouble is, nothing fits.

name: Linda Barry: Ina Unt Ina
description: "ina unt ina" euro-electro-pop divas are back from windy tropical islands to offer you this perfect pop illusion for pleasure. The music is music, You are feeling the feeling.

name: Hippolyte et Aricie
description: In October 1733, the audience at the Académie Royale de Musique witnessed the birth of a revolutionary work: Hippolyte et Aricie. With its inventiveness and musical richness, Rameau’s opera marks a break in the history of French music. A similarly revolutionary duo – Jeanne Candel and Raphaël Pichon – get to grips with this work for the Opéra Comique.

name: Ashen Light ‎– The New Era Of Black Metal: Live In Minsk
description: Live In Minsk (13.05.07, Club Tonnel )

name: Ashen Light ‎– The New Era Of Black Metal: Live In Moscow
description: Live In Moscow (23.02.07, Club Relax)

name: The Farewell
description: A philosophical meditation on a young Tomaž Pengov, one of the greatest musicians in Slovenian history and the author of many timeless songs, some of which will accompany him on this cinematic journey through his world. Pengov’s legacy features ‘Odpotovanja’, the first singer-songwriter record released in the former Yugoslavia.

name: Sing Me a Song
description: "Instead of Whom a Flower Now Blooms", "That Black Guitar", "Dizzy Heights" and other songs by the singer, poet and author Vlado Kreslin have already become folk tunes. Vlado is an eminent performer of popular music with a cult status, which is not a result of self-promotion strategies, but rather a consequence of his exceptional personal charisma and suggestive music expression. The documentary takes a look at the key stages of how Vlado Kreslin developed his authentic artistic expression. At the same time it frames the wider cultural context that Vlado has been creating in for more than forty years. However, this is first and foremost a film about music and music lovers.

name: Die Zauberflöte aus der Semperoper Dresden
Dark Medicine and East Coast Collective presents: Lil Ugly Mane
Tano Romano: 30 años
description: To commemorate his thirty-year career in metal, the show given by Tano Romano at El Teatro Flores on January 9, 2015 was recorded for posterity. This show had multiple luxury guests.

name: Tano Romano: 25 años
description: Recorded live on March 13, 2010 at "El Teatro" in Flores, Buenos Aires, Argentina, "25 años" reviews the career of Atonio "Tano" Romano, an emblematic guitarist of Argentine heavy metal.

name: Def Con Dos: 6 dementes contra el mundo
description: "6 dementes contra el mundo" is a live album by the Spanish rap-metal band Def Con Dos, recorded on September 3, 2005, in Alcorcón (Madrid).

name: Invitation
description: Continuing his performance-based documentary work, Michael V. Smith has created a confessional nude dance video. Invitation chronicles the artist’s relationship to his body, welcoming the audience to celebrate and bear witness.

name: Johann Sebastian Bach: St Matthew Passion (RCO)
King Hiss - Earthquaker: a Celebration - Livestream concert
description: Setlist 1. Earthquaker 2. Revolt! 3. King Hiss (feat. Bart Govers from Fleddy Melculy) 4. Black Wolf 5. Kilmister (feat. Dennis Van Der Auwera from Tangled Horns) 6. GTWHR (feat. Dennis Van Der Auwera from Tangled Horns) 7. Mastosaurus 8. Butcher 9. Snakeskin (feat. Jens De Vos from Off The Cross) 10. Homeland

name: No New York Festival - Berlin
description: The "No New York Festival" on a tour of Europe. This concert is at SO36, Kreuzberg, Berlin, where a sprawling variety of bands and musicians related to the NNNF performed.

name: The Cramps: Live in New York
description: The Cramps perform live from NYC s Mudd Club in 1981. Highlights include: "TV Set", "Goo Goo Muck" and "I Was a Teenage Werewolf".

name: Shaila XV
description: Live Double DVD that captures the show of Shaila s 15 years, one of the most important melodic hardcore bands on the Argentine scene, together with artist friends covering their songs. It also includes a documentary of the band on tour throughout South America.

name: JAF: Tributo a Riff VII en vivo
description: Record of the show where JAF paid tribute to "RIFF VII", a 1985 album of which he was part as a singer and guitarist, in one of the most important bands of Argentine heavy rock. The show served as the launch of his tribute to the album.

name: Чёрный Обелиск: 20 лет и еще один день
GROOVE
description: Montreal’s vibrant, diverse and glamourous queer community expresses its unity in GROOVE by swingin’ through the cha cha of love.

name: Love of Woman
description: A lesson in love and a duel ‘til death set to Elizabethan music.

name: Hidden Eden
description: Exploring the concept of the Ecology of Emotions, this musical film portrays an inner journey through the secret garden of creativity put into frame by the nature of Iceland. Hidden Eden is a metaphor for our inner secret garden of creativity. This project bloomed during an art residency in Iceland, sparked by conversations around our shared philosophies on voice and emotional connection. The nature of Iceland inspired us to make the connection on how the landscape reflects the emotional states of creativity and how it helps manage the homeostasis of our inner emotional landscapes. This exchange between emotion and the landscape opens a space for healing. Creativity provides us with the tools to access a garden of our authentic being, nourishing and balancing us. Allowing ourselves to explore the spectrum of our emotions through the lens of our relationship with the Earth invites others to do the same. The creative process can affect our well being and is a key to human evolution.

name: In the Skin of Becoming Swan
description: Water as a symbol of rebirth.

name: Queer Empathy: The Story of Divorce Lawyers I Shaved My Head
description: An in-depth look into the music of LGBTQ+ singer/songwriter Jordaan Mason.

name: Lovely Is Your Name
description: A rock video in the laundromat.

name: NASCAR ALOE: AMERICAN WASTELAND CYBER SHOW
description: A livestream concert from Nascar Aloe, featuring new performances from his upcoming album, American Wasteland.

name: Røckon2 Night -Guilty Gear Live 2016-
description: The DVD contains live recordings from the Tokyo show (Shinjuku BLAZE). Songs performed include "Still in The Dark," "Holy Orders (Be Just Or Be Dead)," "Wanna be Crazy," "HEAVY DAY," and many more .The package includes many popular songs that allow you to experience the atmosphere of a live performance. Some of the songs from the Osaka concert are also included as bonus tracks.

name: Los Muertos de Cristo: Ladran, luego cabalgamos...
description: "Ladran, luego cabalgamos..." is a documentary film that covers the 16 years of life of the Spanish punk band Los Muertos de Cristo. In a quite original way and by the hand of the young and newcomer director Giuseppe Mancini, playing this through the script with reality and fiction. Includes images of the band s first concert (1990) until 2005. Including live shows such as "Bienvenidos al infierno", Latin American Tour 2002, Derrame-rock 2003, Tour No serás mi reina - 2004 (including songs from Rapsodia Libertaria Vol.1) , making of and other extras.

name: Fun People: Cuando cae el sol
description: "Cuando cae el sol" is a live vhs edited by the Frost Bite label, with images from the show that Fun People gave on September 23, 1995 at the Arlequines theater in Buenos Aires. Video clips are also included at the end of the tape.

name: STILLNESS IN WONDERLAND: THE FILM
description: A short film accompaniment to Little Simz s sophomore album release. A reality bending journey into a world that isn t quite what it seems on first glance.

name: The Servant Woman
description: The young girl made a mistake. As a result, she has son from a soldier, who immediately broke up with her. She gives away her child to a wealthy family, but years later realizes that the child is the most valuable thing in her life. To be with him, poor woman applies for a job to this family.

name: straightbut
description: Visually luscious and aurally-fixated, this short narrative tape offers a poetic and funky celebration of the Bisexual Queendom. A sequel to Bristol s title "videobut", it s her first tape that you can dance to.

name: Save Our TISM
description: Australian band TISM ("This Is Serious Mum") are about to disband. With the aide of a telethon running on stage during their concert, their fans, unsuspecting callers and "special guests" attempt to raise $1,000,000 in order to keep the band together.

name: What the Universe Tells Me
description: Documentary that explores how philosophy, mythology and music combine in Mahler s Third Symphony to create an all-encompassing panoramic experience.

name: COIN: An Immersive Virtual Experience
description: A live concert experience featuring songs from Indigo Violet, plus scenes from Dreamland, HWYKIYNT, & COIN s self-titled debut.

name: Dimash Kudaibergen - ARNAU Tour in New York
Last Train Home
description: A story of youth, revolt and demise, following the lyrics from the titular song made by British composer, Benjamin Stefanski, best known by his recording alias Raffertie.

name: Black and White
description: Abstract and vividly graphic, this music video was created for Jack Parow and Gangs of Ballet’s song ‘Black and White’ by the studio Feral Child, who expertly translated the intensity of the lyrics while weaving the EP’s thematic colours all through the frames.

name: Bach Performance on the Piano
description: Angela Hewitt shares the inspiration and experience behind her award-winning playing in an illustrated lecture that explains the technical and practical steps essential for performing Bach on the piano. For the first time she appears on a 2-DVD set, launched in conjuntion with her Bach World Tour which took her to all corners of the globe during the 2007-2008 concert season. In the first disc, she conducts a ‘masterclass’, discussing all the challenges, possible pitfalls and delights in performing Bach on the piano. The second disc features Hewitt live in concert. This is an unmissable release.

name: I m Telling
description: This mixed media video piece explores the healing process of recovery from childhood sexual abuse through the interwoven mediums of story, poetry, dance and visual art. For survivors and their supporters.

name: Drive She Said
description: Set to Rashid Taha s YA RAI, a song in Arabic about exile.

name: The Mysterious Rhinestone Cowboy
description: David Allan Coe, ex-prisoner turned country-western star, is featured in this combination in-studio concert performance and documentary film. The program follows the star performing at country music fairs, visiting with family at his childhood home and returning to the correctional institution where Coe claimed to have killed a fellow inmate. Musical selections performed by Coe and his Tennessee Hat Band include “The Fugitive,” “Longhaired Redneck” and “You Never Even Called Me By My Name.”

name: Thomas Dutronc et les esprits manouches
Buenos Aires Ciudad Sonora
description: Buenos Aires Ciudad Sonora is a documentary film about the independent music scene in the city of Buenos Aires.  Filmed and edited entirely by Lucas Garcia Monfort between 2013 and 2015. Although this audiovisual piece shows the development of a scene rather oriented towards experimentation in terms of electronic genres from different angles; And of course there are countless other artists to stand out in the Buenos Aires musical scene, "Buenos Aires Ciudad Sonora" is a valuable approach to the Buenos Aires art scene, fully recommended for those who are curious about how an independent scene is built and what have to say those who dedicate themselves to it on a daily basis.

name: Delusions of Grandeur
description: Delusions of Grandeur navigates between the boisterous and the reflective. Funny and smart, Pollard’s video explodes and recedes in an operatic paean to identity, film noir and music videos.

name: Kings
description: Meet Montreal s Mambo Drag Kings, a dapper group of lip synching lesbians who entertain in style. This part documentary, part performance tape apes family value sitcoms by inserting black and white parodies of television shows starring the Kings.

name: Why Arizona
description: An imaginary road movie along the outskirts of the queer erotic frontier. A reformulation of queer classics: porn, music, and cruising.

name: Great Dykes of Holland
description: A saccharine tune from the ’50 s Mickey Mouse Club is transformed into a wild samba celebration of contemporary lesbian expression.

name: BROCKHAMPTON: THE TOP OF THE MOUNTAIN
description: Follows their most recent album release ROADRUNNER: NEW LIGHT, NEW MACHINE.

name: Holiday
description: A playful, experimental musical short painted directly on black film.

name: Birds of Paradise
description: The Florist is a low down high line scourge hot on the trail. Tricky Dick is a cold and lonely runt on the run. Can he escape the past forever?

name: SUGIZO - Unity for Universal Truth
description: Features SUGIZO s 20th anniversary concert. Features great acts such as Toshi, Ryuichi Kawamura, and Kiyoharu. Contains 16 tracks, including two unaired ones.

name: Gué Pequeno: Stile Originale - Fastlife | Seconda parte
description: In 2006 one of the most iconic mixtape sagas in the history of Italian rap made its appearance to teach Italy what rap was. 15 years later " Fastlife " returns to the scene, because it is necessary to remember that lesson with a new vigor.

name: The All-American Rejects: Live at the Wiltern
description: Concert film.

name: The Ooli Moves
description: Animation by Adebukola Bodunrin. Music by Nicole Mitchell.

name: California Song #2
description: This film juxtaposes the director s grandmother s romantic attempted suicide at seventeen with his affair with a boy from Latvia.

name: Song of the Week
description: In the late forties in the Flemish cinemas one could hear and see popular flemish songs played by a Schlagerband led by arranger Gerd Zonnenberg.

name: karen don t be sad
description: Noki, a 17-year-old girl, spends her days in isolation due to Covid-19. Staying at home forces her to deal with tensions between her family members and especially between her father who rarely devotes much time to her.

name: Cante jondo: Granada, 1922
description: Granada, Spain, 1922. The composer Manuel de Falla, who dreams every night of the ancestral songs sung to him by his nanny, fears that flamenco art will disappear, so with the help of his friend Miguel Cerón Rubio and the poet Federico García Lorca, he organizes a contest to revitalize and promote it.

name: Sorya
description: Sorya, a young Cambodian woman aged 17 years old, arrives in Phnom Penh to work in a textile factory with her best friend, Lida. With a hellish pace of work and no talking allowed, Sorya is not a natural at sewing, unlike her friend who rapidly works her way up the corporate ladder. Sorya prefers the nightlife and city living of the capital. One night, she is singing karaoke in Lucky bar. Everybody there is captivated by her voice. It’s the beginning of her path to stardom but between love affairs, friendships that are broken and then mended, desire and frustration, more trouble lies ahead for Sorya as she tries to find her path in life!

name: Shaârghot
description: Come interact live and ask your questions to the band, director Teddy and illustrator Lyan from the book "Compendium"!  We will reveal the details of the next album and broadcast exclusive images of the new short film "Black Wave" and the book to be released in late 2021/early 2022!  Coming straight out of a dystopian universe where cyberpunk and post-apocalyptic are mixed, the Shaârghot, a crazy creature born from a failed experiment, sows chaos in the Great Eye city. More than a music band, Shaârghot is above all a story and a concept that comes to life through their wild concerts. Post-apocalyptic costumes, a martial metal as dancing as percussive, dancefloor beats where acid and devastating synths are mixed, such are the ingredients which compose the scenic universe of the group.

name: Trans-Continental-Railway
description: This film is a music video for the band Organic Beer’s new album TCR (Trans-Continental Railway), which is intended exclusively for screening in cinemas. Trans-Siberian Railway was built and partially operated in 1897. If the cinema is still machinery and apparatus, our bodies can go further away through it.

name: Cock-A-Doodle-Doo
description: An animated musical short film about the friendship between a rooster and a cow.

name: Butch Femme Polka
description: In this uproarious musical medley, a trio of lesbians sing and dance their way through a laundry list of do’s-and-don’ts for their ideal lady lover.

name: Unmapping Desire
description: Unmapping Desire is an experimental video-poem exploring separation, political borders and social boundaries, which keep women from loving women. Set to evocative images and music, the poem unfolds charting the journey of two South Asian women and their victory of through imagining "borderless countries in a county-less world."

name: Alpha Blondy & The Solar System - Live in peace tour
Grita
description: Twenty years after the appearance and rise of the Buenos Aires Hardcore movement, its protagonists, now adults and with children, share their memories of that time: the shows, the ideal that united them and how that peculiar way of living music ended up marking them for forever. This documentary is an archaeological work to find the vital impulse of the Buenos Aires hardcore scene beyond any visual testimony that still remains on the shelves of private collections.

name: An Illustrated History of Western Music
description: A rather liberal and pictorial interpretation of a number of Western musical forms with a considerable homosexual bias. Playing largely off the mood of different musical genres, it is a humorous commentary on musical association, and a celebration and critique of "gay identity."

name: These Are a Few of My Favorite Things
description: Using Julie Andrews and origami patterns, this film plays with notions of power and pleasure in an interracial, sexual relationship.

name: Big Business: Live At The Crocodile, Seattle, WA 2/19/2005
description: The mighty Big Business live in concert. Filmed and Recorded February 19th, 2005 at the Crocodile in Seattle Washington.  Thirty one minutes of HEAVY action.

name: Don Pasquale - San Francisco Opera
description: A young student, Ernesto, who lives with his old bachelor uncle, Don Pasquale, has refused to wed the woman of his uncle’s choosing because he is in love with a young widow, Norina. Pasquale has decided to punish Ernesto by getting married and fathering an heir, thereby cutting off his nephew without a penny. Dr. Malatesta, a friend of Pasquale as well as Ernesto and Norina, has devised a plan to both save Pasquale from his folly and help the young couple.

name: Old Earth
description: A short film created for MIKE and Jadasea s album collaboration, Old Earth. It features rapid montage editing weaving together strands of abstract archival imagery through the filter of film grain and television static. Selections of archival includes the filmography of Djibril Diop Mambéty and references to anthropologist Marimba Ani

name: 一生一世懷念你 羅文演唱會
Sinking Inside Yourself
description: Short film directed by David Altobelli to accompany Hammock s song, "Sinking Inside Yourself."

name: The Durutti Column: Domo Arigato
description: The acclaimed live concert film by Manchester ensemble The Durutti Column, recorded in Tokyo in April 1985. Domo Arigato followed on the heels of ambitious ‘modern classical’ album Without Mercy a year earlier, and saw composer / guitarist Vini Reilly and percussionist Bruce Mitchell augmented by John Metcalfe on viola and Tim Kellet on trumpet. Their show-cum-recital at the Kan’i Hoken Hall on 25 April was recorded digitally and filmed on two 35mm cameras.

name: NRBQ: Live in Performance
description: In November 1999, after a two-night extravaganza in New York City celebrating their thirtieth anniversary, NRBQ played to a packed house of loyal fans in Connecticut Public Television s Hartford studio.

name: 麗的亞視半世紀精彩演唱會I&II
林淑容 羅時豐 無言的結局真經典演唱會
The Taj Mahal Travelers: About the Journey
description: "Part travelogue, part performance, 100% head-spinning" - Worlds of Cinema  Electronic music pioneer Matsuo Ohno s art-film/documentary chronicling the Japanese experimental music ensemble s 1971-1972 worldwide expedition. Led by Fluxus member Takehisa Kosugi, the Taj Maj Mahal Travellers elevate university crowds and concert halls, follow tortoises through the Iranian desert, jam with Don Cherry and his Organic Music Society in a geodesic dome in Stockholm, explore Grecian ruins, improvise on Afghan steppes, serenade the waves at Cape Manazuru Beach, Japan  and make the pilgrimage to their ivory-white namesake -- making music anywhere and with anything along the way.

name: Angel
description: With lush visual effects and evocative soundscape, this movement tape is a poetic exploration of one man s fall from grace, as he becomes disillusioned with gay ideals of beauty.

name: Röckët Stähr s Death of a Rockstar
description: In the year 2164, when rock n roll is banned, a group of underground rebels, lead by a mad scientist, attempt to start a non-violent revolution by waking up the docile masses via a cloned rockstar sent on a guerrilla tour to "rock n roll them free from the tyranny". But they soon find out, the best laid plans of mice and men often go awry.

name: éclore
description: A tale about the search for new sensorial experiences and territories. It’s a teaching and learning experience through body exploration and manipulation: two strangers dance with their passion, desire, gestures and contact.

name: 2 Minutos: 20 años no es nada
description: 2 Minutos reviews his career in a live show framed in the celebrations for the twenty years of the band. Registered on August 25, 2007 at the Obras Stadium, Buenos Aires, Argentina.

name: 30 años de punk
description: 30 years of punk, a live record with the participation of 3 Argentine punk bands, Los Violadores, 2 Minutos and Cadena Perpetua. The shows were recorded in 2007 at the Estadio de Obras as a celebration of 30 years of Argentine punk.

name: Attaque 77: Karmagedon
description: Recorded live at El Teatro, Flores, on May 31, 2008 at the end of a cycle of 7 shows that Attaque 77 gave to present Karmagedon (the album) in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

name: Lethal: En vivo... a través de los años
description: Lethal, fundamental band of Argentine thrash metal that, 25 years after its founding, continues to write an unmissable legend after having separated twice and re-assembled as many times. The last chapter is "Live ... through the years", a highly technical record that endorses his performance for the first time. Recorded live at the Teatro Colegiales in Buenos Aires, on 3rd September, 2011.

name: Now, Not Yet: In Florescence
description: A short behind-the-scenes documentary on the filming of the music videos for half•alive’s orchestral EP ‘In Florescence’.

name: Green Age
description: The main storyline revolves around the love triangle Dzung - Linh - Ngoc, accompanied by friendship relationships among Saigon youth in the last years of the war.

name: Bob Sapp: Sapp Time The Movie!
description: Contains a dance instruction footage featuring Papaya Suzuki, promo clip(s), a Las Vegas style show, and Bob s Rap performance. Fighter Masaaki Miyamoto is among the guest stars.

name: Poseidotica: En Viaje Hacia Una Nueva Dimensión
description: Captures the Argentine band Poseidótica live at the Niceto Club of Buenos Aires on 21 Oct 2011.

name: Babasónicos: Luces (Luna Park 2006)
description: Luces is the first live album by the Argentine band Babasónicos. It was recorded on the basis of the show presented by the band on May 6, 2006 at the Luna Park Stadium in Buenos Aires.

name: Magutny Bozha - Prayer for Belarus
description: "Magutny Bozha" became one of the symbols of peaceful protesting for fair elections and human rights in Belarus since governmental brutality started escalating on 9th August 2020.

name: Me and Mrs. Berger
description: A song about a lesbian s affair with a married woman.

name: Goodbye to Love
description: Shot and edited in a Super 8 camera, this bittersweet tale of breakup is told through the lyrics of Karen Carpenter s unforgettable tune.

name: Ça grouille à l orchestre : Génial!
La H No Murió: Ácido Argentino Aniversario
description: With the idea of ​​honoring the 25 years since the release of Hermética s album "Ácido Argentino", one of the fundamental albums of Argentine heavy metal, three-quarters of that lineup of the band (singer Claudio O Connor, guitarist Antonio Romano and drummer Claudio Strunz ) plus bassist Carlos Cuadrado, all four who currently play as Malón, performed in 2017 several shows that were filmed, leaving a documentary record of the moment.

name: An Evening With Charo!
description: Now for the first time, Charo brings here sizzling Las Vegas Show to your home.  A cast of over 30 dancers and musicians join Charo in an evening of non-stop entertainment live on stage in the Bally s Grand Room.  Charo displays her full range of talent, that has made her not only a Las Vegas headliner, but an international superstar, and according to Guitar Players Magazine, the best flamenco guitar player in the world.

name: V8 Tributo
description: Commemorating V8, the historic and legendary Argentine heavy metal band, in a tribute show that was recorded live on March 12, 2011 at the Flores Theater in Buenos Aires.  The tribute that was born from an idea of the drummer Gustavo Rowek (one of the founders of the band), was seconded by the vocalist Walter Meza (Horcas), the bassist “Topo” Yañez (Horcas) and the personal guitar of Antonio “Tano” Romano (Hermética, Malón, Simbiosis, Razones Concientes).

name: Manabiya Xstasy
description: "Manabiya Xstasy" was a school festival tour held in November 1999.  Amateur musicians who were Sheena s friends were appointed as band members. In addition, half of the songs played were unreleased songs, including cover songs.

name: St David s Day Celebration with Bryn Terfel
description: Josie d’Arby hosts and evening of music from Hoddinott Hall in the company of Sir Bryn Terfel, Kizzy Crawford and actress Hannah Daniel together with the BBC National Orchestra of Wales.

name: Allie X: The Cape God Digital Concert
description: A 40⁣-minutes stylized performance of some of Allie X s favorite songs from her second studio album, Cape God.

name: RapThai
description: RapThai introduces how rap culture has taken root in and influenced contemporary Thai society. Focusing on the synergy between Thai culture and rap music tradition, this documentary homes in on the stories of 12 Thai rappers and presents a unique look at the different styles they express through their life experiences.

name: El Otro Yo: Contagiándose la energía del otro (en vivo en Obras)
description: Edited in 2005, “Contagiándose la energía del otro (Live at Obras)”, records the show of said offered at the Obras stadium on November 4, 2000, by the Argentine alternative rock band El Otro Yo.

name: Loquero: Electroshow (en vivo)
description: Loquero is an Argentine punk rock band formed in 1990 in the city of Mar del Plata. It is considered one of the most influential groups in the punk genre, and also in terms of alternative rock and pop punk. "Electroshow" is the record of the concert held at Niceto Club on May 22, 2011.

name: Eterna Inocencia: Verano permanente (en vivo)
description: "Verano Permanente" was filmed at the Vorterix Theater on August 11, 2018. The record of the show is a great summary of the uninterrupted path traveled through the entire discography and emblematic themes of Eterna Inocencia, a band formed in the mid-90s , in the heat of the boiling point of the hardcore punk scene of Buenos Aires.

name: Wang Jie China Television TV Concert 1991
齐秦 北京狂飙演唱会
李宗盛  十年回顾暂别演唱会
李荣浩 新歌演唱会
Coleman Hawkins – In Europe, London, Paris & Brussels
Lupi Lupi Lu
description: An absurd yet serious musical about medical diagnosis and the illness lupus. Dressed in animal costumes, two people in an empty theatre switch between the roles of illness and patient, actor and audience, wolf and butterfly. The animals are associated with the illness, which the director has: lupus means wolf in Latin, whilst patients often have a  butterfly rash.  With blue medical curtains paired with red velvet stage curtains, it echoes the uncomfortable feeling of being on show when in hospital.

name: Massacre: Recuerdos al futuro (en vivo en Obras!)
description: On September 23, 2017, Massacre celebrated its 30 years of experience at the Obras Stadium. “Memories to the Future” leaves its indelible mark and immortalizes that devastating show, where the band reviewed their repertoire full of classics and rarities from all times.

name: Fleddy Melculy: Livestream releaseshow Sabbath Fleddy Sabbath
description: Fleddy Melculy: Livestream releaseshow Sabbath Fleddy Sabbath.  This releaseshow was supposed to have an audience, but then COVID-19 hit Belgium. The night before the lockdown, this releaseshow took place and was one of the first liveshows that was streamed without an audience in attendance.

name: Verdi: Aida (Teatro di San Carlo)
description: Giuseppe Verdi s opera Aida

name: The Orb:The Orb s Further Adventures Live
description: The Orb s Further Adventures : Live 2016

name: 鄧麗君 NHK音樂廳《One & Only》個人演唱會
Whitney Houston Live：Concert For A New South Africa
The Monster in the Mirror
description: “The Monster in the Mirror Musical” is a comical but touching 90-minute original pop musical film that aims to empower the youths of today by addressing important and relevant issues like self-love and identity-building. An insecure teenage girl uses a magic mirror that extracts all her insecurities into a monster girl in order to win a boy’s affections, only to learn the true value of self-love and compassion.

name: SWR Big Band - 70 Jahre und kein bisschen leise
Queer, Dyke, Fruit
description: An LGBT parody of The Sound of Music s "Do, Re, Mi".

name: La Vita Olistica
description: Gaining ideology from their last album Disco Volodar, the short film uses the core theme of space. The short film is filmed at Unit 3 Regents Trading Estate, the usual area for Sounds From The Other City.  Using the philosophy of avante garde pioneer Maya Deren ‘one must at least begin with the body feeling’, the films opening is of the four piece standing atop of the hill in the Pendle countryside. This quickly melts into a warped reality and lands you into the POV of a camera and trapped in a liminal space where you see a band in session.

name: Le Robot Solitaire
description: Robots live alongside mankind in a not too distant future, but are they really living?

name: Clawfinger: Live Summer Breeze
description: Clawfinger live at Rockpalast

name: Circular
description: A story about obsession and yearning for the infinite.

name: Cosmic Love
description: A portrait of electronic composer, musician, experimental filmmaker and multi-artist Ralph Lundsten shot in his spectacular Andromeda studio outside of Stockholm. Apart from his music the film also features parts of Lundsten s cinematic works.

name: Looking for Another Girl
description: Looking for Another Girl is a short music video about a girl who is, well, looking for another one. It s a tongue in cheek take on lesbian dating set to the tune of "New England" by Billy Bragg, with a few of the lyrics irrevocably changed!

name: Quite Soberly and Without Wings
description: Lines about missed opportunity, regret, and yearning from various films are recontextualized among visual depictions of rumination and memory. Based on music for a small chamber ensemble and recorded elements.

name: The Pass
description: The Pass  is a compelling series of autobiographical vignettes incorporating songs and stories penned and performed by Denise Marsa. Marsa lays her soul bare as she weaves us through her struggles and accomplishments in the music industry. She has the courage to be authentically raw and vulnerable as she delves deep into introspection. Her sense of humor keeps her from falling into pathos, even when tackling difficult subjects such as sexuality and sexual harassment. What emerges is an entertaining portrait of a strong, talented, complex & inspiring woman. “The Pass” is a must-see tale about perseverance and the human spirit in a mesmerizing tour de force.

name: Paulo César Pinheiro - Letra e Alma
description: A prolific composer and one of the most celebrated poets in Brazilian music, Paulo César Pinheiro is the author of Canto das Três Raças and O Poder da Criação, among other samba, samba-enredo and song classics. Partner of Baden Powell, Tom Jobim and Edu Lobo, was created by Elis Regina, Clara Nunes and Maria Bethânia. Here, sitting on his couch, he reflects on human nature and leads a journey that evokes and involves big names in MPB, covering half a century of music, from the height of the festival era to the period of protest songs against the military dictatorship.

name: Star Trek: Disco Generation
description: The crew of the Enterprise defeat the Borg invasion with the irresistible power of disco! A fast-paced spoof of space opera music videos, featuring stop action animation and a great retro soundtrack.

name: Surfer Dick
description: A dance video with drag queens, surfer music and Scrabble geeks. A parody of gender roles both queer and straight, in a fast paced multi layered mix.

name: I Dream of Gay Genie
description: Tragic lesbian love songs and lipstick falling through the sky; as seen through the eyes of Queenie Quintessential.

name: Gué Pequeno: Stile Originale - Il Ragazzo D Oro | Prima parte
description: first part of the documentary on the tenth anniversary of "Il ragazzo d oro", by rapper Gué Pequeno.

name: Kim Gordon: Earthquake
description: Earthquake contemplates mass surveillance in the modern age with legendary musician Kim Gordon in a music video for her debut solo album No Home Record. Earthquake was shot from the eye of a surveillance camera, which gradually devours the exterior world and ejects a pixelated palette of digital shapes, graphical measurements, and heat signatures onto the screen.

name: U.D.O. - Live in Bulgaria
description: U.D.O. return with the upcoming 5th live album of the heavy metal legend. The year 2020 faced many with tough challenges, but U.D.O. managed to play a great show under pandemic conditions in front of the breathtaking backdrop of the amphitheater in Plovdiv/Bulgaria, making it not only one of the world s grandest shows under Corona, but also certainly beyond compare. This is exactly the feeling that the live recording captures: "It is an evening that lets everyone feel for a few hours exactly what only music can convey: to feel like we belong together and be carried away from everyday life and all worries. An evening in which, especially in 2020, it was clear what an important task culture fulfills and what an indescribable gap it leaves behind if it is not allowed to take place. The setlist is more than special: current songs cavort next to unforgotten and rarely performed live rarities together with some Accept classics.

name: Shizunde Iku yo
description: A short animation by Izumi Tanaka

name: FABISILVESTRIGAZZÈ Il Padrone della Festa - LIVE
description: For their first joint album, Niccolò Fabi, Daniele Silvestri and Max Gazzè revisit the European tours they have played together when they were young and then head towards a tour in Italian concert halls. To celebrate this journey, the three artists portray their music in a live-documentary, rich of new and old songs, musical boxing matches and videos from the making-of of the album.

name: Bambucos y Corazones
description: In a charming and gossipy town in La Sábana that they call Alpargatoca, the old aunts are surprised by everything and gossip about everything... and do not accept the modern customs of their nieces¸ intoxicated by love¸ sports and a somewhat free life¸without those cares of what will they say

name: Dear Madonna
description: Jason returns with another letter to Madonna, thanking her for letting him be her "mistress".

name: Justify My Love
description: Hoolboom takes the music video for Madonna s "Justify My Love" and runs it alongside a transgressive letter to Madonna from her schoolmate, Jason.

name: Acante et Céphise, ou La Sympathie -  Théâtre des Champs-Elysées
description: The story concerns a pair of lovers, Acante and Céphise, who suffer at the hands of a wicked genie Oroès. They are saved by the good fairy Zirphile, who uses her magic powers, including the gift of telepathy (the sympathie of the title), to defeat Oroès.

name: Timeless
description: Timeless, made entirely with stop motion to music from Poppy Ackroyd s album Feathers

name: The Barber of Seville as styled by Al Simmons
description: Manitoba’s most famous comedian of invention, Al Simmons, has translated the story of this popular comic opera from Italian to English and plays all the characters in his condensed version. Rosina is in love with the Count who is pretending to be someone else. Dr. Bartolo is determined to wed Rosina, and Figaro, the jack-of-all-trades barber, is having a bad hair day!

name: Siegfried - San Francisco Opera
description: A fearless young hero battles otherworldly challenges on a journey to discover his destiny.

name: Bike Messenger Boy
description: A recruitment rock video for secretaries into bike shorts.

name: Ostravar a Kryštof – Online koncert pro Ostravu
Magic Sounds
description: Tells about a little violinist who played so wonderfully that his violin was considered magical.

name: Alla Pugacheva. The concert 2019
description: The anniversary concert of the Prima Donna of the Russian stage took place on April 17 in Moscow at the State Kremlin Palace. The film version of this unique concert will be released on October 31st. Viewers from all over the country will be able to see it.

name: Mayday Parade: Sunnyland Session
description: Mayday Parade performs their third exclusive live streaming event from Decatur City Church on March 19, 2021.

name: No mires al cielo
description: Three years of filming documenting all the way and going through the entire history of the Argentine punk rock band Cadena Perpetua, from its beginnings to that unforgettable night of November 5, 2015 at Luna Park, where the walls of the mythical stadium were shaken by the roar of some 5,000 spectators.

name: 300 chœurs chantent les tubes d’un jour
Bluebeard’s Castle / Erwartung (The Met)
description: Bela Bartok s and Arnold Schoenberg s haunting excursions into the nightmare of the unconscious.

name: Furies
description: The efficiency of Hard Rock, the power of Heavy Metal, the spirit of Thrash. This is how we could sum up Furies’s approach and whose first album, which was released at the fall of 2020, will surely aim at the heart and guts of the Metal audience as a whole.  The recipe has been proven and we know it works devilishly well. From the hymnic « You & I » and « Voodoo Chains » to more complex « Fortune’s Gate » or raging « Unleash The Furies », Furies distils a real Heavy Metal method in 10 lessons. No need to reinvent the wheel to make it roll far, fast and right : if the Parisian four-piece cannot deny old school heavy metal masters’s influence (Judas Priest, Iron Maiden), they add a touch of undeniable freshness and a resolutely contemporary production, coming from prestigious Labomatic (Paris) and Domination (Italy) studios.

name: Godspell: 50th Anniversary Concert
description: The Godspell 50th Anniversary Concert is led by Ruthie Henshall (Chicago) and Darren Day (Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat)—who were featured in a 1993 cast recording of the musical—Olivier winners Sam Tutty (Dear Evan Hansen) and Jenna Russell (Sunday in the Park With George), plus Ria Jones (Evita).  The company also includes Jodie Steele, Danyl Johnson, Jenny Fitzpatrick, Natalie Green, John Barr, Sally Ann Triplett, Matthew Croke, Alison Jiear, Shekinah McFarlane, Lucy Williamson, Ronald Brian, and Jerome Bell, supported by an ensemble from Italia Conti.  Michael Strassen directed the production, filmed from the cast’s homes and edited together with visual animations. The creative team also included musical director George Carter, sound designer Cyrus Brandon, and video designer and editor John Walsh.

name: Notes from a London Frog
description: Notes from a London Frog the struggles to be released from the grip of your mouse cursor being just a regular frog.

name: One Night in Heaven (East End Remix)
description: In this queer Asian spoof of karaoke, a new boy in town discovers the dark side of the big city. The story follows his adventures to an underground club where sex and murder are in store.

name: Those Who Know
description: An exquisite vision created out of rare footage discovered in a dumpster, set to Cherubino s gender-bending aria from "The Marriage of Figaro".

name: An Evening With Richard Locke
description: Richard Locke was the star of the Gage Trilogy, ground-breaking feature length gay porn films made in the late seventies. This tape is a document of an erotic performance intercut with statistics of HIV transmission in North America.

name: Safe Sex Is Fun
description: A music video style celebration of safer sex and condoms.

name: Jack Nicolson
description: Short film directed by Mitsuyuki Ishibashi set to the song Jack Nicholson by Japanese rock band Bloodthirsty Butchers.

name: The Octopuff in Kumquat
description: An educational animated cartoon produced by the American Lung Association, set to music, about a mythical land which is invaded by an eight-armed, fast-talking pitch man, whose attempt to induce the citizens into smoking cigarettes is foiled by a group of children.

name: Bianka Braselli – dáma s dvěma hlavami
Carmina Burana: En La Taberna Olvidamos Nuestra Sepultura
description: Concert by the Punk Rock / Ska band Carmina Burana, recorded at the Vorterix Theater in Rosario in 2015.

name: Cabezones: Bienvenidos
description: Live recording of the concert held in 2006 at El Teatro (Buenos Aires)

name: Los Violadores: Luna Punk, rompan todo...
description: Pioneering punk band in Argentina and Latin America, Los Violadores returned to the stage on April 24, 2016 at Luna Park: after some 25 years of separation due to different circumstances, the classic formation of the band appeared before 8,000 people recording his last album, live, called «Luna Punk».

name: Love Humiliates
description: Three girls work in a nightclub, are in a relationship with three men working there. One of them is a singer who loves the dancer and dreams of performing the show he composed, but the owner refuses. He decides to rent a cabaret with his friends and the dancer tries to join them, but is threatened by the owner.

name: Los Violadores en el Luna Punk
description: Story about the reunion of the pioneering Argentine punk band, Los Violadores, who thirty years after their separation decided to put aside personal conflicts to give their last great show.

name: The Best of the Flatt and Scruggs TV Show, Vol. 1
description: Flatt & Scruggs are one of the most popular and respected bluegrass bands of all time. Along with Bill Monroe, they propelled this great style into a widely successful and artistically praised musical format. They were star attractions at the Grand Ol  Opry for many years. The performances in these DVD showcase Flatt & Scruggs in their prime with their group the Foggy Mountain Boys playing many of their most famous songs.

name: The Dickies – An Evening With The Dickies
description: Filmed At Wedgwood Rooms, Portsmouth 16 July 2002

name: A Quality of Light
description: "A Quality of Light" reaches into the filmmaker s familial lineage of black women artists. This film examines the under-told story of the haunted artist who also inhabits the unique political position of being black and a woman. The film applies principles of music theory and West African performance structure in their construction.

name: Schiller - Schiller x Quaeschning - Behind closed doors II - Dem Himmel so nah
Blackmores Night: Shadow of the moon
description: 1.Renaissance Faire  2.No Second Chance  3.Shadow Of The Moon  +Special Interview. Ritchie s Guitar Collections.

name: Blackmores Night: Shadow of the moon & Beyond the sunset
description: Shadow of the moon: 1.Renaissance Faire 2.No Second Chance 3.Shadow Of The Moon +Special Interview. Ritchie s Guitar Collections. Beyond the sunset: 1.Written In The Stars 2.Morning Star 3.Play Minstrel Play 4.Minstrel Hall 5.Under a Violent Moon

name: Lovie s Legacy for Dyke Dates
description: As Lovie makes her way to the Home for Unwed Lesbians, she realizes she has a responsibility to leave a legacy for the dykes that follow behind her. A humorous and musical film that offers dating tips and techniques for keeping her entertained and exhausted.

name: The Go-Gos: Live at Rockpalast
description: Captured live at Berlin s Metropol, The Go-Go s play in support of their 1982 LP, Vacation.

name: Dzhigit Girl
description: Aidar and Galiya have long been in love with each other. Aidar works as a horse breeder, and Galiya is a senior herdswoman at a collective farm stud farm. One day, due to an accidental misunderstanding, the young people quarrel. Angarbay, the store manager, who is also in love with Galiya, is trying to take advantage of this.

name: Die Walküre - San Francisco Opera
description: A father’s blinding ambition and a daughter’s profound defiance drive the story forward in the cycle’s dramatic second installment.  This Ring production is partly #MeToo, partly environmental—and almost entirely American.

name: Thunder All The Right Noises TV Special
description: The program features songs from the new album "All The Right Noises", as well as classic Thunder tunes from years gone by.  Unfortunately Ben was unwell, and unable to take part in the filming on Feb 26th. The rest of the band performed with guests Rob Harris (guitar), Sam Tanner (keys), Julie "The Duchess" Maguire (BVs), and Carly Greene (BVs). The performance was live, recorded then edited after filming, in order to create the best possible viewing experience for you.

name: Logos: Plan mundial para la destrucción
description: Concert by the Argentine heavy metal band Logos, filmed at the Obras Sanitarias Stadium (Buenos Aires) on December 15, 2007.

name: Los 7 Delfines: Broadway
description: Live concert by Los 7 Delfines, recorded at the Broadway Theater in Buenos Aires, Argentina, in 2005.

name: Return of the Firebird: The Firebird, Petrushka, Scheherazade
description: A dazzling film version of three favourite ballets from the Diaghilev Ballets Russes seasons in Paris.

name: Cahier
description: Taeko Ohnuki performs songs from her 1984 album,  Cahier .

name: A Spy: Hester Reeve Does the Doors
description: "A Spy: Hester Reeve Does the Doors" is a videotape by Suzie Silver, performance by Hester Reeve, music by The Doors. Based on a performance created and performed by Hester Reeve on March 8th & 9th, 1991 at Club Lower Links, Chicago, for the program, Bait and Switch (organized by Iris Moore and Suzie Silver.

name: Why I Masturbate
description: A witty ditty about a beloved activity.

name: 29 Effeminate Gestures
description: KQED contracted with Colossal Pictures to direct the Joe Goode Performance Group segment for “Alive from Off Center”;, Part of KQED s Dancing on the Edge series.

name: Breaking the Waves - Opera Philadelphia
description: Breaking the Waves tells the story of Bess McNeill, a religious young woman with a deep love for her husband Jan, a handsome oil rig worker. When Jan becomes paralyzed in an off-shore accident, Bess’s marital vows are put to the test as he encourages her to seek other lovers and return to his bedside to tell him of her sexual activities.

name: I Need a Man Like You to Make My Dreams Come True
description: A satirical look at gender roles, mixing performance art segments by Sheila Costick and Helen Porter with musical comedy interludes performed by The Clichettes.
